SIGNUP FOR REWARDS
I
REWARDS BALANCE
Simply the Best Pizza in Phoenix
IL Bosco Pizza opened in May of 2012 on a quiet road just northwest of Scottsdale Road & Shea Blvd in Scottsdale. Using only the best and natural ingredients, IL Bosco’s Pizzas are the very definition of mouth watering. Your senses will be awakened with the aroma of crusty artisanal pizza cooking in the 900 degree Valoriani Wood-Fired Oven.
Every pizza is hand-made and topped with a fresh assortment of imported cheeses, house-made sauces, and seasonal veggies and meats. Gluten free crust and vegan cheeses are also available.
Enjoy our roasted seasonal vegetables with burrata cheese or a traditional Caprese salad with homemade pesto. To accompany your dining experience you’ll discover a select list of wines available by the glass or bottle, beer on tap, and crafted cocktails.
LET US CATER YOUR EVENT!
A WOOD-FIRED PIZZA OVEN ON WHEELS
IL Bosco’s catering can accommodate parties of 20 – 250+ with a
full menu
of wood-fired pizzas, fresh salads, savory antipasti & decadent desserts. We let our dough rise naturally, form our mozzarella by hand & approach each pie with deliberation. Then we bring the entire operation to you, including a catering staff and our oak-fired Valoriani Oven.
Please email us at
jeff@ilboscopizza.com
for more information.

Dinner
Dinner
Please join us for our 7-course tasting menu presented by Chef de Cuisine Drew Anderson. Of our 7 courses, four selections will be made from The Birth, The Beginning, The Journey, and Dessert. Please advise at time of booking if there are any dietary restrictions or allergies for any members of your party. Please note that not all dietary restrictions or allergies can be accommodated but will be taken into consideration. *Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness.

*I’itoi Onion Vichyssoise

Mediterranean Restaurant in Phoenix, AZ
Mediterranean Restaurant in Phoenix, A
Our Al-Hana Restaurant, the grocer’s in-house pit stop for goods made-to-order, promises you with an exceptional friendly service & an unforgettable delicious, satisfying, & inexpensive meal! Our
Mediterranean grocery store
‘s expansive menu dishes are professionally prepared from All-Natural, Hormone-Free, Antibiotic-Free, & Grass-Fed Lamb, Beef, & Chicken. Using our highest grade of vegetables, our best imported condiments, and our unique House-Blend of spices, we’ll for sure bring you & your family a memorable taste. Whether you are in a mood for a sandwich or a pie, an appetizer or a salad, an entree or a dessert, a single or a family size platter, your meal will always be prepared from scratch and well-crafted to satisfy your Mediterranean cravings. To us you are, as a customer, entitled to the best dining experience every time you visit your Al-Hana Restaurant.

Christo's Ristorante
Proudly serving fine Italian Cuisine to Phoenix, Arizona since 1987
Make a Reservation Now:
Call To Start Your Pick-Up Order Now
Call Now!
Welcome to Christo’s Ristorante
One of the longest-standing family-owned Italian restaurants in Phoenix
We began welcoming guests in 1987 and have proudly become a pillar of the community over the last few decades. Elegant yet welcoming, Christo’s Ristorante serves an extraordinary dining experience inspired by the traditions of Italy.
Our Story
Our Menu
Contact Us
At Christo’s Ristorante
We are dedicated to excellence in every sense of the word: from our food and our service to the quality of your dining experience, we promise that every detail has been considered.
Named as one of the best places to eat in Phoenix by the esteemed New York Times, as well as one of USA Today’s “Best Trattorias in the United States,” our Italian restaurant is a beloved Valley institution. Conveniently located in Uptown Phoenix, Christo’s is just minutes from many of the city’s most iconic highlights.
Our Story
Old-Town European Dining in a Superb Setting
Every dish on our diverse menu has been crafted with love and quality, made with only the finest ingredients.
Because we are committed to exclusively using fresh and seasonal fish, meats, and produce, Christo’s daily chef specials are always changing. Freshly-caught fish is flown in daily, ensuring that guests enjoy the ultimate in quality and flavor.
Among the multitude of dishes that have made Christo’s Ristorante famous are our seafood entrees, such as our Chilean sea bass, cioppino, and halibut Athenian. Our signature osso buco is another guest favorite, as is our plentiful selection of classic Italian pasta. With so many dishes to try, each one made to order to accommodate your tastes and preferences; there truly is something at Christo’s for everyone to enjoy.
Our restaurant provides an intimate dining space that’s delightfully cozy, equally suitable for romantic dates, business meetings, and celebrations with family and friends. With a timeless aesthetic that completely captures the indescribable ambiance of Europe, Christo’s Ristorante is a place that has all the comfort of home and the luxury of a fine dining establishment.
A Dedication to Family, Community, and Compassion
At Christo’s Ristorante, we consider everyone to be a part of our extended family.
From our staff to our guests and beyond, we firmly believe that every individual should experience the joys of both food and family.
Since our beginning, we have felt called to serve the community, not just in our restaurant but also through charitable efforts. The Christo’s team, alongside the Alexi’s Grill family, maintain an active role in various fundraising efforts and also leads a twice-yearly campaign to help feed hundreds of families in need through St. Vincent De Paul. We are thankful to have been blessed with the opportunity to pay our good fortune forward and serve the less fortunate members of the community.
Our Menu
The Arizona Republic
Excellent service, good food and pleasant atmosphere.
~ The Arizona Republic
USA Today
One of the top 17 trattorias in the United States.
~ USA Today
New York Times
One of the best places to eat when you visit Phoenix, Arizona.
~ New York Times
Italia Magazine
One of the top-rated Italian restaurants…across the country.
~ Italia Magazine
Gourmet on the Go
Christo’s Ristorante brings classic and innovative Italian cuisine to Seventh Street.
~ Gourmet on the Go
Visit Christo’s Ristorante for a One-of-a-Kind Fine Dining Experience
Christo’s Ristorante has been one of the best-rated Phoenix Italian restaurants for decades, thanks to our unwavering dedication to creating an exceptional experience for our guests. There is nothing we love more than sharing our passion for food with others and carrying Christo’s legacy forward every single day is truly a gift.
Whether you come to Christo’s Ristorante for a special occasion or simply an everyday meal, we are delighted to have you here. Make a reservation online or visit our Uptown Phoenix restaurant today!

$12

HUMBLE
Pies
Our sourdough crust is handcrafted over 3 days to achieve its flavorful chew & crispy outer texture with a light & airy center. Oven charred bubbles compliment our quality toppings, rich tomato sauce & fresh mozzarella to create a “World Class Pizza” that respects Neapolitan-inspired tradition while giving us our unique, signature Humble Pie.

About the Business
Whether you're a seasoned Chicago pizza fanatic or you've been eager to try, you don't need to hop on a plane to the Windy City to get real deep dish. You can get one of the most authentic Chicago pizza experiences from one of the oldest names in Deep Dish Pizza at the Village of Prasada in Surprise. Located in Surprise's newest shopping area, it's the perfect spot to refuel. Experience Legendary Chicago Deep Dish and thin crust at the place that's been perfecting it for 50+ years, with family recipes and high quality ingredients that you just don't find everywhere. DINE-IN ONLY.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Are dogs allowed on the patio?
A:
Yes, dogs are welcome on the patio. Just have 1 person check in at the hostess station, and then you can enter directly onto the patio with your dog from there. If there is only one of you or you can't do stairs, just call ahead for special…
more
Jessica S.
1 person found this helpful
See question details
Q:
Happy hour?? If so. What are the times and deals
A:
Happy hour is 3pm to 5pm. 1/2 off beer, cocktails, wine, and appetizers. $5 deep dish pizza for 1.

name: Veneto Trattoria
address: 6137 N Scottsdale Rd, Ste 115, Scottsdale, AZ 85250
raw_text:
Menu | Veneto Trattoria | Authentic Italian Cuisine in Scottsdale, AZ
The Veneto Trattoria Menu
Inspired by the timeless charm of Northern Italyâs trattorias, our restaurant brings authentic flavors and warm hospitality to your table. Indulge in a true Italian dining experience where tradition meets passion.
Call 480.948.9928 to Reserve Your Table
View Menu
Exquisite Cuisine, Impeccable Service
"I truly cannot recommend this wonderful place highly enough! The food, service and overall experience were beyond incredible! Since coming home from Italy this was the closest Iâve ever been to a true Italian meal. It was divine!"
Blaine Wuertz
Google Reviews
"I havenât had such a good meal in a long time! We started with a bottle of wine and the salmon bruschetta. My husband normally hates tomatoes and these had him searching them out. Then I had the tagliatelle and he had the risotto. Both of which were superb."
Marissa Bowman
Google Reviews
"I had the pleasure of going to lunch here. There were two types of bread served prior to the meal was fresh, tasty and whetted the appetite. The squid ink pasta was amazing as well. Service was impeccable and the staff authentically Italian. I'll definitely be coming back."
Rusty Shakleford
Google Reviews
"Just fantastic.  Authentic Italian.  Sausage with polenta is just ridiculously tasty and unique. The meatball is probably the best I have ever eaten in a restaurant or a home kitchen.  Hands down one of the best restaurants I have ever been to."
Jason Bruno
Google Review
"Great authentic Italian food, with some unique menu items.  My father-in-law enjoyed the Calf Liver and Onions with fried polenta."
Rick Potter
Google Review

"Absolutely amazing food and the service was outstanding. Our waiter Remo was wonderful and attentive. The value was excellent!!! Definitely give this place a try you will not regret it."
Monda Abdallah
Google Review
"Great experience with Veneto Trattoria. Ordered pasta, carpaccio, soups, sea bass there, some deserts. It all costs every penny of its price - super tasty, fresh, served beautiful. Overall the place looks nice inside and out. Personnel is very professional and polite. I would come back there multiple times if lived in the area."
Nick Brothers
Google Review
"Amazing fresh Italian food and great place for dinner with friends.  Salad mains and deserts were tasty and full on top shelf. Wine and the helpful service were great."
Tom Castellanos
Google Review
"When we visit Scottsdale,  we make it a point to eat here.  Service is excellent and food arrives quickly and hot! A great variety of specials and regular menu items and have not been disappointed in the least. Food is authentic Italian and reasonably priced. Make a reservation because it's always busy. And don't forget the tiramisu!"
S Wal

Veneto Trattoria
Veneto Trattoria's menu reflects the rich traditions of authentic Venetian-style Northern Italian cuisine, embracing the healthy Mediterranean lifestyle. Our dishes feature fresh, flavorful ingredients, lightly prepared with premium olive oil. Most pastas and all classic desserts are made in-house, with gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan options available.

MENU
Menus
Original Recipes
Tutti Santi’s menu offers Nina’s original recipes for Italian classics. From Antipasti Freddi, the Mozzarella Caprese features slices of fresh homemade mozzarella with tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.
A favorite delicacy for many, Carpaccio Di Bue begins with thin slices of raw filet mignon and adds tomato basil, capers, olive oil, and finally Parmigiano. Leo’s favorite, which is from the Antipasti Caldi menu, is the Calamari Fritti. Every night, about 4 specials are delightfully presented by your waiter.
ANTIPASTI FREDDI | cold appetizers
La Bruschetta di “Tutti Santi”
Fresh Roma tomatoes, prosciutto di parma 18 months, fior di latte mozzarella, fresh basil, evoo
Mozzarella Caprese
Fresh beefsteak tomatoes, sliced fior di latte mozzarella, fresh basil, evoo

About the Business
Located in Phoenix in the Town & Country center next to Pizzeria Bianco, Tratto is a restaurant from James Beard Award-winning chef Chris Bianco. The Bianco team prepare food and drinks in collaboration with our farmers, ranchers, millers and local artisans that will represent the intention of the desert Southwest.

About the Business
Business owner information
Claudio A.
Business Owner
Do you love food We have pasta and pizzas by the slice, or you can order a small, medium, or large pizza with our delicious sauce, mozzarella cheese, and your choice of fresh toppings. We offer our square-shaped Sicilian-style pizza with its deliciously-thick crust. Our white pizzas feature mozzarella or ricotta cheese and toppings like sliced tomatoes, broccoli, spinach, pesto, sun-dried tomatoes, and artichokes. And, our specialty pizzas include vegetarian, basil and garlic, four-cheese, and our Diavola pizza, featuring pepperoni, capiccola, grilled peppers, and black olives. Simply delicious
…

Chef Richard Bock
Giuseppe's On 28th | Best Italian Restaurant Phoenix, Arizona
Menu
Our goal at Giuseppe’s On 28th is to offer the most fresh and delicious options. Specials may change daily depending on availability at the market. Some dishes may not be available or made with seasonal variations.
Signature Dishes
29
Spaghetti Neri
Incredible! House-made squid ink pasta with shrimp, calamari and clams in a tomato broth. These sell out quickly so be sure to ask for availability.
29
Market Price
Veal Osso Buco
One of our all time best sellers and features on The Food Network's Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives!'
Market Price
21
Bolognese  Ragu
Housemade tagliatelle with our famous ragu with 7 meats
21
19
Italian Mac and Cheese
Our secret recipe - this is not the way your mom made it! Features parmigiano, mozzarella, fontina, prosciutto, cream and butter baked until olden brown.
19
22
Puttanesca
This savory classic from the Italian beaches is the perfect blend of tomatoes, anchovies, and an assortment of peppers and olives with house-made pasta.
22
24
Roasted Rib Ragu
Rich's slow-roasted pork ribs naturally fall apart in this  ragu served over house-made pasta.
24
Bruschetta
Four pieces to an order. Choose from these curated selections:
Fresh tomato and basil
Creamy gorgonzola cheese and honey
Brie with Tuscan salami vino cotto
House-made pesto and fresh tomato.
14

Pizza for dog lovers!
Pizza First. Puppies Always.
At Pizza To The Rescue, our mission is clear: to delight your taste buds with incredible pizza while simultaneously making a positive impact on the lives of rescue dogs awaiting their forever homes. We've teamed up with our local dog rescue heroes, Almost There Rescue, to ensure that every pizza you enjoy contributes to the well-being of these deserving pups. With 25% of all proceeds from pizza sales going directly to Almost There Rescue, you can indulge guilt-free, knowing that your meal is making a difference.
Made-From-Scratch Ingredients
EAT PIZZA. SAVE PUPPIES.

MENU
A HIDDEN GEM IN THE HEART OF FOUNTAIN HILLS
Pietro's is a charming Italian fine dining restaurant and wine bar located in the heart of Fountain Hills, AZ. Our restaurant offers a sophisticated and elegant atmosphere where guests can enjoy delicious Italian cuisine paired with a carefully curated selection of wines. From made-from-scratch sauces to fresh seafood dishes, Pietro's menu is sure to delight even the most discerning palates. Join us for a memorable dining experience that celebrates the flavors and traditions of Italy.
SIGNATURE COCKTAILS

v = vegetarian | vg = vegan | gf = gluten free | +P = possible | df = dairy free | nt = contains nuts
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
+Please inform your server if you have allergies or dietary restrictions prior to ordering.
Although our kitchen will be happy to accommodate, please know that this is not a gluten-free, vegan, nut-free kitchen.
We appreciate your candidness regarding true allergies versus preferences as extra protocols are required for the former.
We are proud to be able to cater to your needs, however, such accommodations are subject to chef’s discretion.

Cocktails & Spirits
The 1899-built Farish House celebrates turn of the century America with a cocktail list reflecting
the taste of the times, from the Gay ’90’s through the Roaring 20’s when
Gin, Rum, and Whiskey ruled the bar. Happy Hour 4pm-6pm

Taste of Italy
fresh Made On-Demand
We offer the real Italian deli menu. We use top-quality ingredients to make your order on-demand. We treat our customers like our own friends and family!
Authentic italian deli
Real Italian family owned and operated deli in Deer Valley is your #1 destination for authentic Italian style deli, coffee, breakfast and deli. We use top-quality ingredient and we make your food fresh upon order!
We Cater Too
We serve many corporations as well as public & private event. From company meeting, conference events to private party, we cater the best Italian deli for you and your valuable guest! Our food are made fresh on-demand. We ensure you the quality of ingredient and deliver the foods on-time everytime!
See Gallery
Menu

All come on a toasted ciabatta bread

Food & Drinks
Choose from one of the options below or we can
								custom design a menu with your favorite choices and work within any budget. We are happy to
								accommodate any dietary concerns. All group menus include soda, tea, and coffee. Please contact us

LUNCH ~
DINNER~
HAPPY HOUR
~ (In the Bar only)
BRUNCH ~
(Saturday and Sunday)
DOLCE ~
Caffe Boa on Mill Avenue has one objective- to satisfy our guests with the finest quality dishes from the finest available organic and all natural ingredients. We are proud to support the finest local quality such as fresh baked breads from local bakers, and produce from local organic farmers.
All of our pastas are made by hand daily in house.  All of our seafood is wild caught and flown in fresh, as well as our poultry being free range and free of antibiotics.
Taste the difference.
Enjoy and thank you for your patronage.

Reviews
review by - Yelp
Kelly L.:
What a hidden gem! Great food, tasty drinks and wonderful service. I can't wait to go back. Always steady flow of traffic for such a little hideaway. Must check out!!
review by - Yelp
Julie D.:
I loved the inside, it's too bad it's so hidden the food and drinks were awesome. The service was great and friendly too!
review by - Yelp
Bethany B.:
Amazing food, wine and beer selection! I had the steak frites and they were to die for, with Parmesan fries and a spicy dipping sauce. Great bartender and atmosphere, we will definitely be coming back here!
review by - Yelp
Maria N.:
Super friendly, efficient and accommodating staff. Prettiest mule I've ever had. The caprice sandwich is to die for. Add prosciutto. The pesto is unverifiable.
Everything is local. A sure will be back deal.
review by - Yelp
Evan G.:
Always a great selection of beer, wine and spirits, with consistently good food offerings and friendly service! A neighborhood favorite!

name: Andreoli Italian Grocer
address: 8880 E Via Linda, Scottsdale, AZ 85258
raw_text:
Our Menus - Andreoli Italian Grocer - Scottsdale, AZ
Skip to content
Toggle Navigation
Order Online
Menus
About Us
Meet the Chef
Reservations
Hours & Location
Gift Card
Catering
Our Menus
Andreoli’s is the kind of restaurant that makes Italians a little less homesick. This authentic Italian market not only sells imported goods — they make their own takes on international classics in-house. Here, fresh-cured prosciutto hangs in the walk-in, and bread bakes to crusty perfection in the wood-fired oven.
–
FoodNetwork
Order Online
Daily Specials
Antipasto
Calamari del Sacrestano
Marinated and grilled calamari. Seasoned with salt, pepper, olive oil and lemon.
$15.75
Pizza San Francesco Di Paola
Homemade focaccia with tomato topped with fresh mozzarella.
$9.95
Maresciallo
Italian charcuterie board with an assortment of Italian meats, cheeses and olives.
$15.95
Calamari di Suora Celeste
Fried calamari served with a side salad and lemon wedge.
$15.75
Patatine Fritte
Giovanni’s Italian fries served with leeks and homemade tartar sauce.
$9.95
Insalate
Carpaccio
Thinly sliced raw beef served over mixed greens with shaved Parmigiano and a lemon wedge. Dressed with extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper.
$14.95
Bresaola
Air-cured Italian beef served over arugula and topped with shaved Parmigiano. Dressed with extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper.
$14.95
Foce
Italian canned tuna with cherry tomatoes and pecorino. Served over a bed of mixed greens. Dressed with extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper.
$14.95
Fratelli D’Italia
Caprese salad – mozzarella, tomato and basil.
$13.95
Cetrarese
Traditional Calabrian salad – olives, onions, and cherry tomato salad. Dressed with extra virgin olive oil, salt and oregano.
$9.95
Zia Rosina
Mixed greens with cherry tomatoes. Dressed with extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper.
$10.50
Buffalo Caprese
Buffalo mozzarella caprese salad – buffalo mozzarella, cherry tomatoes and basil, topped with extra virgin olive oil.
$18.00
Burrata Salad
Homemade burrata served on top of a bed of arugula and cherry tomatoes. Topped with extra virgin olive oil.
$18.00
Sandwiches
Caio
Thinly sliced beef, provolone cheese and sautéed onion sandwich. Served on our homemade baguette.
$15.75
Sempronio
Prosciutto, mozzarella, and roasted pepper sandwich. Served on our homemade baguette.
$15.75
Forza Italia
Speck (smoked prosciutto), trugole cheese and arugula sandwich. Served on our homemade baguette.
$14.95
Bastardo
Milano salami, pecorino and homemade olive tapenade sandwich. Served on our homemade baguette.
$14.95
Porchetta
Roasted pork, seasoned with garlic, fennel, black pepper and extra virgin olive oil sandwich. Served on our homemade baguette.
$15.75
Bocca Di Rosa
Eggplant, mozzarella, tomato sauce and parmigiano sandwich. Served on our homemade baguette.
$15.75
Cosa Nostra
Thinly sliced roast beef, with hot giardiniera (hot/spicy relish) and extra virgin olive oil. Served on our homemade baguette.
$15.75
Viva L’Italia
Fresh mozzarella, tomato, and basil drizzled with extra virgin olive oil on our homemade focaccia bread.
$14.95
Cafone
Imported Rovagnati parma cotto ham, provoletta cheese and baby artichokes (toasted) on our homemade focaccia bread.
$15.25
Checcali
Imported canned tuna from Italy, mayo and cherry tomatoes sandwich on our homemade focaccia bread.
$14.95
Pasta Specials
Fusilli with Rib Meat
Fusilli with pork rib meat in a tomato sauce. The pork ribs are cooked in tomato sauce until they fall off the bone.
$25.00
Gnocchi Alla Corsara
Homemade potato dumplings sautéed with tomato, pesto and cream.
$25.00
Orecchiette with Broccoli and Sausage
Orecchiette pasta with broccoli and homemade sausage in a butter sauce topped with Parmigiano.
$25.00
Penne Strascicate
Penne pasta with veal Bolognese sauce.
$25.00
Rigatoni with Sausage and Peas
Rigatoni with homemade sausage and peas in a light tomato sauce.
$25.00
Spaghetti alle Vongole
Spaghetti with fresh clams sautéed with Pinot Grigio, garlic and black pepper.
$32.00
Pasta Boscaiola
Pasta with sausage, mushroom and olives in a tomato and cream sauce.
$25.00
Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
Spaghetti sautéed with garlic, extra virgin olive oil and parsley.
$20.00
Spaghettini Con Polipo
Spaghetti with octopus in a light tomato sauce.
$42.00
Penne Pomodoro
Penne pasta sautéed with garlic, tomato and basil. Topped with Parmigiano Reggiano cheese.
$22.00
Specials
NY Strip Steak
*Please allow 30 minutes for this item to be prepared* Prime NY strip steak served to your liking. Served with oven roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.
$70.00
Pesce Misto Alla Brace
Grilled Mix Fish Medley -California Halibut, Shrimp, and Yellowfin tuna. Served with oven-roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.
$42.00
Branzino Alle Erbe Fini
*Please allow 30 minutes for this item to be prepared* Whole baby sea bass (bone-in, head-on) – seasoned to perfection, grilled, and finished in the oven. Served with oven-roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.
$42.00
Trippa di Manzo
Beef tripe served in a tomato sauce. Topped with Parmigiano Reggiano and with light spice.
$32.00
Tocchetti Di Maiale Alla Pizzaiola
Pork loin medallions in a garlic, tomato and oregano sauce. Served with oven roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.
$32.00
Desserts
Meringata
Baked meringue, homemade whipping cream & mascarpone topped with hazelnuts & chocolate.
$9.00
Torta al Giorno
Sponge cake layered with Italian cream (filling choices change daily).
$9.00
Tiramisu
Lady fingers saturated with espresso, layered with mascarpone cream cheese.
$9.00
Chocolate Mousse

Brunch & Lunch (Served till 3pm)
Enjoy the Best Brunch Restaurant in Scottsdale, AZ
Are you looking for the best place for
brunch in Scottsdale, AZ
? Brunch is the most important meal of the weekend and should be healthy to help you start your day on the right foot. Farm & Craft is a healthy brunch restaurant offering a fantastic menu of food and drinks made with sustainable ingredients without gluten and hormones, giving you confidence that your breakfast is delicious and nutritious.
Dine
on our brunch patio to get some fresh air while enjoying your breakfast or brunch.
Create Your Perfect Brunch
We are the best brunch restaurant in Scottsdale,
AZ
, if you want to eat healthy and get the energy you need to get through your day. Browse our brunch menu to find something appealing to your taste buds while getting a freshly prepared meal that keeps you healthy. Many brunch
restaurants
offer delicious food, but you pay the price for your health. You won’t have to worry when you order from us.
The Best Weekend Activity
If you’re not an early riser or need a little extra food in the morning, our healthy brunch restaurant in Scottsdale, AZ, is the perfect solution. Our food is ideal for enjoying in the middle of the morning before lunch, giving you a light fare that satisfies your hunger without ruining your
lunch
. All our food is prepared when you order using the best ingredients to give you confidence in its taste and nutritional value. We’re sure you’ll visit us again after tasting our dishes.

About the Business
Co-founded by Tucker Woodbury and Jim Riley, Genuine Concepts has a rich history of creating unique environments that quickly become neighborhood-defining hangouts. What began with The VIG Arcadia, has grown into a collection of hyper-local, community-driven restaurants and bars packed with genuine people, serving genuine food and drink, including The VIG, The Little Woody, The Womack, The McMillan, Campo Italian Bistro & Bar, and The Genuine. For more information on Genuine Concepts, visit www.genuineconcepts.us

At Sophia’s, our menu is carefully crafted to offer crave-able dishes for a variety of palates.  We feature some of our own family recipes, seasonal ingredients, chef specialties, modern tastes and Italian comfort classics. Enjoy homemade pasta, wood-fired pizza, bruschetta, seafood, salad, panini & more.

Gluten Friendly Crust
**Our gluten-friendly and cauliflower crusts have a gluten content of less than 20ppm based on information provided by our ingredient suppliers; however, we cannot guarantee that pizzas made with these crusts will be gluten-free as we prepare all of our pizzas in a common kitchen with a risk of gluten exposure. In addition, certain toppings contain gluten. We do not recommend these pizzas for guests with Celiac Disease. Guests with gluten sensitivities should exercise judgment in consuming these pizzas.

Menu | Toscanascottsdale
top of page
Home
Dress Code
Menu
Our Story
Location and Hours

More
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
SOMETHING FROM CHEF- Complimentary 1st course!
Arancino-
Saffron carnaroli rice ball that is stuffed with pomodoro sauce, peas, cheese, coated with breadcrumbs and deep fried
Our Salad-
Spring mix, carrot, celery, fennel, imported sundried tomatoes, artichokes, parmigiano, house balsamic
Zucchini-
Wood oven charred, mint, pistachio pesto, EVOO, pecorino cream, balsamic reduction
Caponata Bruschetta-
Eggplant, olives, onions, celery, capers, vinified tomato sauce, served on toasted ciabatta bread
Octopus-
Poached, and plated with fingerling potatoes, olives, Calabrian chili romesco, basil pesto, celery leaf
Burrata-
Imported cheese that’s melted in our wood fire, confit tomatoes, roasted garlic, basil oil, offered with ciabatta toast
*Beef Carpaccio-
Paper thin filet of beef, fried capers, parmigiano, artichoke, arugula, mustard aioli, lemon zest, ciabatta toast
Chilled Seafood Salad-
Shrimp, calamari, celery, EVOO, garlic, Barolo vinegar, lemon juice, red peppers, fennel, parsley, squid ink cassava chips
PASTA AND RISOTTO
​
Gnocchi-
Chef’s handmade potato pasta, peas, wild mushrooms, melted stracciatella cheese, and sage breadcrumbs
Bolognese-
Imported Paccheri pasta, braised prime cuts of beef, Duroc pork, herbs, Barolo wine reduction, bechamel, parmigiano, San Marzano tomato
Shrimp Pesto-
Imported “guitar string” pasta, Sea of Cortez shrimp, basil pesto, pine nuts, parmigiano
Ravioli with Lobster-
Handmade, stuffed with ricotta cheese, 6OZ Atlantic lobster tail, arugula sprigs, “arrabbiata” sauce
Amatriciana-
Bucatini pasta, San Marzano tomato, guanciale, pecorino, parsley, basil
Halibut Risotto–
Alaskan line caught halibut that is pan seared and plated with saffron risotto, peas, gremolata, piccata sauce
Vegetable Risotto-
Braised rainbow Swiss chard, saffron risotto, peas, and charred carrot “bone”
Pomodoro-
Imported “guitar string” pasta, San Marzano tomato, sauteed onions and garlic, EVOO, basil, parmigiano
STEAK• SEAFOOD• ET CETERA
​
*Filet of Beef
8oz center cut wood fire grilled steak, Barolo wine sauce, arugula salad garnish
*Steak Fiorentina for Two
48oz USDA Prime Porterhouse wood fire grilled and carved tableside, Barolo wine sauce
*New York Strip
16oz USDA Prime wood fire grilled steak, Barolo wine sauce, arugula salad garnish
Cioppino
Seasonal fish, shrimp, calamari, lobster, saffron tomato broth, offered with our ciabatta bread
Branzino
Pan seared European bass, herb vinaigrette emulsion, fresh thyme, sauteed spinach, charred lemon
“Porchetta” Chop
Duroc bone-in chop, marinated with fresh herbs, garlic, grilled in our wood oven, cherry mostarda. Plated with polenta and red chard
Vesuvio
Half organic Mary’s Heritage chicken roasted in our wood oven, lemon, garlic, herbs, peas, chicken au jus
*Lamb
Two 8oz wood fire grilled “porterhouse” chops, pistachio mint pesto, panzanella salad
ACCOMPANIMENTS
Wild Mushrooms / Heirloom Polenta / Crispy Potatoes / Braised Red Chard / Sauteed Spinach
Toscana is a fine dining restaurant that stands as a beacon of authentic Italian fare, offering an unparalleled culinary journey through the region of Toscana, and more! Every dish is a testament to the artistry and passion of our Executive Chef, who meticulously crafts each plate using the finest, freshest ingredients available. From the rolling hills of Tuscany to the sun-soaked coasts of Sicily, our menu celebrates the rich culinary heritage of Italy, showcasing traditional recipes alongside modern interpretations. At Toscana, quality is paramount; our gnocchi and ravioli are handmade daily, our sauces simmer to perfection, and our imported products bring an authentic taste of Italy to your table. The elegant ambiance of our establishment complements the exquisite flavors of our cuisine, creating an unforgettable dining experience that transcends the ordinary. Whether savoring our Bolognese or indulging in a decadent lemon ricotta cake, every bite at Toscana promises to transport you to the heart of Italy.
RESERVE HERE!
@ToscanaScottsdale

ABOUT US
Tommy V’s Urban Kitchen & Bar is located in the heart of downtown Scottsdale with a strong emphasis on delicious Italian cuisine and a variety of wines from around the world. We strive to make your experience here enjoyable with exceptional customer service and delicious food. Sit back and unwind with a glass of wine, as we craft a delicious dish for you!

The Traditional

Papa Paul’s Brick Oven Pizza & Pasta Menu
Savor the Flavors of Italy at Papa Paul’s Brick Oven Pizza & Pasta
Delightful Menu Selections
Indulge in the exquisite culinary delights of Papa Paul’s Brick Oven Pizza & Pasta, the restaurant. Papa Paul’s standout dishes include handcrafted brick oven pizzas and artisanal pasta, carefully crafted by skilled artisans. In addition, Papa Paul’s serves a variety of authentic Italian delicacies and provides a wide selection of wines, beers, and beverages. Come and indulge in the flavors of Italy at Papa Paul’s, the restaurant!
Pizza
Pasta
Wine
Dessert
Best Seller Foods
Ricotta And Sausage Pizza
This mouthwatering creation brings together the perfect combination of creamy ricotta cheese, savory Italian sausage, and al dente pasta, resulting in a harmonious symphony of tastes and textures. Each bite is a delightful blend of velvety ricotta that effortlessly coats the pasta, complemented by the robust flavors of the seasoned sausage. Papa Paul’s skilled chefs take pride in using the finest ingredients and expertly crafting this dish to perfection. Served with a sprinkle of grated Parmesan and fresh herbs, the Ricotta and Sausage Pasta is a true crowd-pleaser that will leave you craving for more. Experience culinary satisfaction at its finest with this delectable pasta creation, exclusively available at Papa Paul’s, the restaurant.
Spicy Seafood Pasta
This delectable dish combines the best of both worlds, offering a delightful combination of fresh seafood and the perfect kick of spice. Papa Paul’s chefs expertly sauté a medley of succulent shrimp, tender calamari, and plump mussels in a flavorful blend of aromatic herbs and spices. The al dente pasta serves as the perfect vehicle to soak up the rich and tangy tomato-based sauce, infused with just the right amount of heat to awaken your taste buds. Each forkful is a harmonious symphony of flavors, with the sweetness of the seafood beautifully balanced by the spicy undertones. Prepared with the finest ingredients and served with a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese and a garnish of fresh herbs, Papa Paul’s Spicy Seafood Pasta is a true seafood lover’s delight. Get ready to savor the essence of the sea in every delicious bite at Papa Paul’s, the restaurant.
Papa Paul’s Brick Oven Pizza & Pasta’s Book A Table
To ensure your convenience and comfort, Papa Paul’s offers a hassle-free “Book a Table” service. Whether you’re planning a romantic dinner for two or a gathering with friends and family, reserving a table in advance guarantees your spot at cozy and welcoming restaurant, Papa Paul’s. The friendly staff at Papa Paul’s will be delighted to assist you in securing the perfect table that suits your preferences and party size. Simply give Papa Paul’s a call or make a reservation through the restaurant’s user-friendly online booking system. Papa Paul’s looks forward to hosting you at the restaurant, where exceptional food and warm hospitality await you.
Call Now!

Menus
Welcome to Fellow Osteria, where the charm of an Italian osteria meets the vibrant energy of Scottsdale. Every dish is a journey—crafted with rare heirloom wheat pastas, fresh produce, and thoughtfully sourced ingredients from Italy and beyond. Our menu celebrates the beauty of simplicity, from fresh-made pizzas and pastas to vibrant salads and satisfying sandwiches. Whether you’re here for a casual lunch, a lively dinner, or a perfectly poured cocktail, you’ll find something special waiting for you. Pair your meal with expertly curated wines or craft cocktails, and savor every moment with friends, old and new.

Experience Tempe's flavor!
Welcome to the ultimate destination for great food and craft brews!
MENU
Brace yourself for an authentic Tempe, Arizona experience at SaltFire Brewing! We’re igniting your taste buds with a fusion of local flavors and innovative twists, complemented by a diverse range of craft brews to enhance every bite. Indulge in savory delights, refreshing salads, and a culinary adventure that’ll leave you craving more!
SaltFire Brewing is a craft brewery and taproom located in Tempe, Arizona, offering a rotating selection of our own handcrafted beers alongside a delicious menu of brewpub favorites.
CONTACT
530 West Broadway Road Tempe, Arizona
(480) 921-9431
Hours of Operation:
Monday to Thursday – 11am to 1am
Friday to Saturday – 11am to 2am
Sunday – 11am to 12am

IF YOU OR SOMEONE IN YOUR PARTY HAS A FOOD ALLERGY, PLEASE CALL THE RESTAURANT TO PLACE YOUR ORDER. We rely on suppliers for accurate information. Variations may occur due to differences in suppliers and ingredient substitutions in food and food preparation. As our operations involve shared preparation/cooking areas, accidental cross contact may occur. We cannot eliminate the risk of cross contact or guarantee that any item is allergen-free. If you have a severe allergy you are at a much greater risk of a serious reaction. Decisions as to the precautions you take, or risks you may expose yourself to, should be made in consultation with your doctor.
*These items are served raw or undercooked, or contain, or may contain, raw or undercooked ingredients. Salmon Sorrento is cooked to order. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. Young children, the elderly, and individuals with certain health conditions may be at a higher risk if these foods are consumed raw or undercooked.

About the Business
Business owner information
Angelo Z.
Business Owner
Arrivederci Cucina Italiana features signature, traditional Italian dishes and also a variety of new and exciting modern Italian dishes.

Love for fine food, wine, and cooking runs deep in the blood of the Arrivederci Cucina Italiana proprietors and they look forward to serving and sharing their great Italian food, spirit, and traditions.

The proprietors of Arrivederci Cucina Italiana bring their vast experience to their first boutique new restaurant. They are both honored and humbled by the love and acceptance they have received from the Fountain Hills community from day one of this new adventure.

New Fall Specials in Surprise, AZ
Chicken & Shrimp Spaghetti Carbonara
Spaghetti tossed in a rich bacon cream sauce with eggs, parmesan, romano cheese, and diced tomatoes, topped with bacon, wood-grilled chicken and shrimp
Order Now
New! Flavors for Fall
Savor cozy and refreshing fall drinks. New! Orchard Sangria – this cocktail blends Tuaca liqueur, Bonizio white wine, apple juice, blood orange and fig. Rosemary Lemon Drop – Absolut vodka, house-made rosemary honey syrup, and fresh sweet & sour. Fig Bourbon Sour – Elijah Craig bourbon, fig, rosemary honey syrup, and a splash of sweet & sour. Spirit-free versions also available.

Savor cozy and refreshing fall drinks. New! Orchard Sangria – this cocktail blends Tuaca liqueur, Bonizio white wine, apple juice, blood orange and fig. Rosemary Lemon Drop – Absolut vodka, house-made rosemary honey syrup, and fresh sweet & sour. Fig Bourbon Sour – Elijah Craig bourbon, fig, rosemary honey syrup, and a splash of sweet & sour. Spirit-free versions also available.
Plan Your Night
Caramel Apple Cheesecake
New York-style cheesecake topped with caramel apples and toasted cinnamon pecans. Served with whipped cream and mint
Order Now
Catering Done Right
Elevate your catering with Carrabba's Catering! The perfect way to enjoy large-party portions of your favorite hand-prepared dishes for any event.
ORDER NOW

Like us on Facebook
Follow us on Instagram

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Surprise, AZ
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Jay Hyde

About the Business
Business owner information
Pat C.
Business Owner
**Please see each individual restaurants for specific hours. Breakfast (Morning Glory Cafe), lunch (The Farm Kitchen) and dinner (Quiessence) all OPEN and CLOSE at specific time and days during the week!**

Nestled beside South Mountain, the 10-acre farm demonstrates the same commitment to local sustainability as when it was established, earning azcentral.com's award for Best Local Treasure and serving as a romantic backdrop for a 2012 episode of The Bachelor. In addition to Maya's Garden of naturally grown flowers and produce, The Farm at South Mountain includes three truly garden to table restaurants for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The dinner restaurant and secret gem of Arizona, Quiessence, has been named as one of the "Most Romantic" restaurants in the country. The Farm is a destination for locals and out of town guests with its luscious pecan grove, healing arts spa, modern market boutique and succulent shop. In addition, The Farm has been named as Arizona's Best Wedding Venue, with its enchanting rustic elegance.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Can I bring my well behaved dog to the farm?
A:
Yes! I saw many people with their beautiful well behaved dogs.
JoHanna P.
2 people found this helpful
See 1 more answer
Q:
Is there anything to keep kids occupied on the property?
A:
There are lots of things for kids to see, such as the animals, fresh growing food, and lots of open space. Basically lots of open space for the mind to grow on its own!
Daniel S.

Located in Central Phoenix, Presidio Cocina Mexicana is a purveyor of home Mexican dining from the esteemed Nava family household.
Presidio Cocina Mexican Food is a new spot serving Michoacán-inspired Mexican homestyle cooking. The restaurant offers a menu of made-from-scratch dishes, most of them based on old family recipes refined by Nava's mother, Lucina, a native of the west-central Mexican state of Michoacán.
Visit the soul of Mexico at Presidio Cocina Mexicana in the heart of central Phoenix. Savor authentic central Mexican eats. We welcome you as our extended family. Presidio works as your neighborhood kitchen preparing fresh tortillas, homemade cheeses, slow cooked meats with indigenous herbs and spices.  Phoenix deserves wholesome food prepared with care and purpose.

(602) 610-9001

Phoenix, AZ 85006

Starters
Guacamole
Avocado mixed w/ roasted poblano pepper and red onion. Seasoned w/ salt, lime juice topped w/ cotija cheese.
Street Corn
Fire-grilled corn, with chipotle mayo, cotija cheese, and chile powder.
Queso Fundido
Baked Four cheese, topped w/ homemade chorizo.
Taquitos
Crispy chicken taquitos topped with guacamole, lettuce, sour cream, queso fresco, and pico de gallo.
Totopos con Chile
Tortilla chips, covered in guajillo salsa, black beans, onion, cilantro, sour cream, cotija, and lime.
Chicharrón
Crispy golden pork belly served with lime-marinated red onions and house-made pickled jalapenos.
Breakfast
Huevos Rancheros
eggs any style served on top of crispy corn tortillas, topped with Chihuahua cheese and ranchera salsa.
Presidio Tacos
eggs any style on top of homemade red chorizo, crema Mexicana, cotija cheese, onion, cilantro, and potato.
Chilaquiles
Eggs of your choice, serve with green or red chilaquiles topped with onions, cilantro, sour cream, and cotija cheese.
Chorizo Burrito
Homemade chorizo, scrambled eggs, potatoes,  and chihuahua cheese.
Tamale
Two eggs any style topped w/ salsa ranchera, your choice of red chile pork or green chile chicken tamale. Served w/ beans.
Omelet
Eggs stuffed w/ homemade chorizo and chihuahua cheese. Served with potatoes & toast.
Mains
Carne Asada Plate
8oz marbled, Ribeye Steak.  served with guacamole rice, beans, and Your choice of corn or flour tortillas.
Enchiladas
Choice of red or green enchiladas stuffed with chicken or cheese. Topped w/ sour cream and queso fresco. serve with rice and beans.
Flautas
Chicken flautas topped with guacamole, lettuce, sour cream, and queso fresco. served with beans and rice.
Cilantro Lime Salad
Romaine lettuce, grilled onions, roasted bell pepper, poblano peppers, and corn serve with black beans, topped with cilantro lime dressing. serve with grilled chicken breast, steak, or shrimp.
Burrito
A flour tortilla stuffed with rice and beans with a choice of chicken, steak, or pork.
Torta
Mexican sandwich. Your choice of protein, Prepared w/ lettuce, tomato, onion, avocado, and chipotle mayo.
Torta Ahogada
Bolio stuffed with carnitas, beans, pickled onion, avocado, doused in a spicy tomato sauce.
Chile Verde
Pork stewed in homemade chile Verde sauce topped with sour cream and cotija cheese. served with your choice of corn or flour tortillas.
Quesadilla Roja con Chicharron
Homemade chile corn tortilla, crispy pork belly, salsa tomatillo, chihuahua cheese, queso fresco, red pickled onions, and cilantro.
Chile Relleno
Poblano pepper stuffed with queso fresco, topped w/ ranchera salsa. served with rice, beans, and tortilla.
Fajitas
Choice of protein, fajitas topped with onions, red and green bell peppers, guacamole. Served with a side of rice and beans. Corn or flour tortillas.
Tacos
Carne Asada
Grilled marinated top sirloin steak, guacamole, tomatillo salsa, onions, and cilantro.
Fish
Chipotle mayo, pico de gallo, cabbage, and sour cream.
Shrimp
Grilled shrimp, pico de gallo, chipotle mayo, cheese, and cabbage.
Cochinita Pibil
Braised pork, pickled red onion, chile de Arbol salsa, cilantro.
Al Pastor
Spiced pork, guacamole, and tomatillo salsa topped with grilled onion, pineapple, and cilantro.
Pollo
Adobo chicken, lettuce, pico de gallo, guacamole, tomatillo salsa.
Chorizo
House made chorizo, onion, cilantro and tomatillo salsa.
Chicharrón
Crispy golden pork belly laid on pinto puree. Topped with red onion, cilantro, cotija, and chile de arbol salsa.

Black beans, grilled bell pepper, onion, corn, .95guacamole, and tomatillo salsa.

About The Casa Corazon Menu
The Chef and owner have put together a unique Mexican cuisine menu that includes a variety of dishes inspired by parts of Southern Mexico. All dishes are made with only the freshest produce and ingredients for an authentic flavor.  Taking inspiration from Real Mexican food, all the dishes on our menu are designed for sharing. Using incredible Mexican produce, and paired with ingredients so good they really speak for themselves.
CASA CORAZON RESTAURANT

TORTAS
Del Rey (15.00)
Our most popular Torta, this Torta is stuffed with ham, melted mozzarella, pork sirloin, breaded beef, and even a sausage-chorizo omelet! Toppings include tomato, caramelized onions, fresh avocado, and chipotle sauce.
La Reyna (15.00)
Every king needs a queen, this queen consists of ham, melted mozzarella, breaded chicken, breaded beef, and a sausage omelet. This Torta is topped with chipotle sauce, chipotle dressing, tomato, caramelized onions,
La Princesa (13.50)
This princess isn’t picky you can choose between grilled chicken breast or bistec; your choice of meat will be mixed with melted mozzarella, onions, bell peppers, and jalapenos. This torta will be topped with cheddar cheese, jalapeno dressing, tomato, lettuce and fresh avocado.
Norteña (13.50)
This torta is a fan favorite, this torta comes with your choice of either bistec or chicken breast mixed with caramelized onions and  jalapenos and it is topped with chipotle sauce, chipotle dressing, melted mozzarella, tomato, and fresh avocado.
Hawaiiana (13.50)
This tropical sandwich is made with with ham, pineapple, and pork sirloin. It is topped with melted mozzarella, queso fresco and a chipotle dressing.
Pancho Villa (13.00)
This torta is one of the bravest out there, this torta comes with ham, melted mozzarella, pork sirloin, and a chorizo-omelet. The pancho villa is topped with tomato, fresh avocado, and chipotle sauce.
Ranchera (13.00)
With your choice of either Bistec or Chicken Breast our ranchera is topped with queso fresco, fresh guacamole, and chipotle dressing.
USA (13.50)
This patriotic torta comes with ham, pineapple, melted mozzarella, breaded chicken breast, and is topped with queso fresco, and chipotle dressing.
Arizona (13.00)
This Arizona inspired torta comes with ham, melted mozzarella, pork sirloin, and breaded beef. This torta is topped with tomato, caramelized onions, jalapenos, fresh avocado, and is served with Ruffles on the side.
Cubana (13.00)
Our cubana comes with ham, melted mozzarella, and pork sirloin. This torta is topped with tomato, caramelized onions, jalapenos, fresh avocado, and is served with Ruffles on the side.
Torta de Milanesa (13.50)
This torta comes with melted mozzarella and your choice of either breaded beef or breaded chicken. This torta is topped with tomato, caramelized onions, jalapenos, fresh avocado, and is served with Ruffles on the side.
Pechuga Asada (13.00)
This torta comes with grilled chicken breast and melted mozzarella. This torta is topped with tomato, caramelized onions, jalapenos, fresh avocado, and is served with a salad.
Jamon (9.00)
Our torta de Jamon comes with ham, beans and melted mozzarella. This torta is topped with tomato, caramelized onions, jalapenos, fresh avocado, and is served with Ruffles on the side.
Pambazo (12.00)
Our Pambazo is freshly baked bread grilled in our homemade red salsa stuffed with chorizo con papa, lettuce, green salsa, queso fresco, and sour cream
TACOS
(Each order comes with 3 Tacos)
Asada (12.00)
Topped with cilantro and onions
Chorizo (11.50)
Topped with cilantro and onions
Lengua (13.00)
Topped with cilantro and onions
Cabeza (12.00)
Topped with cilantro and onions
Pollo (12.00)
Topped with pico de gallo
Alambre de res o pollo (12.00)
(Chopped beef or chicken mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and topped with melted cheese)
Hawaiianos (12.00)
(Diced grilled steak, mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, ham and pineapple, topped with melted mozzarella)
KING TACOS
King Tacos (13.50)
Our flour king tacos come with your choice of either Grilled steak or grilled chicken breast mixed with onions and jalapenos and topped with melted mozzarella. These tacos are served with rice and guacamole.
Tacos de Pescado (14.00)
Three grilled tilapia fish tacos topped with lettuce, and jalapeno dressing. These tacos are served with a salad on the side.
BURROS
All of our burritos come with refried beans, mozzarella cheese, pico de gallo, and fresh avocado inside. The following are options of meat that can added to your burrito:
Asada (12.50)
Chorizo (12.00)
Pollo (12.50)
Alambre de res o pollo (12.50)
(Chopped beef or chicken mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and melted mozzarella)
Rico Burrito Add-on: (4.00)
This add-on will top your burrito with your choice of red or green salsa, cilantro, sour cream, and onions to any burrito.
All breakfast items are served with rice, beans, queso fresco, and corn or flour tortillas
DESAYUNOS
Huevos Rancheros (13.50)
This dish comes with ham, grilled onions, and jalapenos all seasoned in our red salsa. This is served on top of two eggs and a corn tortilla!
Huevos con jamón (12.00)
Ham mixed in with scrambled eggs.
Huevos Con chorizo (12.00)
Our homemade chorizo mixed in with scrambled eggs.
Huevos con bistec (14.00)
Bistec over an egg omelet
Molletes con Huevo (13.50)
Bolillo Roll, beans, chorizo, melted mozzarella, pico de gallo, chipotle dressing, and sunny eggs.
Breakfast Burrito (8.50)
Our breakfast burrito is filled with beans, mozzarella cheese and scrambled eggs along with your choice of chorizo, sausage, or ham.
CHILAQUILES
Our chilaquiles are tortilla chips covered in our tasty green or red salsa topped with queso fresco, sour cream, and onions. The following add-ons can be added to your chilaquiles:
Huevo (15.50)
Bistec (17.50)
Pollo asado (17.50)
Bistec Encebollado (18.00)
PLATILLOS
The following plates are served with rice, refried beans, and guacamole, with your choice of corn or flour tortillas
Peluche (17.50)
This plate comes with grilled steak or grilled chicken breast, diced sausage, ham, bacon, jalapenos, bell peppers, onions and pineapple.
Bistec Asado (16.50)
This plate comes with our tasty grilled Bistec!
Bistec Encebollado (16.50)
The bistec encebollado comes with grilled bistec mixed with caramelized onions, and jalapenos!
Milanesa (16.50)
One of our most popular plates comes with your choice of either breaded beef or breaded chicken breast!
Pechuga Asada (16.50)
Our pechuga asada plate is grilled chicken breast, on a bed of grilled onions and jalapenos.
Alambre (16.50)
This plate comes with your choice of chopped beef or chicken mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and mozzarella cheese on top.
·····················
Filete de Pescado (17.00)
This is our grilled fish fillet, this is served with rice and a fresh salad.
Platillo con Nopales (19.50)
This plate comes equipped with grilled beef or grilled chicken breast or chorizo and our traditional nopales asados, queso fresco, and fresh guacamole. This plate can come with either corn or flour tortillas.
ENCHILADAS
Mix and match a sauce with either chicken or cheese.
Cheese - (13.50)
Salsa Verde
Chicken - (16.50)
Cheese - (13.50)
Cheese - (13.50)
Salsa Roja
Chicken - (16.50)
Cheese - (13.50)
QUESADILLAS DE MAIZ (Estilo del Rey)
These are our famous 12 inch, homemade corn quesadillas! These quesadillas are filled with mozzarella cheese and green salsa. You can also add flavor to your quesadilla buy adding the Estilo Del Rey, this option tops your quesadilla with more green salsa along with queso fresco, onions, cilantro, and sour cream. The following options are what your quesadilla can be filled with.
Alambre de Camaron (16.50)
(Grilled shrimp with bell peppers, onions, bacon and melted cheese)
Chicharron Prensado (16.50)
Asada (16.00)
Bistec Encebollado (16.00)

Bistec (16.00)
Carne Deshebrada (15.50)
Pechuga de pollo (16.00)
Tinga de Pollo (16.00)
Alambre de Res o Pollo (16.00)
(Chopped beef or chicken mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and topped with melted cheese)
Chorizo con Papa (14.50)
Hongos (14.50)
Nopales Asados (15.00)
QUESADILLAS DE HARINA
Our Quesadillas de Harina are 12” long flour tortillas folded in half and filled with mozzarella cheese, refried beans, pico de gallo, avocado, and your choice of the following meats:
Asada (13.50)
Chorizo (13.00)
Pollo (13.50)
Alambre de res o pollo (13.50)
(Chopped beef or chicken mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and melted mozzarella)
HUARACHES
All of our homemade huaraches come with beans, green salsa, onions, and queso fresco. The following are add-on options for your huarache:
Alambre de Camaron (17.50)
(Grilled shrimp mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and melted mozzarella)
Chicharron Prensado (17.50)
Asada (16.50)
Bistec Encebollado (16.50)
(Grilled steak mixed with onions and jalapenos)
Bistec (16.50)
Carne Deshebrada (16.50)
Pechuga de pollo (16.50)
Tinga de Pollo (16.50)
Alambre de res o pollo (16.50)
(Grilled steak or chicken mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, topped with melted cheese)
Chorizo con papa (15.50)
Hongos (15.50)
Nopales Asados (15.50)
MARISCOS
Coctel de Camaron (18.00)
Cooked shrimp along with chopped onions, cilantro, and avocado in our homemade Coctel juice.
Super-Coctel (21.00)
Cooked shrimp along with chopped onions, cilantro, diced cucumber, and fresh avocado in our homemade Coctel juice.
Coctel de Camaron Estilo DF (21.00)
Cooked shrimp with cilantro, chopped onions, cucumber, fresh avocado, lime juice, olive oil, and our homemade Coctel juice.
Plato de Alambre de Camarón (18.50)
This plate comes with grilled shrimp mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and is topped with melted mozzarella. This dish comes with rice, beans, guacamole, and corn or flour tortillas.
Tacos de Alambre de Camarón (13.50)
These tacos come with grilled shrimp mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and is topped with melted mozzarella. These tacos are served with a salad.
Tacos de Camarón (13.00)
These tacos come with grilled shrimp, they are topped with lettuce and chipotle dressing.
Burro de Camarón (14.00)
Our burro de camaron comes with grilled shrimp lettuce, rice, fresh avocado, mozzarella cheese, and chipotle dressing.
Burro de Alambre de Camarón (14.00)
This burro comes with grilled shrimp mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, refried beans, mozzarella cheese and fresh avocado.
Quesadilla Alambre de Camarón (14.00)
This flour quesadilla comes with grilled shrimp mixed with bell peppers, onions, bacon, and mozzarella cheese. It is filled with refried beans and fresh avocado.
Quesadilla de Camaron (14.00)
Our flour quesadilla de camaron comes with grilled shrimp, lettuce, rice, fresh avocado, mozzarella cheese, and chipotle dressing.
VEGETARIAN
Tacos Azteca (14.50)
Two tacos filled with our traditional nopales asados topped with queso fresco and guacamole. This dish is served with refried beans on the side.
Vegetarian Tacos (13.00)
This order of vegetarian tacos will get you two tacos filled with corn, bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and melted mozzarella.
Mushroom king Tacos (12.50)
Our mushroom king tacos come with mushrooms, onions, jalapenos, and melted mozzarella on top.
Torta de Queso Fresco (11.00)
This torta is filled with queso fresco, refried beans, lettuce, tomato, caramelized onions, jalapeno, and fresh avocado. This torta comes with Ruffles on the side.
Burro Vegetariano (12.00)
Our vegetarian burrito is stuffed with grilled mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, mozzarella cheese, corn, fresh avocado, and chipotle dressing.
Quesadilla Vegetariana (12.00)
This vegetarian quesadilla consists of grilled mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, corn, fresh avocado, melted mozzarella, and chipotle dressing.
APPETIZERS
Tostada de Ceviche (9.00)
This is one of our most popular appetizers. This tostada comes with our freshly made shrimp-ceviche and is topped with fresh avocado.
Tostada de Tinga (7.00)
This tostada comes with our homemade chicken tinga and beans topped with lettuce, green salsa, queso fresco, and sour cream.
Queso Fundido (11.50)
Our cheese fondue is melted mozzarella cheese with four flour tortillas. It can be topped with Chorizo, Mushrooms, or Jalapenos.
Quesadilla de Queso (10.00)
Our quesadilla de queso is a 12 inch flour tortilla filled with mozzarella cheese.
Guacamole Dip (11.50)
Another one of our most popular appetizers is our guacamole dip. It comes with our freshly made guacamole and some crunchy fresh chips.
SALADS
Regular (10.50)
Our regular salad comes with fresh lettuce, tomato, croutons, mushrooms, and fresh avocado.
Grilled Chicken (15.00)
This salad contains all the same contents as the regular salad with an addition of grilled chicken.
Grilled Shrimp (16.00)
This salad contains all the same contents as the regular salad with an addition of grilled shrimp.
BURGERS
Hawaiiana (13.00)
Our Hawaiiana hamburger comes with a homemade beef patty, ham, cheddar cheese, pineapple, queso fresco and is topped with lettuce, tomato, and chipotle dressing.
Mexicana (13.00)
The Mexicana comes with our homemade beef patty, chorizo, grilled onions and jalapenos and is topped with cheddar cheese lettuce, tomato, fresh avocado, and chipotle dressing.
La Frances (13.00)
Our french hamburger comes with our homemade beef patty, bacon, and cheddar cheese. This burger is topped with lettuce, tomato, and chipotle dressing.
KID'S MENU
Hamburger (8.50)
A plain burger with just a beef patty
Cheeseburger (9.50)
A burger with a beef patty and cheddar cheese
Sincronizada (8.50)
Our sincronizada comes with ham and melted mozzarella in between two flour tortillas. This is served with rice and beans
Mini Quesadilla (8.00)
This quesadilla comes with mozzarella cheese and either asada or chicken breast. This plate will be served with rice and beans
Huevos Con Jamón (8.50)
This plate comes with scrambled eggs mixed with ham. This is served with rice and beans.
Plato de Milanesa (9.00)
This plate comes with either breaded beef or breaded chicken breast and is served with rice and beans.
Plato de asada o Pollo (9.50)
This plate comes with either asada or grilled chicken breast and is served with rice and beans.
SPECIALTY DRINKS
Vampiro (10.00)
Our vampiro comes with Orange juice, carrot juice, celery, and beet
Bomba con jugo (10.00)
Our bomba con jugo comes with orange juice, granola, pineapple, cantaloupe, mango, papaya, strawberry, and banana
Bomba con Leche (10.00)
Our bomba con leche comes with milk, granola, sugar, cantaloupe, mango, papaya, strawberry, and banana
La Nina Fresa (8.50)
The Nina Fresa comes with sugar, strawberry, mango, and pineapple
Verde Passion (8.50)
Our verde passion is a drink that has sugar, cucumber, celery, and lime juice
Michelada con Camaron (17.50)
La Exotica (8.50)
La exotica comes with sugar, mango and orange juice
Mangonada (10.50)
Our popular mangonadas come equipped with fresh mango, orange juice, lime juice, Tajin, chamoy, and are topped with a tamarindo stick.
Rica Boricua (8.50)
Our Rica Boricua comes with sugar, strawberry, and watermelon
MIXED DRINKS (Without alcohol)
King margarita (9.00)
Strawberry Margarita
Regular Margarita (9.00)

Michelada (9.50)

Alcohol-free beer
FRESHLY SQUEEZED (Jugos)

Orange juice, pineapple, nopales, lemon, celery, sugar, and iced water
OTHERS

Homemade rice water

Homemade hibiscus water

Freshly brewed iced tea

love. At Tía Carmen, we pay homage to the beauty of the Southwest’s stories, land, and farmers through
the dining experience. We invite you to celebrate with us.
– Chef Angelo Sosa

Cocktails, Wine, and Beer
Tia Carmen's cocktail program is overseen by Mitchel O. Bushell (formerly of Gwen, Gran Blanco and Accomplice), focusing heavily on local herbs and spices alongside local producers of small and large batched spirits and a broad program of agave spirits. The wine program is overseen by Eduardo Dingler (formerly of Morimoto Restaurant Group) and leans heavily on representation from Mexico's Valle de Guadalupe as well as wines from the West Coast and emerging European producers.

Find Your New Favorite Dish at Our Family Restaurant in Maricopa
Here at Plaza Bonita Family Mexican Restaurant, we’re proud to serve fresh, authentic Mexican cuisine in Maricopa, AZ. We’re a family restaurant that loves serving delicious food in a welcoming atmosphere; here, the food is always hot, and you’re surrounded by great company. Whether it’s your first visit or you’re a regular customer, you’ll have the same attentive service every time.
﻿
What You’ll Find on Our Menu:
Fajitas
Burritos
Enchiladas

Button
Button
Button
Button
Button
Button
Try Our Diverse, Flavorful Menu
Serving delicious, made-to-order Mexican dishes is our specialty. We’ve taken authentic recipes and made them our own to give you a unique experience. Making every dish with fresh, quality ingredients is a fundamental aspect of our process. We see the integrity of the food we serve as a vital part of ensuring that you have a great dining experience.
﻿
Celebrate Taco Tuesday With Us
The daily lunch specials at our family restaurant allow you to get a quick bite to eat that doesn’t skimp on flavor. With items like our fan-favorite ground beef tacos for just $0.99 or a ground beef taco plate served with rice and beans for $7, we promise you won’t leave hungry. When you come to Plaza Bonita Family Mexican Restaurant, you’ll get a great meal that doesn’t cost a fortune.
A Great Experience That Will Never Disappoint
Our Mexican restaurant values consistency in everything we do, including everything from the quality of our food to our customer service. With a plethora of choices and attentive service from our waitstaff, it’s our mission to ensure your first visit isn’t your last. Complete customer satisfaction is our goal, and you’ll see that dedication in every aspect of your experience.

About us
Fresh, honest, delicious
At Las Gloria's Grill, we offer meals of excellent quality and invite you to try our delicious food. We pride ourselves on serving our customer's delicious genuine dishes. Come by and eats delicious Mexican food. Grab a drink. But most of all, relax! We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your continued to be part of us.

Reviews
Review by - Yelp
Tina:
Amazing food and customer service. The decor is very nice and it certainly felt relaxing. I do plan to come back some day if I'm ever in this area again. Give them a try.
Review by - Yelp
Daniel P:
I will come here anytime I'm in Pheonix. The food simply warms your soul. The Jamaica was refreshing and flavorful as was the red salsa and bean dip with chips that was brought to our table. I ordered the tilapia fish tacos with a side of guacamole and was ultimately delighted. Everything tasted fresh and all of the salsas were delicious. I'm looking forward to the next meal at Las Gloria's!
Review by - Yelp
Betty D:
We love Las Gloria's and everyone we introduce to it!! Some of the best authentic Mexican Food and the prices are so good
Review by - Yelp
Tyler C:
Oh my goodness gracious golly gosh!!!! This places fajitas are TO DIE FOR! Or am I already dead because this food is HEAVEN!!! The fajitas are divine and truly will knock your socks off and you will probably lose your job soon because all you can think about is coming back to this place for more chicken fajitas!! Woooooooooohoooooooooo 69/10 also service is lovely quick and staff is soooo attentive & sweet! LAS GLORIAS GRILL IS LIFE

TEQUILA
blanco
Blanco tequila is aged for less than two months. It is the
purest expression of agave and delivers a smooth finish.
reposado
Reposado tequila is aged in oak barrels for two to twelve
months, giving it its gold hue. This tequila is
well-balanced and provides a flavorful expression
extra añejo
Extra Añejo tequila is aged in oak barrels for at least
three years and is the crown jewel of tequila expressions.
Extra Añejo tequilas, like fine wines or whiskey, should be
enjoyed and appreciated slowly through sipping.
CRISTALINO TEQUILA
Cristalino Tequila is barrel-aged tequila that has been filtered
through charcoal. This removes the color and woody notes
that are picked up from the barrel and results in a complex
añejo tequila with the bright notes of a blanco
HERRADURA ULTRA
19
TEQUILA FLIGHT
1 oz pour of each premium expression served with
a housemade sangrita palate cleanser
extra añejo flight
Asombroso, Don Julio 1942, Código
55
MEZCAL
While tequila is made only from blue agave, mezcal is made
with a variety of agave plants. Its signature smoky flavor
comes from cooking the agave in pits in the ground lined
with lava rocks before being distilled in clay pots.

sauce. Served with a side of borracho black beans
add avocado +3
17
CHILE VERDE EGGS & JALAPEÑO CORNBREAD*
cazuela of our chile verde pork topped with melted cheese,
crema, 2 eggs, avocado, tequila-pickled jalapeño, cilantro,
guajillo chile & jalapeño cornbread on the side
19
CHORIZO & POTATO SCRAMBLE
chorizo, red potatoes, scallions, spinach, tomatoes,
scrambled eggs with queso fresco & smoky crema
21
CRAB & SHRIMP CAKES ‘BENEDICTO’*
crispy fried crab & shrimp cakes, poached eggs, guajillo
chile, chipotle-orange hollandaise, crispy bacon, avocado
& refried black beans
32
HUEVOS RANCHEROS*
3 eggs over easy, corn tortillas, refried black beans, roasted
poblano chiles, cotija cheese, queso fresco & avocado

grilled 4oz wagyu beef, 2 fried eggs, pico de gallo,
avocado & grilled jalapeño toreado
Choice of: borracho black beans & corn tortillas or
breakfast potatoes with caramelized onions
29

onion, cherry tomatoes, squash, kale, salsa verde, almonds
& avocado. Served with a fried egg* or chipotle-garlic seitan
18

oregano, huevos Mexicanos, cheese, refried black beans,
guajillo chile salsa, pico de gallo & avocado
36

fried breakfast potatoes, onion, melted cheese, crema,

scallions & pico de gallo
add 3 eggs over easy* +2

HOME OF THE DELICIOUS MEXICAN FOOD
When it comes to good food, Chido Mx Mexican cuisine offers a delightful array of flavors and dishes. From savory tacos and flavorful salsas to hearty enchiladas and refreshing drinks, Our Mexican Food is known for its vibrant and diverse culinary traditions. Whether you’re craving the zesty heat of a chili-infused dish or the comforting richness of slow-cooked meats, Our Mexican cuisine is sure to satisfy your appetite for good food.

MEXICAN CATERING
Mexican catering services offer a rich and flavorful experience, providing a wide variety of traditional dishes such as tacos, enchiladas, burritos, and tortas. With colorful and festive presentations, Mexican catering adds a vibrant touch to any event, delighting guests with authentic flavors and heartfelt hospitality. From casual gatherings to formal celebrations, Mexican catering can bring a taste of Mexico to the table, creating a memorable dining experience for all.
Order Now
AGUAS FRESCAS         REFRESHING DRINKS
Aguas Frescas
are a variety of refreshing Mexican beverages made from fruits, cereals, flowers, or seeds blended with sugar and water. Popular flavors include watermelon, mango, horchata, hibiscus, cucumber, tamarind, blueberry mojito and watermelon. These drinks are perfect for quenching thirst on hot days and are a staple of Mexican street food culture.
Order Now
CHILAQUILES PLATE
Chilaquiles are a traditional Mexican dish made with fried corn tortillas cut into quarters and cooked in a green or red salsa. The crispy tortillas are then topped with crema, cheese, onion, and sometimes served with a side of beans or eggs. It’s a flavorful and comforting dish often enjoyed for breakfast or brunch.
Order Now
Birria de Res

https://www.orderchidomxarizona.com/
Birria de Res
Our Birria de res is a traditional Mexican dish, specifically a stew made from beef meat, typically goat or mutton. The meat is marinated in a blend of savory and spicy chili-based adobo sauce, then slow-cooked until tender. This flavorful dish is often served with warm tortillas and a side of consomé for dipping. It’s a popular dish for celebrations and gatherings, known for its rich and aromatic flavors. Many people enjoy birria de res for its comforting and hearty appeal. If you haven’t tried it yet, it’s definitely worth exploring this delicious and authentic Mexican delicacy.

Birria de Res By Pound
Beef birria is a traditional Mexican dish consisting of beef marinated and slowly cooked in a broth seasoned with various chilis and spices. It is usually served with onions, cilantro, lime, and tortillas, and is popular at festive events and celebrations. The rich combination of flavors and the tender texture of the meat make beef birria a highly appreciated dish in Mexican cuisine.

Menu
Lunch Specials
Tuesday-Friday 10:00am to 2:00pm *INCLUDES COMBO & 24oz. FOUNTAIN DRINK
1# Red or Green Chile burrito
Red or Green chile burrito served with rice, beans, and 24oz. fountain drink.
3# Two tostadas (Chicken or beef)
Two delicious corn tortilla tostadas with your choice of chicken or shredded beef topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream. Rice, beans, and a 24oz. fountain drink included.
#5 Two hard shell tacos (Beef)
Two shredded beef hard shell tacos with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and includes rice, beans, and a 24oz. fountain drink.
#2 Three beef rolled tacos
Three corn tortilla rolled with delicious, shredded beef, includes a side of beans, rice and a 24oz. fountain drink and topped with guacamole, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream.
#4 Three beef mini chimichangas
Three delicious, shredded beef crunchy mini chimis topped with guacamole, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream. Also includes rice & beans and a 24oz. fountain drink.
#6 Two (Chicken, beef or cheese) enchiladas
Two chicken, beef, or cheese enchiladas in red or green Chile with a garnish of lettuce and tomatoes. Includes rice, beans and a 24oz. fountain drink.
Combinations
ALL COMBOS INCLUDE RICE, BEANS, AND 24oz. FOUNTAIN DRINK
#1 Red or Greeen chile burrito
Includes rice, beans, a garnish of lettuce & tomatoes and 24oz. fountain drink.
#2 Three beef rolled tacos
Three corn tortilla rolled with delicious, shredded beef, includes a side of beans, rice and a 24oz. fountain drink and topped with guacamole, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream.
#3 Two tostadas (Chicken or beef)
Topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream. Includes rice, beans, and 24oz. fountain drink.
#4 Four beef mini chimis

#5 Two beef hard shell tacos
Lettuce, tomatoes, cheese. Includes rice, beans, and 24oz. fountain drink.

Via’s Veggie Bliss
Angelo & Stella DeLosantos established Via DeLosantos on July 4, 1986!
Angelo & Stella took pride in their business in every aspect and Angelo was especially proud of his creativity
when it came to trying new things and putting twists on classic Mexican dishes. He took much pride in his
veggie-inspired dishes. The selections below were some of his best veggie creations together.

About the Business
Taste the Tradition, Feel the Love. For 24 years we have been serving the Valley sharing Tortas (Mexican sandwiches) with homemade bread and meats that are marinated and cooked for over 16 hours. 
Our delicious fresh fruit drinks made when you order. It's the simplicity that makes this restaurant stand out. Tortas Manantial was created in 2000 by a couple Luz and Marco Barbosa originally from Tepic Nayarit.
Mr Marco worked in construction and for lunch Mrs Luz made him tortas 
Marco shared his lunch with his coworkers and realized that his coworkers  left their lunches to eat those tortas 
Now you are going to try the tortas that Marco and his coworkers enjoyed during their lunch break.

If you liked it, share a torta with your friend. Thanks for being here. Enjoy
…

The History of El Encanto
- AWARDS -
The original El Encanto (The Enchanted)
Restaurant and Cantina is located in the center • Best Mexican, Reader’s Choice, North Valley Magazine
of Cave Creek. In 1989, Bill Nelson purchased • #1 Choice for Mexican Food, Phoenix Magazine
a vacant building, and with a love of Mexico
• “Best Margaritas in the Valley”, New Times
and Mexican food, opened the first El Encanto.
• “Like a trip to Mexico without the long drive”, Dine Out
He brought a chef he’d known for twenty years
from Mexico. Using the finest and freshest Phoenix, Where to Eat From Chic to Unique, Pamela
ingredients, they put together an authentic
Schwartz
menu that people quickly called “the best
• Most Romantic, Good Morning Arizona
Mexican food in the Valley.” Also having a love
of old Mexican architecture, Bill made many • Top 12 Outdoor Eateries, Desert Living Magazine
trips across the border, bringing back ideas and
• “Best Place to pop the question”, New Times
materials to incorporate into El Encanto. The
• “Perfect spot for family dining”, Gocitykids.com
patio and restaurant’s style aim to bring the
look and feel of Mexico to your dining • “As if you’re in Old Mexico”, Michael DeMaria,
experience. • The Flavors of Phoenix, Fox 10 “Arizona Morning”
El Encanto became a favorite for its enchanting • Top Business, Today’s Arizona Woman
setting and great food. The business grew
• The Best Restaurants with waterfront views in Phoenix
rapidly and eventually needed a more
2024, azcentral.com
developed and improved infrastructure.
In 2003, Bill implored his eldest daughter Christine, a lawyer working in DC at the time, to come back to run the
business. Christine developed new operating systems to increase consistency in the quality of food and service and
built a management team to implement them. The focus is always on improving consistency and enhancing the
level of service.
In 2005, the restaurant had grown to such a success that Bill and Christine decided it was time to expand.
The second location, El Encanto Dos, opened in January of 2006. Dos sits on a large piece of property in Desert
Hills and has an organic garden complete with a free-range chicken coup, waterfalls and a pond. El Encanto de la
Fuente (of the fountain) opened in Fountain Hills in 2009. All of the El Encanto restaurants serve the same great
food in authentic Mexican atmospheres.
Though we lost Bill in 2010, his spirit lives on in everything we do at El Encanto. Christine (and the amazing
family of El Encanto employees) continue to run the business.
Thank you for joining us at El Encanto today. We hope your experience at El Encanto is wonderful and that you’ll
come to share our love of Mexican food and culture.
All of our food is prepared from scratch in our kitchens by the
amazing El Encanto team, including our chicken. We roast our
chicken breasts on the bone – leaving it tender and juicy. This
requires us to hand pull the chicken and despite our best efforts, there
may be a small bone left behind. This is a small price to pay for the
most delicious Pollo Fundido around .
