Family owned and operated
See what our amazing customers are saying about us !
Google review of Maya's Kitchen by Haydee Nora
★★★★★ "Wow, it was delicious! Best Indian food I've ever tasted,  I highly recommend this place.  Don't be discouraged about the lack of reviews. This place just opened a couple of months ago."
Google review of Maya's Kitchen by Ly Nguyen
★★★★★ "The best Indian restaurant in phoenix! Super authentic and delicious. I got the lamb korma and it was the best lamb korma I’ve ever had. My friends got other things on the menu and they were all delicious. The naan is the MUST. I would 1000% come back"
Google review of Maya's Kitchen by Doug Clouse
★★★★★ "Super authentic fresh food. It feels like you’re getting a home cooked meal. It’s run by a husband and wife duo and they adult children. They formerly only did catered meals . Thankfully they have opened this totally unpretentious restaurant.
The spices were not overpowering, which allows you to get the full flavor. We.  shall return . Now it’s up to you."
2948 E Bell Rd. Phoenix AZ 85032

$26.00
Long grain basmati rice, shrimp, aromatic spices.
Lamb Biryani
$24.00
Boneless lamb meat marinated in a rich delicious mixed of spices, yogurt, fragrant basmati rice, and a blend of aromatic spice.

$16.00

$18.00

$18.00
Momos
6 pieces of momos dumplings served with chutneys.
Steam Style Momo
Momos are a type of steamed filled dumpling in Tibetan and Nepali cuisine that is also popular in neighbouring Bhutan, Bangladesh, and India.
Manchurian Style Momo
Shallow-fried momos tossed in Manchurian sauce.
Afghani Style Momo
Tossed shallow-fried momos in nacho cheese & butter sauce.
Tandoori Style Momo
Schezwan Style Momo
Dessert
Gulab Jamun
$8.00/2 Pieces
Gulab jamun is a classic Indian sweet made with milk solids, sugar, rose water & cardamom powder.
Ras Malai
$10.00
Ras malai consists of soft, flattened balls of Indian cottage cheese. This has a rich and aromatic taste, due to the blend of ingredients like saffron, cardamom, and nuts.
Kulfi
$10.00
Kulfi is a popular frozen dairy dessert originating from India, often described as a denser, creamier version of ice cream. It's known for its rich, smooth texture and is traditionally made with milk, sugar, and flavorings like cardamom, saffron, or nuts | Choice of Mango, Malai, or Pistachio
Mango Mastani
$10.00
Pune's popular mango drink is made with real mango and butter pecan ice cream, and milk. Loaded with truity fruity, cherry, pineapple syrup, and mango syrup.
Mawa Carrot Halwa
$10.00
Simple and popular North Indian dessert recipe made with carrots, milk, milk solids, and dry fruits.

About the Business
What our customers are saying: 
This is a new restaurant, and the food was fabulous!
I had the swordfish meal and my partner had a chicken dish. The flavors are very distinct, and unique.

What makes it different is the quality of food. Anji's uses unprocessed REAL food! I eat gluten free, and was delighted that there were so many health conscious options. I also loved that is a "farm to table" restaurant, supporting local farmers. What a little jewel in the middle of Cave Creek!
The staff was super friendly, and we for sure will go back.
I really recommend giving this place a try.

DOWNLOAD DINE-IN MENU
Many items are vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free, many others can be easily modified. Tofu can be substitude for most chicken and fishes. Please ask your server. Olives may contain pits.
*These items may be cooked to order and may contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercook meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Pita Jungle is pleased to offer a variety of gluten-free and vegetarian/vegan options. We are however not a gluten-free/vegetarian/vegan restaurant and cannot guarantee that cross contamination will never occur. Please notify your server if you have any food allergy or specific dietary needs. We will do our best to accommodate them.
General Information: We are using gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, soy, and wheat). Therefore, we cannot guarantee that cross contamination never occurs. Menu items may vary by location.
We do our utmost to keep the information on our website up to date, however, due to seasonality and circumstances beyond our control ingredient changes or substitutions may occur.
Availability subject to change.
BEER, WINE & COCKTAILS
Tapas & Happy Hour
Boutique wines, local draughts, crafted cocktails
Libations that perfectly pairs with our food…. enjoy responsibly
SEE OUR SELECTION
SEASONAL KITCHEN CRAFTS
Keto, Paleo & Gluten-Free Go Mediterranean
At the turn of every season, we source out seasonal, and local ingredients as much as possible, to give you vibrant and fresh menu selections that are on the forefront of culinary relevance. Our medium to express cutting edge culinary options using superior seasonal ingredients. As much as possible we try to use organic, grass-fed, non-GMO, antibiotic free ingredients.

Chaat and Curry Point​
Our Menu.
Explore the rich and vibrant flavors of India with our 100% vegetarian menu. From street-style chaats to hearty curries, fresh breads, and satisfying meal combos — every dish is made fresh with love and authentic ingredients.
Authentic Vegetarian Indian Cuisine in Gilbert
Best Chaat and Curries
Loved by Everyone​
From families and foodies to kids and seniors, everyone finds something to love on our menu. Our commitment to fresh ingredients, authentic flavors, and heartfelt service keeps our guests coming back for more. It’s not just a meal — it’s an experience that’s truly loved by all. Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Chad H:
Our first time visiting and we were pleasantly surprised.  The food is outstanding!!  Very flavorful and large portions (we now have lunch for tomorrow).  Large menu with lots of variety, including delicious rice pudding.  No complaints and we will definitely be back often...
Review by - Google
five star review by
Jon B:
I recently had the pleasure of dining at Tap n Tikka, an Indian restaurant that blew me away with its delicious cuisine and fantastic drinks. From start to finish, the experience was absolutely fantastic. To begin with, the samosas were a standout appetizer...
Review by - Google
five star review by
Jimmy A:
Great experience dinning here. Lots of beers on tab. Loved chilli shrimp. And chicken Manchurian. The goat masala was so good. Takes me back to india as the flavor is the same as india.  Garlic naan was good too.  Definitely recommend and I will be back with the rest of my gang
Review by - Google
five star review by
Amy Q:
We were stunned to find such incredibly authentic Indian Cuisine so close to home! Without exaggeration, the best meal out we've had in a very long time and possibly the best Indian food ever. Tap N Tikka is a gem.

The Samosas
View Menu

Our Story
Taste that has a tale
The story of its popularity in India is quite interesting. Historical texts show that Biryani has been an
              integral part of Hyderabadi cuisine for more than 400 years!
              It is believed to have come to India from Persia.
              Hyderabadi Dum Biryani was the most important dish from royal kitchens of Nawabs. It came to India after
              Emperor Aurangzeb appointed Nizam-Ul-Mulk as the new ruler of Hyderabad.
              The Mughals conquered Hyderabad around the 1630s.
              They ruled the city since then. In due course, Mughlai culinary traditions mixed with local traditions to
              eventually make Hyderabadi cuisine.
              Around 1857, the Mughal Empire started declining in Delhi. Around this time, Hyderabad emerged as the
              center of South Asian culture. This increased several delicious innovations of Hyderabadi Biryani.

About us
Jay Hind Indian Cuisine would be happy to serve you the best Indian food in Chandler, AZ and would be grateful to see you enjoying our food, freshly made by our expert chefs. It is a great place to enjoy a meal with friends and loved ones. So, when would you like to come? Come today at Jay Hind Indian Cuisine in Chandler, AZ and savor the authentic Indian cuisine with real Indian flavor!

Many items are vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free, many others can be easily modified. Tofu can be substitude for most chicken and fishes. Please ask your server. Olives may contain pits.
*These items may be cooked to order and may contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercook meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Pita Jungle is pleased to offer a variety of gluten-free and vegetarian/vegan options. We are however not a gluten-free/vegetarian/vegan restaurant and cannot guarantee that cross contamination will never occur. Please notify your server if you have any food allergy or specific dietary needs. We will do our best to accommodate them.
General Information: We are using gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, soy, and wheat). Therefore, we cannot guarantee that cross contamination never occurs. Menu items may vary by location.
We do our utmost to keep the information on our website up to date, however, due to seasonality and circumstances beyond our control ingredient changes or substitutions may occur.
Availability subject to change.
BEER, WINE & COCKTAILS

SEE OUR SELECTION
SEASONAL KITCHEN CRAFTS
Keto, Paleo & Gluten-Free Go Mediterranean
At the turn of every season, we source out seasonal, and local ingredients as much as possible, to give you vibrant and fresh menu selections that are on the forefront of culinary relevance. Our medium to express cutting edge culinary options using superior seasonal ingredients. As much as possible we try to use organic, grass-fed, non-GMO, antibiotic free ingredients.

About the Business
Get grubbin' on some downright delicious Indian food. Tikka Shack serves up the best in Indian cuisine, while slinging samosas in a friendly, casual atmosphere. Both the dining environment and the menu have been carefully curated to captivate our guests with the aromatic flavors of India through the artful creation of blended spices. Our lineup of menu offerings provides a variety of traditional Indian dishes, as well as simplified pairings, offering options for both the newbie foodie and the curry connoisseur.

$15

Quasi-dilla

$6

$8
Chick'n Nugg Bites
Soy chick'n nuggets over a bed of thyme fries with your choice of house-made ranch, BBQ, or sweet tangerine.  Add a side of your choice!
$11
Gluten free
NOODLE BOWLS
Damn Dan Noodle
A rich, dark, organic tamari, spicy soy and peanut sauce with beefy crumbles, caramelized onions, sauteed mushrooms, and cabbage over noodles.  Finished with crunchy peanuts, scallions, and a drizzle of spicy house garlic chile oil. (contains nuts)
$15
Golden Curry
Organic coconut and maple mild madras curry sauce with organic sprouted tofu, sauteed mushrooms, cabbage, carrots, and broccoli over noodles.
$15
Firecracker Red Curry
SPICY red curry with fried seitan, sauteed mushrooms, cabbage, carrots, broccoli, and spicy house garlic chile oil over noodles.
$15
My Green Tangerine
Tangy tangerine-orange glaze with crispy chick'n and broccoli over noodles.
$15
Cheezy Broccoli Cheddar Noodles
The name pretty much says it! Our homemade easy cheeze and crispy fried soy chicken over noodles, some broccoli trees, and a drizzle of our increasingly more famous house made chili crunch.
$15
GREENS + GARDEN BURRITOS
We use organic produce in our salad mix whenever nature provides it. Make it a garden burrito and have it wrapped in a flour tortilla for a buck! Deliciously gluten free when you get your greens in a bowl!

$11

$11

$12
Ranchero
BBQ “wings” with fresh greens and carrots tossed in our house-made ranch dressing and crunchy tortilla strips.
$11

Po boys, sammies and burgers that you hold in your hands and stuff in your face. Substitute organic sprouted Ezekiel bread or gluten free bread for a buck. Don’t forget to add a side.

DOWNLOAD DINE-IN MENU
Many items are vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free, many others can be easily modified. Tofu can be substitude for most chicken and fishes. Please ask your server. Olives may contain pits.
*These items may be cooked to order and may contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercook meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Pita Jungle is pleased to offer a variety of gluten-free and vegetarian/vegan options. We are however not a gluten-free/vegetarian/vegan restaurant and cannot guarantee that cross contamination will never occur. Please notify your server if you have any food allergy or specific dietary needs. We will do our best to accommodate them.
General Information: We are using gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, soy, and wheat). Therefore, we cannot guarantee that cross contamination never occurs. Menu items may vary by location.
We do our utmost to keep the information on our website up to date, however, due to seasonality and circumstances beyond our control ingredient changes or substitutions may occur.
Availability subject to change.
BEER, WINE & COCKTAILS
Tapas & Happy Hour
Boutique wines, local draughts, crafted cocktails
Libations that perfectly pairs with our food…. enjoy responsibly
SEE OUR SELECTION
SEASONAL KITCHEN CRAFTS
Keto, Paleo & Gluten-Free Go Mediterranean
At the turn of every season, we source out seasonal, and local ingredients as much as possible, to give you vibrant and fresh menu selections that are on the forefront of culinary relevance. Our medium to express cutting edge culinary options using superior seasonal ingredients. As much as possible we try to use organic, grass-fed, non-GMO, antibiotic free ingredients.
SEE OUR SELECTION

Green Menu
MENU
download menu pdf
100% Vegan Menu
BITES
Wings
Our award-winning wings with veggies and a side of house-made ranch.  Buffalo, espresso bbq sauce or honey jalapeno.
$8.50
Gluten free
Big Easy Cheezy Nachos
Crunchy corn chips smothered in meaty taco crumbles, house-made easy cheezy sauce, grilled onions, and pickled jalapenos with a side of spicy salsa.
$15
Gluten free
Quasi-dilla
Our grilled mock chick'n with melted cheddar cheeze, caramelized onions and a smokey aioli in a crispy flour tortilla.  (cheese only quesadilla for $8)
$13
West Coast Fries
Our classic thyme fries steady laced with melted cheddar, grilled onions, and 1000 island sauce.  Feel free to add stuff.
$8.50
Gluten free
East Coast Fries
Our classic thyme fries pelted with melted cheddar, grilled onions, ranch, and spicy buffalo sauce.  Feel free to add stuff.
$8.50
Gluten free
Easy Cheezy Fries
Our crispy thyme fries adorned with a side of melted easy cheezy sauce.  Feel free to add stuff.
$7.25
Gluten free
Crab Puffs
A house favorite: crispy hand-folded rangoon of "crab", cream cheese, and secret spices with house-made dipping sauce.
$6.50
Egg-less Rolls
Crisp wontons stuffed with cabbage, carrots, and five spice with house-made dipping sauce.
$6
Samosas
Curried potatoes, peas, carrots, and fresh garlic wrapped in a thin fried pastry with house-made dipping sauce.
$8
Chick'n Nugg Bites
Soy chick'n nuggets over a bed of thyme fries with your choice of house-made ranch, BBQ, or sweet tangerine.  Add a side of your choice!
$11
Gluten free
NOODLE BOWLS
Damn Dan Noodle
A rich, dark, organic tamari, spicy soy and peanut sauce with beefy crumbles, caramelized onions, sauteed mushrooms, and cabbage over noodles.  Finished with crunchy peanuts, scallions, and a drizzle of spicy house garlic chile oil. (contains nuts)
$15
Golden Curry
Organic coconut and maple mild madras curry sauce with organic sprouted tofu, sauteed mushrooms, cabbage, carrots, and broccoli over noodles.
$15
Firecracker Red Curry
SPICY red curry with fried seitan, sauteed mushrooms, cabbage, carrots, broccoli, and spicy house garlic chile oil over noodles.
$15
My Green Tangerine
Tangy tangerine-orange glaze with crispy chick'n and broccoli over noodles.
$15
Cheezy Broccoli Cheddar Noodles
The name pretty much says it! Our homemade easy cheeze and crispy fried soy chicken over noodles, some broccoli trees, and a drizzle of our increasingly more famous house made chili crunch.
$15
GREENS + GARDEN BURRITOS
We use organic produce in our salad mix whenever nature provides it. Make it a garden burrito and have it wrapped in a flour tortilla for a buck! Deliciously gluten free when you get your greens in a bowl!
Dagobah Jungle
Jerk spiced fried brussels sprouts over fresh greens tossed in Dagobah jungle dressing with carrots and crunchy tortilla strips. (soy free)
$11
Peanut Chick'n
Mock chick'n, fresh greens, cabbage, carrots, green onions, and crushed peanuts tossed in a sweet house peanut vinaigrette with crunchy tortilla strips. (contains nuts)
$11
Fighting Artichoke
Artichoke hearts, kalamata olives, cucumbers, and tomatoes over fresh greens tossed in a creamy tahini lemon dressing with crunchy tortilla strips. (soy free)
$12
Ranchero
BBQ “wings” with fresh greens and carrots tossed in our house-made ranch dressing and crunchy tortilla strips.
$11
HAND HELDS
Po boys, sammies and burgers that you hold in your hands and stuff in your face. Substitute organic sprouted Ezekiel bread or gluten free bread for a buck. Don’t forget to add a side.
The Street Burgers
Our hand-packed patties topped with pickles, grilled onion, and special burger sauce on a toasty bun.  Add cheese or bacon and almost anything else for a few more bucks.
Single Burger $8.50
Dub Dub Burger $11.00 (2 patties)
Trips Burger $14.00 (3 patties)
Original “G” Spicy Po-Boy
Our classic buffalo mock chicken, fresh lettuce, tomato and mayo on a toasty ciabatta.
$9.75
Wendy’s Pickle
Southern style breaded mock chicken cutlet with spicy hot sauce, mayo and dill pickles on a toasty ciabatta.
$9.75
Chicago Cheesesteak
Spicy grilled seitan steak with caramelized peppers n' onions, lettuce, tomato,  mayo, melted cheddar, and spicy giardiniera peppers, on a toasty ciabatta.
$11.50
The BFF
Crispy breaded and fried fancy mock chicken with fresh sautéed jalapenos, cheddar, avocado, lettuce, and tomato on a toasty bun, topped with our house-made ranch.
$11.50
Big Wac
Two hand-packed patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun.
$12
Colossal Wac
FOUR! Hand packed patties, special sauce, lettuce, DOUBLE cheese, pickles, onions, on a sesame seed bun. Pictured with our Thyme Fries.
$18.75
The BirdWac
Our breaded crispy fried golden chicken cutlet done WAC style with special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun.
$11.50
Fleetwood Wac
A southwest version of our classic Big Wac with added roasted jalapeno, avocado, and chile spiced burger patties.
$14
Lil Wac
Two hand-packed patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a gluten free bun.
$13
Gluten free
Western Wac
A western version of our classic Big Wac with added tempeh bacon, mushrooms, and BBQ sauce.
$14
Tacos
Ultimo Taco
Classic spicy beef taco with fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, cheeze, and sour cream.
$5.50
Gluten free
San Diego "Fish" Taco
Nori tempura organic tofu "fish" with fresh cabbage, and a creamy smokey spicy San Diego taco sauce.
$5.50
SIDES
Thyme Fries
(soy free)
$3.50
Gluten free
Fried Brussels
(soy free)
$6.50
Gluten free
Fresh Fruit
(soy free)
$3.50
Gluten free
Lemon Garlic Bowtie Salad
Bowtie pasta enrobed in a basil, garlic, and lemon dressing with spring onions and fresh tomato.
$6
A-MAIZE-ING Cheezy "Grits"
Our play on a classic dish with whole hominy corn in a cheezy lemon sauce.  Fans of mac n cheese will love this.
$6
Gluten free
Side of Noodles
Simple pan-fried ramen style noodles with a dash of organic tamari.
$4.50
DRINKS
House Made Drinks
Made with unrefined organic sugar Organic Sweet Lime, Strawberry Lemonade, Electric Nectar, organic fair trade (unsweetened) Green Tea.
$2.50
check out our tsoynami menu
Allergy Notice
All menu items prepared in our kitchens are plant-based. However, wheat, soy, peanuts, tree nuts, mushrooms, and seeds are present.  Though we do our best to keep items separated we cannot guarantee the prevention of cross-contact of any ingredient or assume responsibility for a particular sensitivity or allergy to any food product provided by green or nami restaurants.  If you have a hypersensitivity to any of the above allergens, you may want to reconsider dining with us.

Classic Hummus and 2 Pitas
Hummus is our house-blended chickpeas, tahini olive oil, fresh garlic, and lemon juice.
Cilantro Jalapeno Hummus and 2 Pitas
Hummus is our house-blended chickpeas, tahini olive oil, fresh garlic, and lemon juice with cilantro and jalapeño.
Vegetarian Platter
A combination plate of original hummus baba-ghanouj, 3 dolmans, 3 falafel tahini, tzatziki and 2 Pitas.
Dolmas
Combination of rice, parsley, mint, and a twist of lemon juice wrapped in grape vine leaves.
Falafel And Hummus With A Pita
A Plate of Hummus and Falafels. With a Pita Bread.
Baba Ghanouj Hummus and 2 Pitas
Charbroiled eggplants, house-blended with tahini olive oil, fresh garlic, and lemon juice. Includes 2 Pitas.
Chicago Gyros Pita
Hand-carved seasoned beef and lamb, onions, tomatoes, and our original homemade tzatziki sauce in a Pita.
Chicken Pita
Marinated chicken breast, lettuce, onions, tomatoes and tzatziki sauce.
Steak Pita
Marinated tender beef shawarma, lettuce, onions, tomatoes, and tzatziki sauce in a Pita.

Original steak and provolone cheese, grilled onions and peppers in a Pita.
Chicken Shawarma Pita
Marinated Chicken Thighs, seared and carved, pickles and tomatoes, with tzatziki sauce.
Chicken Gyros Pita
Seasoned chicken gyro layers, lettuce, onions, tomatoes and tzatziki sauce.
Falafel Pita
Fried croquettes of Chick Peas, Fava Beans, and spices, lettuce, tomatoes, and Tahini sauce in a Pita.
Veggies Hummus Pita
Original hummus, cucumbers, lettuce, tomatoes, feta cheese, and tzatziki sauce, in a Pita. Available with cilantro jalapeño hummus.
Philly Chicken Pita
Original Steak and Provolone "Cheese Grilled Onions and Grilled Peppers on a Pita.
Italian Beef Sandwich
Original Vienna roast beef. Served with a side of hot Au-Ju gravy and hot giardiniera peppers.
Fish N Chips
Tavern battered cod fillets, fries (chips), Tatar sauce and lemon wedges.
Chicken Tenders
Breaded strips of tender chicken breast. Served with ranch sauce.
Pizza Puff
Original Chicago Pizza Puff.
Greek Salad
Romaine hearts lettuce, English cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, sweet red bell peppers, feta cheese, pepperoncini, olives, and house Greek vinaigrette on the side.
Mediterranean Salad (Fattoush)
Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, English cucumbers, onions, parsley, mint, sumac, and pita croutons tossed in our Greek vinaigrette
Caesar Salad
Fresh-cut romaine hearts lettuce, premium croutons, Caesar dressing and Parmesan cheese
Gyros Salad
Greek Salad w Gyros Meat and Tzatziki Sauce.
Falafel Salad
Greek Salad w/ Falafels (Vegetarian) with Tahini sauce.
Steak Salad
Greek Salad w/ Seared Steak Bits with Tzatziki sauce.
Chicken Caesar Salad
Caesar Salad w/ Mediterranean Grilled Chicken with Tzatziki sauce.
Greek Chicken Salad
Greek Salad w/ Mediterranean Grilled Chicken with Tzatziki Sauce.
Mediterranean chicken Salad
Mediterranean Salad w/ Mediterranean grilled Chicken with Tzatziki sauce.
Gyros Plate
Seared layers of thinly sliced seasoned beef & lamb, served with rice or fries, pita bread, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.
Chicken Plate
Marinated and charbroiled chicken breast served with rice, pita bread, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.
Steak Plate
Marinated beef, broiled on a vertical skewer, thinly sliced. Served with rice, pita bread, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.
Chicken Gyros Plate
Seared layers of seasoned chicken, broiled on a vertical skewer, thinly sliced. Served with a choice of fries or rice, pita bread, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.
Chicken Shawarma Plate
Seared Chicken Thighs served with rice, pita bread, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.
Steak And Hummus Plate
Classic Hummus or cilantro hummus with seared steak bits, cucumbers, tomatoes, and pita bread.
Chicken And Hummus Plate
Classic Hummus or Cilantro & Jalapenos hummus with Mediterranean chicken breast, cucumbers, tomatoes and pita bread.

Many items are vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free, many others can be easily modified. Tofu can be substitude for most chicken and fishes. Please ask your server. Olives may contain pits.
*These items may be cooked to order and may contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercook meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Pita Jungle is pleased to offer a variety of gluten-free and vegetarian/vegan options. We are however not a gluten-free/vegetarian/vegan restaurant and cannot guarantee that cross contamination will never occur. Please notify your server if you have any food allergy or specific dietary needs. We will do our best to accommodate them.
General Information: We are using gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, soy, and wheat). Therefore, we cannot guarantee that cross contamination never occurs. Menu items may vary by location.
We do our utmost to keep the information on our website up to date, however, due to seasonality and circumstances beyond our control ingredient changes or substitutions may occur.
Availability subject to change.
BEER, WINE & COCKTAILS
Tapas & Happy Hour
Boutique wines, local draughts, crafted cocktails
Libations that perfectly pairs with our food…. enjoy responsibly
SEE OUR SELECTION
SEASONAL KITCHEN CRAFTS
Keto, Paleo & Gluten-Free Go Mediterranean
At the turn of every season, we source out seasonal, and local ingredients as much as possible, to give you vibrant and fresh menu selections that are on the forefront of culinary relevance. Our medium to express cutting edge culinary options using superior seasonal ingredients. As much as possible we try to use organic, grass-fed, non-GMO, antibiotic free ingredients.

Many items are vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free, many others can be easily modified. Tofu can be substitude for most chicken and fishes. Please ask your server. Olives may contain pits.
*These items may be cooked to order and may contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercook meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Pita Jungle is pleased to offer a variety of gluten-free and vegetarian/vegan options. We are however not a gluten-free/vegetarian/vegan restaurant and cannot guarantee that cross contamination will never occur. Please notify your server if you have any food allergy or specific dietary needs. We will do our best to accommodate them.
General Information: We are using gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, soy, and wheat). Therefore, we cannot guarantee that cross contamination never occurs. Menu items may vary by location.
We do our utmost to keep the information on our website up to date, however, due to seasonality and circumstances beyond our control ingredient changes or substitutions may occur.
Availability subject to change.
BEER, WINE & COCKTAILS
Tapas & Happy Hour
Boutique wines, local draughts, crafted cocktails
Libations that perfectly pairs with our food…. enjoy responsibly
SEE OUR SELECTION
SEASONAL KITCHEN CRAFTS
Keto, Paleo & Gluten-Free Go Mediterranean
At the turn of every season, we source out seasonal, and local ingredients as much as possible, to give you vibrant and fresh menu selections that are on the forefront of culinary relevance. Our medium to express cutting edge culinary options using superior seasonal ingredients. As much as possible we try to use organic, grass-fed, non-GMO, antibiotic free ingredients.
SEE OUR SELECTION

About the Business
Business owner information
David C.
Business Owner
When you're looking for a Chinese restaurant, come on in to ours and experience the difference years in the restaurant business and fresh quality ingredients can make. Not all Chinese food is the same and we want to show you that. We hand pick the best selection of ingredients so that you know you're always getting quality ingredients, whether you've ordered take out or if you're dining in.

As a family restaurant, we value each one of our customers and enjoy helping them find a new favorite Asian food specialty for everyone to love. Don't be shy, come on in to your new favorite lunch and dinner restaurant.

raw_text:
Order Authentic Chinese Online | Happy Tasty Full - Pickup or Delivery Available
Happy Tasty Full
Order Online
Authentic Chinese Dining in Scottsdale
At Happy Tasty Full, we serve authentic Chinese cuisine dishes like Orange Chicken, Kung Pao Chicken, and Moo Goo Gai Pan that delight Scottsdale, Paradise Valley, and Fountain Hills neighbors. We offer delivery and takeout for lunch and dinner. Customers love our great value, large portions, and tasty dinner specials!
Order Online
View Menu
About Happy Tasty Full
Welcome to Happy Tasty Full at 4835 E Greenway Rd in Scottsdale, AZ! We’re passionate about serving authentic Chinese cuisine like Sweet and Sour Chicken, General Tso's Chicken, and Cashew Chicken, all made with fresh ingredients. Customers rave about our flavorful meals and friendly service. Whether you’re dining in, grabbing takeout, or ordering delivery, our family-run restaurant brings satisfying Chinese flavors to you with every bite.

address: 20928 N John Wayne Pkwy, Maricopa, AZ 85139
raw_text:
Order Authentic Chinese Online | Li's Garden - Pickup or Delivery Available
Li's Garden
Order Online
Wok into Flavor Wonderland
Craving Chinese classics? We've got just the flavors to whisk you away. Indulge in a delightful journey of taste from the comfort of your home. Order online now for a culinary adventure delivered to your door!
Order Online
View Menu
Savor Chinese Classics
Delight in the flavors of Li's Garden, your go-to spot in Maricopa, AZ for authentic Chinese classics. Our menu bursts with vibrant tastes, offering a delightful range of traditional dishes crafted with the freshest ingredients. Enjoy everything from sizzling Kung Pao Chicken to our savory Egg Fried Rice, made to order just for you. Whether you're craving a hearty Beef Chow Mein or the delicate flavors of Sweet and Sour Pork, we've got you covered. Jump online and place your order now for a culinary journey delivered right to your door or ready for convenient pick-up. Your feast awaits!

About New Golden China
Taste of China Provides safe gluten free meals. After six years of research and continuous improvement in pursuit of perfect quality, we have developed proprietary cooking methods to ensure hight quality teaste while effectively preventing cross infection. We have also installed a dedicated fryer to safely offer deep fried dishes.
We have served many guests who have not been able to taste Chinese food for many years due to celiac disease, empowering them to finally order their favorite dish and regain delicious memories. Someof ourcustomers have even been moved to tears because they once doubted that they would ever be able to eat Chinese food again. if you, your relatives, or yourfriends have celiac disease or a gluten intolerance, join us at Taste of China. I gurarantee you will have a wonderful experience!
NEW! Online ordering
Online ordering NOW enabled for pick-up or delivery. Just tell us what you want and we'll prepare it as fast as we can. All orders are manually confirmed by us directly. Find out in real-time when your food is ready. All orders are manually confirmed by us in real-time. Watch on-screen when your food is ready for pickup or when it gets delivered.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
John L:
My lady and I just ate here for the first time and everything was amazing! Plenty of gluten free labeled menu options for my girlfriend, which is honestly rare with these type of places. Get the Master Gee's chicken! You won't be disappointed.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Nikki M:
This was our first visit, and it was absolutely amazing! Food flavors were spot on! Food served hot and prompt. Great service. Reasonably priced.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Amber A:
Love it! We go here a few times a month! Consistently hot, fresh, and delicious!!! Best place in the area!! Plus, family owned and operated!!! Highly recommend! Our go-to order is Crab Rangoon and Sesame Chicken!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Jalen H:
Stumbled across this hidden gem one evening for dinner! It is so delicious. One of the best chinese restaurants that I have tried recently. We will definitely be back!

Sun-Tue,Thur 11:00am-8:00pm
Fri-Sat 11:00am-8:30pm
Closed Wednesdays
Closed July 4th, Thanksgiving
Christmas Day & New Year's Day.
More About Us -
We are a family run restaurant, and we offer something for all Thai food enthusiasts.
Whether you’re a fan of street food or great Bangkok restaurants, we are sure to please.
We use only the freshest ingredients and tastiest Thai spices to bring out the full flavors of your meal. Our mission is to focus on providing high-quality homemade pure Thai food in a welcoming ambiance with exceptional service. We never use MSG, and we keep vegetarian and Vegan foods separated from animal products.
We would love to share our great Thai food with our friends throughout the Valley.

About the Business
King Wong offers delicious fast, healthy, authentic Chinese food.

We have amazing lunch specials served daily from 11:00am to 3:30pm except holidays. Lunch served with 1 Egg Roll, 1 Crab Puff and Fried Rice and we have dinner plates that will make you feel like you are in China. 

Come in and dine with us or order for delivery either way get the royal treatment from the King himself. 

This is our newest location and we want to be your go to Chinese place!
…

What our customers say
Reviews
I and my gf ordered the shrimp fried rice and orange chicken. The food was delicious and generously portioned! We will definitely be coming back again!
Randy
Awesome food. I love the Shrimp & Vegetables. My hubby loves the Peppered beef, twice cooked chicken is good too. The staff is very nice.
Carol Ann Franke
Lunch special was very decently priced and quite delicious. The service was excellent and food was ready in a flash. Would definitely go there again.
Michelle Tremblay
This is definitely my go-to spot. The food is delicious and fresh, you get a lot for a good price, and there's something for everyone. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
Cypress Esparza
Authentic fried rice. It tastes the same as the fried rice in my childhood memory. It brings me tears and joy.
Nice and clean restaurant.
Bùi L.
We have been consistently happy with our orders from this place. Of the Chinese delivery places in our area, we like Dragon Garden the most.
Erin Benites

What our customers say
Reviews
I love this place! The order usually gets to our house way sooner than the expected time. Delicious food and quick delivery!
Jennifer Pyle
I’m too hooked on Taiwanese noodles and Chef Panda Chicken. Pick-up is always ready in 10-15 minutes. Recommend this place!
Katie S.
The food is so good. Their orange chicken is so different than other places. The prices are great and you get a lot of food!
Sara Wood
All great tasting and we will order from chef panda again!! Thank you to our delivery person, he was very happy to bring our food.
C Mi
The food was really good. They gave us a little gift with the order as well. I thought that was very kind and thoughtful of them.
Jasmine McKee
A lot of good food for not a lot of money, this place takes care if its customers very well, I have never had a bad experience here yet.
Steve Emling
I ordered food for 12-15 people for my moms bday and I was very impressed by how tasty and organized each container was.
elenor myers

Welcome to
Thai Breeze Bistro, Phoenix, AZ
We offer high-quality, delicious Thai dishes made with authentic ingredients! Check out our menu for more details.
Our Menu
Best chefs
There is a large selection of authentic Thai dishes combining traditional recipes with the freshest ingredients.
Our Menu
Cooking from the heart
Diners experience the journey of Thai taste with friendly service to make the dining a memorable one.
Our Menu
Place order ahead - No Hassle
Contact us to make an order
Our Menu
Our Little Story
We're passionate about bringing the rich and vibrant flavors of Thailand to your table. Whether you're dining in or ordering for delivery, every dish is crafted with love, tradition, and the freshest ingredients.
Our mission is simple â great Thai food, made fresh, served fast, and always with a smile.
Why Choose Us?
Experience the rich flavors of Thailand right here at Thai Breeze Bistro! We bring you authentic Thai cuisine made with the freshest ingredients, traditional recipes, and a touch of Thai hospitality.
Gallery
Take a look at some of the stunning dishes we serve! Our gallery showcases the authentic flavors and beautiful presentation of Thai cuisine. Each image reflects the love and care we put into crafting the perfect meal for you.
Contact
We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, need a reservation, or want to give us feedback, feel free to reach out.

mix, shrimp tempura, avocado and cucumber; topped with lightly seared salmon, fresh mango and sweet eel sauce; finished with green tempura bits
MANGO LOBSTER ROLL
Lobster krab
†
mix, avocado and cucumber; topped with mango slices and mango tobiko; served with wasabi mustard vinaigrette
HOLY CRAB ROLL
Snow crab, avocado, cucumber; topped with snow crab, sliced avocado; served with Asian pesto sauce and mango tobiko
Signature Item
“RA”CKIN’ ROLL
Lightly battered krab
†
and cream cheese; topped with guacamole and “RA”ckin’ Shrimp; finished with ginger teriyaki sauce, red tempura bits and togarashi
SASHIMI
A Japanese dish consisting of thinly sliced raw fish, traditionally served with soy sauce and wasabi.
Tuna “Maguro”
Yellowtail “Hamachi”
Striped Bass “Suzuki”
Tuna Belly “Toro”
Salmon “Sake”
Albacore “Bincho Maguro”
Scallop “Hotate”
Octopus Tako
NIGIRI
A small oval of rice topped with a thin slice of raw fish or seafood, sometimes held together by a thin band of seaweed.
Salmon “Sake”
Snow Crab “Zuwaigani”
Albacore “Bincho Maguro”
Striped Bass “Suzuki”
Quail Egg “Uzura”
Salmon Roe “Ikura”
Sea Urchin “Uni”
Octopus Tako
Fresh Water Eel “Unagi”
Yellowtail “Hamachi”
Tuna “Maguro”

Smoked Salmon “Smoked Sake”
Flying Fish “Tobiko”
Scallop “Hotategai”
Tuna Belly “Toro”
Shrimp “Ebi”
Sweet Egg “Tamago”
ABURI
Torched sushi
SEARED TORO
NIGIRI (2 pc.)
SEARED SALMON
NIGIRI (2 pc.)
SMOKY SALMON ROLL
Smoky salmon mix, cucumber and avocado; topped with lightly torched salmon, red pepper, jalapeño smoky mayo and togarashi; served with sweet eel sauce
NAUGHTY TORO ROLL
Fresh tuna, avocado and jalapeño; topped with lightly torched toro,
kizami wasabi and togarashi
SEARED WAGYU
NIGIRI (2 pc.)
SEARED YELLOWTAIL
NIGIRI (2 pc.)
WAGYU ROLL
Wagyu steak and red bell peppers are lightly torched; topped over avocado and red bell peppers; finished with shiso leaves
MAKI
Maki is the traditional introduction to sushi. Raw or cooked fish, seafood, vegetables or a combination of these are rolled with rice and seaweed and cut into 5-8 bite-size pieces.

About the Business
Hokkaido Sushi & Asian Bistro brings together the best of Japanese and Chinese cuisine in a cozy, modern setting. Whether you’re craving authentic ramen, creative sushi rolls, or flavorful Chinese stir-fries, we’ve got something to satisfy every palate.

​

From fresh Nigiri & Sashimi, chef-crafted Special Rolls, to comfort favorites like Pad Thai, General Tao’s Chicken, and House Special Fried Rice, our diverse menu is perfect for both sushi lovers and Asian food enthusiasts.

We also offer a variety of poke bowls, party platters, and lunch specials, all made with high-quality ingredients and great attention to flavor. Whether dining in, ordering takeout, or catering for events, we promise a flavorful experience every time.

​Grand Opening – Now Serving 7 Days a Week!
Order online or dine in with us today – we look forward to serving you!

About the Business
The ultimate authentic Chinese food experience in Mesa, Arizona, featuring unique Chinese street eats, dim sum, classic favorites, and our famous clay pot rice dishes. We are proud to share our food and our culture with the community, at prices as irresistible as our dishes. With a spacious and clean interior, we are perfect for everything from work lunches to special gatherings for your family and loved ones.

name: Pho Thanh
address: 1702 W Camelback Rd, Phoenix, AZ 85015
raw_text:
Pho Thanh Restaurant Menu (update October 2025)
Skip to content
Pho Thanh Restaurant
HOME
About
Menu
Services
Photos
Menu of Pho Thanh Restaurant
The menu was updated in November, 2023.
For more information, please contact the phone number:
+1 602-242-1979
Enjoying Vietnamese Dishes
Vietnamese cuisine is brought to life through a variety of traditional dishes. Authentic flavors are showcased in each meal, crafted to provide a genuine taste of Vietnam. The Beef Pho, a quintessential Vietnamese dish, is celebrated for its rich and aromatic broth. Prepared with tender slices of beef and complemented by fresh herbs and bean sprouts, this noodle soup embodies the essence of traditional Vietnamese cooking. Each bowl of pho is meticulously prepared, ensuring that the flavors meld perfectly to create a satisfying and flavorful experience.
The Banh Mi, another highlight, represents a delightful fusion of Vietnamese and French influences. Served in a crispy baguette, this sandwich is filled with marinated pork, pickled vegetables, and fresh herbs. The combination of textures and flavors offers a unique and enjoyable dining experience, capturing the essence of Vietnamese street food. Lastly, the Pork Chop is grilled to perfection, showcasing the restaurant’s dedication to high-quality ingredients and skillful preparation. Marinated with a blend of spices and herbs, the pork chop is tender and flavorful, served with steamed rice and fresh vegetables. This dish exemplifies the commitment to delivering authentic and delicious Vietnamese cuisine.
Variety of Dishes at Pho Thanh Restaurant
Pho Thanh Restaurant is known for its diverse menu, offering a wide range of Vietnamese dishes that cater to various tastes and preferences. The extensive selection includes both traditional favorites and innovative options, ensuring that every guest can find something to enjoy. The menu features a variety of pho options, each with its own unique flavor profile. From classic beef pho to variations with different proteins, each dish is prepared with attention to detail, using fresh and high-quality ingredients.
In addition to pho, the restaurant offers a selection of banh mi sandwiches, each crafted with care to provide a delightful blend of textures and flavors. The sandwiches are filled with ingredients such as marinated pork, pickled vegetables, and fresh herbs, offering a taste of Vietnamese street food in a gourmet setting. A standout dish, is grilled to perfection and served with complementary sides, showcasing the restaurant’s commitment to quality. This dish, along with other menu items, reflects the diverse culinary offerings available at Pho Thanh. The variety of dishes ensures that Pho Thanh Restaurant is a destination for those seeking an extensive and satisfying Vietnamese dining experience. The diverse menu is designed to cater to different preferences, making it a popular choice for a wide range of diners.
Discover the Menu
The menu at Pho Thanh Restaurant invites diners to explore a wide array of Vietnamese dishes, each meticulously crafted to highlight traditional flavors and ingredients. This diverse selection offers something for everyone, whether seeking familiar favorites or new culinary experiences. Pho Thanh’s menu includes several variations of pho, each designed to showcase the rich and aromatic broth that defines this classic Vietnamese dish. The beef pho, a restaurant favorite, is prepared with tender beef slices and garnished with fresh herbs and bean sprouts. In addition to pho, the menu features a selection of banh mi sandwiches, which blend Vietnamese and French influences. Each sandwich is served in a crispy baguette and filled with ingredients like marinated pork and pickled vegetables, offering a delightful contrast of flavors and textures. By exploring the menu at Pho Thanh, diners can experience a range of traditional Vietnamese dishes, each prepared with a focus on authenticity and taste. The variety offered ensures that every visit to the restaurant provides a new and enjoyable culinary experience.

Thai Lotus
Bringing the Flavors of Thailand to You
Open Daily for Takeout
ORDER ONLINE
THAI LOTUS
Welcome to Thai Lotus, where we offer authentic Thai cuisine that will satisfy your cravings. From spicy to sweet, we serve dishes that are perfect for any taste buds. We also offer catering services, so you can enjoy our delicious food at any event or occasion. Come and experience Thailand in every bite!
See Menu
Our Food
At Thai Lotus, we take pride in serving authentic Thai food made with quality ingredients. Whether you’re in the mood for something spicy or sweet, we’ve got you covered with a variety of dishes. And for those with special dietary needs, we offer vegan and vegetarian options. Hosting an event or party? We also offer catering services to make your occasion even more special.

Authentic Thai food from Chef Molly's beloved homeland. Infused with savory seasonings and fresh ingredients, our recipes have been handed down from previous generations of family from all over Thailand.

Chon Thai Food
Chon Thai Food in Chandler, AZ, offers authentic Thai cuisine in a cozy, inviting atmosphere. Enjoy classic dishes like Pad Thai, Green Curry, and Tom Yum soup, all made with fresh, flavorful ingredients. With friendly service and a welcoming vibe, it's the perfect spot for a delicious Thai meal. We are located near Oasis Neighborhood. Come join us or order online for carryout today!

“SOI” IS A THAI WORD FOR SIDE STREETS OR ALLEY WAYS WHICH, TOGETHER, FORM THE ESSENTIAL LIFE LINE THAT MAKES UP THE FABRIC OF BANGKOK CITY.
Like the city, our menu is a modern take on the traditional through the use of fresh local ingredients, sustainable practice, and creative approach to authentic Thai dishes.
…influenced, accented, tinged, anything but ‘fusion’. We like to see it as a beginning of something interesting.
Chai yo – Cheers
SOI 4 BANGKOK EATERY
8787 N Scottsdale Rd.
Suite 104
Scottsdale, AZ 85253

Our Story
The name “ Ta Lew ” in the Thai language means the spatula. Ta Lew Thai Bistro is a small restaurant located in the fast-growing city of Gilbert, Arizona. We serve creative authentic Thai food made from our own recipes and cooked by our family. We use fresh ingredients to make our dishes. Most dishes can be made vegetarian and gluten-free upon request.
Ta Lew Thai Bistro is a great local place, we combine real Thai decor with authentic recipes to create an experience that will make customers satisfied.
Ta Lew Thai Bistro will offer our customers great food based on our business plan, great quality, and great quantity.

About
Our chefs specialize in authentic and delicious food. The staff at Smile Thai Cuisine is devoted to serving customers mouthwatering dishes that feature the highest quality ingredients available. Red Curry, Green Curry and Yellow Curry are all prepared quickly and delivered to you right away.
Smile Thai Cuisine uses only the freshest ingredients around, ensuring that every dish is of the highest possible quality. Not sure what you're in the mood for? Try one of our specialties including Massamun Curry , Panang Curry, and more.

About Us
At One Pot, we are passionate about bringing the authentic flavors of Asia to Mesa. Our chefs use traditional recipes and fresh ingredients to create delicious dishes that will teleport you straight to the streets of Thai, Chinese and Japanese. Join us on a culinary journey like no other.
Experience the Flavors of Asia at One Pot
Indulge in our authentic Thai, Chinese, and Japanese hot pot dishes. Savor the rich spices, fresh ingredients, and unique flavors that make One Pot a true culinary adventure.

Authentic, Fresh, Thaï Food
Khao Soi
Northern Thaï coconut curry noodle dish with crispy egg noodles, bean sprouts, julienned carrots, onion, fresh coriander and topped with crispy fried red shallots. Served with your choice of protein and a wedge of lime.

Seasonal Specials
Seasonal Specials
Coco Curry Bowl – Khao Soi
Northern Thaï coconut curry noodle dish with crispy egg noodles, bean sprouts, julienned carrots, onion, fresh coriander and topped with crispy fried red shallots. Served with your choice of protein and a wedge of lime.
Seasonal Specials
Add On Crispy Noodles
Swap out rice for a golden bed of crunchy egg noodles. This new option lets you take your favorite stir-fry to the next level — saucy, bold flavors paired with an irresistible crunch in every bite.
Seasonal Specials
Golden Crispy Noodles
Golden crispy egg noodles topped with stir-fried seasonal vegetables and your choice of protein,all tossed in a savoury house-made sauce.
Appetizers & Desserts
Appetizers & Desserts
Fresh Spring Rolls
Savour the magic of our refreshing rice paper roll filled with lettuce, bean sprouts, carrots, coriander, mint, and vermicelli noodles; served with peanut sauce. Available with your of choice filling: vegetable or shrimp.
Appetizers & Desserts
Thaï Chicken Wings
Try our irresistibly crispy and lightly seasoned chicken wings served with our signature sweet chili dipping sauce. Available in orders of 3 chicken wings, 6 chicken wings or 9 chicken wings.
Appetizers & Desserts
Imperial Roll
Delightfully crunchy and golden imperial roll filled with a vegetable medley and paired with a classic plum sauce.
Load More
Soup
Soup
Tom Yum Soup
Bring on the heat and give our Tom Yum soup a try! A sweet, sour and spicy lemongrass infused chicken broth, packed with noodles and vegetables. For an extra burst of flavour, add coconut milk to your soup!
Soup
Thaï Soup
A fragrant, tangy and homemade bowl of liquid gold! Thaï chicken broth filled with noodles, vegetables, and topped with crispy fried red shallots. For an extra burst of flavour, add coconut milk to your soup!
General Thai™
General Thaï
General Thaïracha™
Time to heat things up!! Think you can handle it? Take it to the next level with our General Thaïracha – signature pieces of our battered chicken or battered beef tossed in a sweet and spicy sriracha-based sauce with peppers, onions, and carrots. Served on a bed of steamed rice or substitute for cauliflower rice.
General Thaï
General Thaï™ Pineapple
A perfect combination of crispy, sweet and scrumptious! Savour our signature pieces of battered chicken or battered beef tossed in sweet-and-sour sauce with peppers, onions, carrots, tomatoes, and pineapple. Served on a bed of steamed rice or substitute for cauliflower rice.
General Thaï
General Thaï™ Mango
Prepare to be delighted because our General Thaï™ Mango = bliss on plate! Enjoy our signature pieces of battered chicken or battered beef tossed in sweet chilli sauce with peppers, onions, carrots, and mango. Served on a bed of steamed rice or substitute for cauliflower rice.
Curry
Curry
Green Curry
In a hurry? Try our curries! With three different flavour options to choose from, enjoy our silky, creamy, and spicy curries made with coconut milk, perched on a bed of aromatic rice (or or substitute for cauliflower rice). Our curries are packed with mouthwatering flavour to nourish the soul.
Curry
General Curry™
The ultimate comfort food packed with mouthwatering flavour to nourish the soul! With three different flavour options to choose from, choose from our signature Battered Beef or Battered chicken and enjoy our silky, creamy, and spicy curries made with coconut milk, perched on a bed of aromatic rice (or substitute for cauliflower rice).
Curry
Red Curry
In a hurry? Try our curries! With three different flavour options to choose from, enjoy our silky, creamy, and spicy curries made with coconut milk, perched on a bed of aromatic rice (or or substitute for cauliflower rice). Our curries are packed with mouthwatering flavour to nourish the soul.
Load More
Noodles
Noodles
Pad Thaï
Experience authentic Thaï flavours with our infamous and fan favourite Pad Thaï! Featuring thin rice noodles stir-fried with our sweet and sour sauce, eggs, bean sprouts, green onion, tofu and salted radish. Squeeze a little lime juice and sprinkle some peanuts for an extra special touch.
Noodles
Pad See Ew
Pad See Ew = a signature Thaï Express dish that redefines deliciousness! Don’t be shy, give it a Thaï! Featuring, large rice noodles served with our house brand soy sauce, eggs, and Chinese broccoli.
Noodles
Singapore Pad Thai
When Thaïland and Singapore make noodles. Stir fried rice noodles with a hint of yellow curry and a medley of seasonal veggies.
Fried Rice
Fried Rice
Thaï Fried Rice
Try our flavourful and fragrant Thaï fried rice that will delight your senses, fried rice served with egg, green onions, carrots, pineapple and tomato. This dish will excite your tastebuds!
Fried Rice
Basil Fried Rice
A symphony of taste in each bite – that’s our Basil Fried Rice! Take a trip to Thaïland with this flavour filled fried rice, served with egg, green onions, carrots, and Thaï basil of course.
Fried Rice
Tom Yum Fried Rice
2 classics, 1 box. Try our latest remix, this new Fried Rice has all the aromatic flavors of your favorite soup with a brand-new twist.
Stir Fry
Stir Fry
Eggplant Stir Fry
Simple yet delicious, made with: eggplant and basil.
Stir Fry
Peanut Stir Fry
A classic that can’t be beat, made with: peanut sauce and mushrooms.
Stir Fry
Basil Stir Fry
Fresh and flavourful, made with: Thaï basil and baby corn.
Load More
Shak-a-Bowl
Shak-a-Bowl
Cashew Shak-a-Bowl
Eat better, not less because our all new salad options are something to shake for! Enjoy a bed of fresh veggies and vermicelli noodles topped with our cashew stir fry flavour. Pick your own protein, shake, and enjoy!
Shak-a-Bowl
Peanut Shak-a-Bowl
Eat better, not less because our all new salad options are something to shake for! Enjoy a bed of fresh veggies and vermicelli noodles topped with our peanut stir fry flavour. Pick your own protein, shake, and enjoy!
Shak-a-Bowl
Lemongrass Shak-a-Bowl
Eat better, not less because our all new salad options are something to shake for! Enjoy a bed of fresh veggies and vermicelli noodles topped with our lemongrass stir fry flavour. Pick your own protein, shake, and enjoy!

Claypot Cooking
Claypot cooking a traditional cooking though out Southeast Asia. Mainly Guangzhou China, and Malaysia Foremost. health benefits of clay pot cooking come from its ability to circulate steam throughout cooking. This provides plenty of moisture and means that you can cook with less oil and fat. ( served with white rice and freshly steamed broccoli )

About the Business
Business owner information
Ramon G.
Business Owner
LBR is a family-owned and operated business only in Arizona.  We serve different traditional Filipino & occasional Asian dishes everyday.  This is a point-point (turo-turo) type of fastfood restaurant where you pick the food you like by pointing to the dish at the steam table.  There are a variety of dishes served and the choices change everyday. 

We have dine-in & take-out options serving 1-3 entree meals with rice, a la carte entrees & soup dishes, BBQ, fried or grilled fish, different kakanin(goodies), drinks & desserts.  Cebu-style lechon is sold per pound on Saturdays & Sundays.   We provide casual catering, whole lechon & bellychon for your party needs and our dining area is available for special events, meetings and gatherings up to 60 people. Filipino food is a melting pot of different influences from the Spanish, Chinese, Thai, Indonesian & Indian cuisines of the people who have colonized or settled in the Philippine islands throughout history
…

Q:
Do you have lumpia?
A:
Yes we have lumpiang shanghai ( fried eggrolls) everyday but fresh lumpia is made to order.  Pls call 602-703-0590 if you need to order fresh lumpia.  Thank u
Ramon G., Business Owner

about us
The uprooted kitchen is a plant-based eatery located in Gilbert, AZ.    We are a small family-run
business
that strives to provide our community with a beautiful gathering place to enjoy thoughtful and nourishing food.  We began in 2012 as a vegetarian food truck; and after four years of a successful ride, it was time to expand.  We have currently planted our “roots” as part of a larger
project
called Barnone: a collection of extremely talented and creative makers with a passion for their craft.  The uprooted kitchen is also fortunate enough to be located within the neighborhood of Agritopia, which is built around an organic farm.  Many of our menu items will be created using
produce
that is grown just outside our front door.  Our family has put so much love and energy into creating the uprooted kitchen - we hope that it shows in our food.  We believe that “Cooking can be one of the most satisfying things we do in life.  It’s a chance to make things with our own hands, nourish and give pleasure to people we care about, and choose exactly what we eat and make part of ourselves.” - Harold McGee, author
erin and chad romanoff -
owners
menus
about our food
plant-based eatery
-the uprooted kitchen is a plant-based eatery.
-we serve food that comes from the earth.
-we do not use any animal products; including meat, dairy, and eggs.
vegan
-the uprooted kitchen menu is vegan, with the exception of a few items that contain local honey.
-items containing honey will be noted on our online menu.
organic
-the uprooted kitchen uses certified organic produce.
-our produce
partners
currently include - the farm at agritopia, rhibafarms, and boxed greens.
-we also source as much other organic ingredients as we can including grains, seeds, oils, etc.
-we do not use GMO's.
gluten-free
-the uprooted kitchen is not a gluten-free kitchen.
-we cannot guarantee that cross contamination of ingredients will not occur.
-we do however offer many wheat-free options.
-items on our menu that do not contain wheat are typically labelled "wheat-free".
-if you do have an allergy or sensitivity, please discuss with our staff upon ordering.
-we are always happy to explain ingredients in detail.
nut-free kitchen
-the uprooted kitchen is not a nut-free kitchen.
-we use a variety of nuts on many menu items.
sweetners and oils
-the uprooted kitchen does not use any refined sugars - we use organic fruit, maple syrup, and coconut sugar.
-the uprooted kitchen uses minimal oil in our cooking/baking - we use organic EVOO, organic sesame, and unrefined organic coconut oil.
BYOB
-the uprooted kitchen does not currently have a BYOB license.
-customers may purchase food at the uprooted kitchen and eat at 12 West or Garage East if they choose to purchase beer and/or wine.

address: 785 W Warner Rd, Ste 103, Gilbert, AZ 85233
raw_text:
Mr. Tha i Bistro
Appetizer
A1 Fried Wontons (6) 7.95
Wonton filled with ground chicken, onion.

Crispy rolls; filled with shredded TARO root. No meat.
A3 Golden Tofu 8.95
Crispy fried fresh tofu cubes.
A4 Chicken Rolls (4) 9.95
Crispy rolls; ground chicken, glass noodles, carrots, bean sprouts, onion.
A5 Fresh Veggies Rolls (2 rolls/cut into 4 pieces) 9.95
Soft roll wrapped in rice paper has lettuce, tofu, purple cabbage, mint, cucumber, carrot.
A6 Crab Delight (5) 9.95
Crispy puff pastries filled with imitation crab and cream cheese.
A7 Fresh Avocado Rolls (2 rolls/cut into 4 pieces) 10.95
Soft roll wrapped in rice paper has avocado, lettuce, purple cabbage, mint, carrot.
A8 Calamari Rings 11.95
Crispy lightly battered calamari rings.
A9 Crispy Shrimp Rolls (5) 11.95
Shrimps wrapped in crispy rice papers.
A10 Chicken Satay (3) 12.95
Grilled marinated chicken tenders; serves on a bed of lettuce, with peanut sauce, and cucumber sauce.
A11 Mr. Thai Crispy Combo (12) 15.95
Shrimp Rolls, Spring Rolls, Chicken Rolls, Fried Wontons, Golden Tofu Cubes, Crab Delights.
Salad
Spicy Level: No spice (0), Mild (1), Medium (2), Hot (3), Thai Hot (4)

Shredded green papaya, tomatoes, green beans, carrots, roasted peanuts, mixed with Thai
spicy sauce.

Shredded mangoes, mixed with Thai tasty spicy sauce, topped with cashews.
S3 Chicken Salad 13.95
Spicy ground chicken with lemon grass, mint, red onions, lemons, cilantro and scallion.
S4 Beef Salad 15.95
Spicy grilled beef with lemon grass, mints, red onions, lemons, cilantro and scallion.
S5 Yum Woon Sen (Glass noodles Salad) 18.95
Shrimps, Chicken, glass noodles, onion, cilantro, celery, mixed with Thai spicy sauce.
S6 Seafood Salad 22.95
Shrimps, Scallops, Calamari, Fish, Clams in Thai spicy sauce on a bed of lettuce.
Mr. Thai Bistro
Soup
Spicy Level: No spice (0), Mild (1), Medium (2), Hot (3), Thai Hot (4)
S7 Tom Yum 12.95 14.95
Chicken, in spicy hot sour broth with mushrooms, lemongrass, scallion, cilantro.
S8 Tom Kha 13.95 15.95
Chicken, with delight taste of coconut milk broth, mushrooms, lemongrass, scallion, galangal,
cilantro.
S9 Pho Taek 22.95
Seafood lover -Shrimps, Fish, Calamari, Scallops, and Mussels in hot/sour broth, mushroom,
lemongrass, galangai, ginger, kaffir leaves, chopped onion and cilantro.
Curry
(serves with rice)

Chicken, coconut milk/red curry, bamboo shoots, green beans, bell peppers, zucchini,
carrots, fresh Thai basil.
C2 Green Curry 15.95
Chicken, coconut milk/green curry, bamboo shoots, green beans, bell peppers, zucchini,
carrots, fresh Thai basil.
C3 Yellow Curry 15.95
Chicken, coconut milk/yellow curry, potatoes, onions, carrots, topped with scallion and
crispy onions.
C4 Panang Curry 15.95
Chicken, coconut milk/panang curry, green beans, bell peppers, zucchini, sprinkle with shredded
kaffir lime leaves.
C5 Mussaman Curry 15.95
Chicken, coconut milk/mussaman curry, potatoes, onions, carrots, roasted peanuts.
C6 Pineapple Curry 19.95
Shrimps, coconut milk/red curry, pineapples, bell peppers, tomatoes, sprinkle with
shredded kaffir lime leaves.
Mr. Thai Bistro
Noodle

crushed peanuts on the side.
N2 Pad See Ew 14.95
Chicken, flat rice noodles, egg, broccoli, carrots, cabbage, stir fried in light brown sauce.
N3 Drunken Noodles 14.95
Chicken, flat rice noodles, egg, onions, bell peppers, tomatoes, stir fried in special brown sauce,
fresh Thai basil.
N4 Kua Gai Noodles 14.95
Chicken, flat rice noodles, egg, onions, stir fried in mild tasty sauce on a bed of crispy lettuce.
N5 Pad Woon Sen (Glass Noodles) 16.95
Chicken, glass noodles, egg, cabbage, onion, tomatoes, carrot, cilantro, celery, stir fried with seasoning.
N6 Khao Soy (Popular Northern Thai Noodles) 16.95
Egg noodles, chicken, topped with red/yellow curry coconut sauce, sprinkled with chopped
pickled mustard greens, chopped red/green onions and crispy noodles.
N7 Thai Egg Noodles 18.95
Egg noodles, ground chicken, shrimps, bean sprouts, chopped onions and cilantro, mixed with
special sauce; serves on a bed of lettuce.

R4 Basil Fried Rice 15.95
Chicken, stir fried rice with egg, onions, bell peppers, and Thai basil.

scallions.

E2 Pad Pik King 15.95
Chicken, saute’ed with green beans, bell peppers, carrots, zucchini; in spicy Pik King sauce.
E3 Pad Garlic/Black Pepper 15.95
Chicken, saute’ed with fresh garlic, black pepper, green beans, carrots; on a bed of lettuce.
E4 Pad Ginger 15.95
Chicken, saute’ed with fresh julienned ginger, mushrooms, onions, bell peppers,
zucchini, carrots.
E5 Pad Basil (Pad Ka Prow) 15.95
Sliced or Ground Chicken, saute’ed with green beans, bell peppers, onions, Thai basil

Chicken, saute’ed with pineapples, carrots, bell peppers, cucumbers,
tomatoes, zucchini.

Chicken or Tofu, saute’ed with veggies for simple taste and healthy choice.

Chicken, saute’ed and topped with peanut sauce, steamed broccoli and fresh spinach.

Beef, saute’ed with broccoli, carrots, topped with crispy garlic.

Shrimps, saute’ed with eggplants, bell peppers, onions, and Thai basil.

Z2 Crispy Orange Chicken 16.95

Crispy chicken served with Panang sauce on the side, steamed broccoli, zucchini, green beans

Shrimps with Pumpkin, veggies, coconut milk, and basil in red curry.

Crispy fried fish topped with papaya salad and roasted peanuts.

Grilled Salmon fillet in coconut milk/red curry, mixed veggies, Thai basil, topped with coconut

Shrimps, Scallops, fish, calamary, mussels, egg, cabbage, in red curry coconut

Awards
Join Our Team
Click here to download our employment application!
Aetna – Machine Readable Files (MRFs)
This link leads to the machine-readable files that are made available in response to the federal Transparency in Coverage Rule and includes negotiated service rates and out-of-network allowed amounts between health plans and healthcare providers. The machine-readable files are formatted to allow researchers, regulators, and application developers to access and analyze data more easily.
About Us
We Started As A Pizza Place...
In 1985 we started a small neighborhood tavern in Mesa called Gallagher's.  At that time, we figured the old building was perfect for a neighborhood bar... and we were right!
As the original Sports Grills in Arizona, we have a unique variety of the valley’s best 1/2 lb. angus hamburgers, wings, salads, a collection of favorites, and a diverse menu that’s so good you’ll forget about the game you wanted to see and think more about the food you came to eat. We have dozens of TV’s and a friendly wait staff to help make your visit great!
©2024 Gallagher's. All Rights Reserved.

Opened in 1989 in the shadow of Arizona’s most famous mountain. Centered around scratch made comfort food with a culinary twist & impeccable service.
This combination has kept our neighbors coming back for over 35 years.  The Biltmore area’s casual place to hang with their neighbors for a crafted brew, a glass of wine and our signature food.

About

RESERVATION
GALLERY
Press
☰
VIBRANT FRENCH MEDITERRANEAN CUISINE
PHOENIX BEST FRENCH RESTAURANT
about vibrant french mediterranean cuisine
About
Airy, elegant FRANCINE, which sits in the luxury wing of Scottsdale Fashion Square, exudes the charms of le midi (the south of France), homeland to celebrity chef-founder Laurent Halasz who re-creates specialties of the region, including Grilled Octopus, Sea Salt Crust Branzino, Steak Frite, Rosemary Lamb Chops and Seared Tuna Salad.
Halasz, who was raised in the South of France amidst the bounty of simple and soulful cuisine draws inspiration from his birthplace. FRANCINE is a spirited and loving homage to days spent in the sun and amongst gatherings around beautiful meals hosted by his mother Francine Halasz. Everything on my mother’s table was fresh, seasonal, and full of flavor, and that is exactly what FRANCINE offers our guests.

name: Tarbell's The Tavern
address: 3209 E Camelback Rd, Phoenix, AZ 85018
raw_text:
Starters Things We Like to Eat
Soup of the Day - 8 Hand Made Agnolotti with chèvre, spinach, Compari tomatoes, Parmesan -16
Bruschetta Three Ways - 11 Markito’s Chilaquiles with chicken, chile sauce, Cotija, salsa verde, sunny-side-up egg - 19
Classic Tomato, Olive Tapenade, Chef's Choice Ricotta Gnudi with slow-roasted pork, farmer's veggies and pork jus - 17
Avocado Toast with cumin and sea salt on Noble bread - 5 Seared Scottish Salmon w/honey-mustard glaze, curried potato cake, sautéed asparagus - 18
Deviled Eggs with whipped Dijon aioli mousse - 7 Damn Good Bowl of Noodles
#1 Grade Tuna Tartare with miso aioli, house-made ponzu, soy beans and carrots – 16 • Vegetable - 14 • Chicken - 19 • Pork - 17 • Octopus- 24
Edamame, Carrot and Cabbage Slaw with Miso-ponzu dressing - 10 Green Chile Pork Stew w/tomatilla salsa, Cotija cheese, fresh cilantro, tortilla chips - 21
*Scallop Ceviche (Top Ten Best Dish - Arizona Republic) - 17 Spice-Rubbed Flat Iron Steak with Comté potato puree and sautéed asparagus - 29
Sliced diver scallop marinated in fresh lime juice with
coconut milk, sweet potato, chile sauce, tortilla chips
Tavern Classics
Cheese & Charcuterie Board - 16
Artisan cheeses, house-cured meats and pickles, fruits, nuts, veggies & crackers Sandwiches
Crispy Chicken Lettuce Wrap with Fresh Slaw & Sweet Chile Vinaigrette - 14
Grilled Cheese with White Cheddar & Organic Tomato Bisque - 13
Salads Fresh Maine Lobster Roll - 21
Sweet aioli-tossed lobster (Also available in lettuce wrap)
Roasted Local Beets with Crow's Dairy "quark", chive, and local greens - 8
The Best BLT in Phoenix (Arizona Republic) - 13
The Wedge with Iceberg, bleu cheese dressing and bacon - 10
Burgers - available on Challah bun, in lettuce wrap, or salad style
*Kale Caesar with aged Parmesan and cornbread croutons - 9
*The American Classic - Single 11 / Double 14 (Best Burger - Eater NYC)
Avocado & Grapefruit with Boston Bibb and Arizona honey-citrus vinaigrette - 11
Secret sauce, traditional fixings, American cheese
Mixed Greens with candied pecans, grapes, Crow's Dairy goat cheese
Grilled Scottish Salmon with crème fraîche and tomato jam - 14
and sour cherry vinaigrette - 10
Lamb with mint aioli, Crow’s Dairy goat feta, caramelized onion, cured tomato - 15
*Patty Melt on Rye - 13
Supplement any Salad with a Grilled Chicken Breast ($9) or Seared Salmon Filet ($12)
Sloppy Joe Sliders with American Cheese - 12 Topped with sunny-side-up egg - 13
Tacos
Sides Toasted hand-made corn tortilla, shredded cabbage, chile sauce, Cotija cheese, salsa verde
 Chipotle Marinated Chicken - 6
Sautéed Green Beans with cilantro-mirin aioli - 6  Spanish Octopus with Charred Tomato Sauce - 9
Thick House-Cut Fries with Sriracha Ketchup - 7  Grilled Rock Shrimp - 9
House-Made Kennebec Chips - 5  Slow Roasted Pork al Pastor with charred pineapple & guajillo chiles - 6
Thin Crispy Fries - 6  Beef Barbacoa with toasted chiles and cumin - 6
Chicharróns - 5
*May contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Eating raw or undercooked eggs, poultry, seafood, shellfish or beef may cause a food borne illness especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Desserts
The Tavern's desserts are made in house
House-Made Coconut Cream Pie (Top Ten All American Treat - azcentral) - 7
Grateful Spoon Vanilla Ice Cream (chocolate sauce, whipped cream, or cherries) - 6
Abita Root Beer Float - 8
Left Hand Nitro Milk Stout Float (must be 21 or older) - 9
Pumpkin Pie with Candied Pecans and Grateful Spoon Gelato - 7
Cinnamon Spiced Chocolate Mousse with Salted Caramel & Whipped Cream - 8
Cocktails 2.0 - 11
The Mule Ginger-Lime with Dubonnet Rouge, Bonal Apéritif in the classic copper mug
The Spritz Pick Your Base: Lillet Blanc / Cappaletti / Dolin Blanc / Dubonnet Rouge
Pick Your Bitter: Grape fruit / Orange / Cherry / Angostura / Peychaud’s
with shaved ice and a fruit garnish
Bittersweet Symphony Bitter and floral apéritifs, the sweet effervescence of soda, a jammy vermouth
Fun With Beer - 9
Sofie-Mosa Freshly squeezed OJ & Goose Island Farmhouse Ale – a great twist on tradition
The Bul A Cuban classic with a touch of ginger and lime
The Radler A German favorite – your choice of Lager or Hefeweizer with citrus soda
Zen - 7
Sake Basil Fresh flavors of basil and lime with the smooth finish of sake
Sake Champagne Everything you’d expect - bubbly, fresh, fun
Mojito
Port Coffee Take a Walk on the Wine Store Side
and bring a bottle back to your table…

Double Epresso - 5

Scottsdale, AZ
A CELEBRATION OF THE ISLAND LIFESTYLE
Soak up the island spirit at our North Scottsdale's Kierland Commons location. The patio and second-story outdoor dining rooms offers spectacular sunset views, while our seasonally-driven menu brings you fresh and delectable island flavors. Reservations are recommended, but walk-ins are welcome.

Home to the Freshest kabobs in Phoenix.
Kabob Grill N' Go is our family-owned restaurant that specializes in Mediterranean / Armenian cuisine.
Our recipes are a combination of generations, old and new, honoring the tradition of authentic cuisine with a bit of southwestern flair. Our food is prepared daily and cooked to order over a Mesquite Wood flame to perfection. For the best experience,
we recommend ordering ahead by phone.
Combos
Each combo comes with over one pound of meat, white basmati rice, shirazi salad, grilled veggies and choice of dip.
+

Beef seasoned with onions, green/red bell pepper and spices, charbroiled to perfection over a mesquite flame.

$26.99

Cook time 10-15 minutes

We Cater Events Too.
Please provide at least a 24-hour minimum notice when placing a catering order. A 50% deposit is required for all catering orders prior to completion. We accept all major credit cards and cash payments.
Catering
Catering orders are limited to 40 guests or more with optional, on-site cooking for 20% of order total. Free pickup for all catering orders. Delivery offered for 10% of order total within a 5 mile radius of the restaurant.
