Sesame tempura fried with spicy black bean hoisin sauce, toasted cashew, scallions, cilantro and Sriracha aioli.
BEER BATTERED CHEESE CURDS
Crispy fried cheese curds in tempura batter. Served with sweet jalapeño jam and Sriracha dipping sauce.
PORK CARNITAS TACOS
Slow roasted pork, roasted tomatillo salsa, chipotle Napa slaw, Cotija, pickled radish, and white corn tortillas.
AHI POKE STACK*
Ahi tuna marinated in soy, Sriracha chili, sweet onions, avocado, nori, scallions, sesame oil and Hawaiian sea salt. Layered with rice, soy ginger and Sriracha aioli with wonton chips.
HAND-BREADED CHICKEN TENDERLOINS
Served with Sriracha and peppercorn ranch dipping sauces.
GRILLED SALMON CAKES
Fresh salmon, celery and onions coated with panko bread crumbs and flat top grilled. Topped with Sriracha aioli, balsamic marinated tomatoes and arugula.
SPICY FRIED CHICKEN SLIDERS
Marinated with jalapeno and buttermilk, dusted in spicy flour, crispy-fried and topped with chipotle Napa slaw and dill pickles.
GRILLED BURGER SLIDERS*
Beef sliders served with lettuce, tomato, cheddar, pickles and burger sauce.
CALIFORNIA ROLL
Crab, avocado, cucumber, sticky rice rolled in nori and sesame seeds.
SPICY TUNA ROLL*
Ahi tuna mixed with Sriracha, green onion & cilantro rolled in sticky rice and nori. Served with fried lotus root, soy glaze, Sriracha aioli, pickled ginger and sesame.
DEEP FRIED PICKLES
Served with Sriracha fry sauce.
PEPPERONI & FOUR CHEESE FLATBREAD
Italian pepperoni, roma tomato sauce and our four cheese blend.
*Items are served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, seafood, shell fish, eggs or poultry may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
SHAREABLE DESSERTS
DEEP DISH CHOCOLATE PORTER BROWNIE**
Double chocolate porter brownie with pecans, caramel and chocolate fudge sauce, baked in a cast iron skillet. Served with premium vanilla ice cream.
WHISKEY BING CHERRY BREAD PUDDING
Baked with whiskey and dried Bing cherries. Served with whipped cream and whiskey caramel sauce.
CRÈME BRÛLÉE
Rich French vanilla bean custard with hand-fired sugar crust.
CINNAMON SUGAR CHURROS & ICE CREAM
Vanilla ice cream, Abuelita Mexican chocolate, mint sprig.
HOT FUDGE SUNDAE**
A classic favorite with two scoops of vanilla ice cream, rich hot fudge, candied walnuts, whipped cream and a Bordeaux cherry.
WHISKEY APPLE CRUMBLE**
Whiskey glazed Granny Smith apples, baked with a cinnamon-pecan streusel topping, vanilla ice cream and salted caramel sauce.
DESSERT COCKTAILS
ESPRESSO MARTINI
New Amsterdam Vodka, Mr. Black cold brew coffee liqueur, Kahlúa, simple syrup and fresh brewed coffee.
SALTED CARAMEL MOROCCAN COFFEE
151 Rum, Kahlúa, Baileys Irish cream, butterscotch liqueur, caramel, coffee, Kosher salt and whipped cream.
BAILEYS CHOCOLATE ESPRESSO MARTINI
Baileys Chocolate liqueur, Mr. Black cold brew coffee liqueur, Smirnoff vodka, simple syrup, fresh brewed coffee and chocolate swirl.
**Recipe contains nuts. For those who have food allergies, please inform your server. We will be happy to discuss any necessary changes.
BREAKFAST COCKTAILS
CLASSIC BLOODY MARY
New Amsterdam Vodka, tomato juice and Demitri's spices.
SRIRACHA BLOODY MARY
New Amsterdam Vodka, Sriracha, tomato juice and Demitri's spices.
BACON BLOODY MARY
New Amsterdam Vodka, tomato juice, Demitri's spices, pepper bacon, olive, onion, cherry tomato, pepperoncini, and celery.
SALTED CARAMEL MOROCCAN COFFEE
151 rum, Kahlua, Bailey's Irish Cream, Butterscotch liqueur, caramel, coffee and Kosher salt.
TITO'S SCREWDRIVER
The original breakfast cocktail, Tito's Handcrafted Vodka and OJ.
HIBISCUS VODKA BREEZE
Hibiscus purée, muddled basil, orange & lime, New Amsterdam Vodka, Malibu Coconut Rum, lemonade and Sprite.
ICED ESPRESSO COCKTAIL
New Amsterdam Vodka, Kahlua, espresso liqueur, cold brew coffee, cream and simple syrup served over ice.
TAJIN MICHELADA COCKTAIL
Dos Equis Lager, Bloody Mary spiced tomato juice, lime and a Tajin rim poured over ice.
CLASSIC MIMOSA
Fresh orange juice and Wycliff Brut Champagne.
PASSIONFRUIT MIMOSA
Fresh passion fruit juice and Wycliff Brut Champagne.
BLOOD ORANGE MIMOSA
Blood orange puree and Wycliff Brut Champagne.
RASPBERRY MIMOSA
Raspberry puree and Wycliff Brut Champagne.
GRAPEFRUIT MARTINI
Grapefruit puree and Wycliff Brut Champagne.
ESPRESSO MARTINI
New Amsterdam Vodka, Mr. Black cold brew coffee liqueur, Kahlua, simple syrup and fresh brewed coffee.
MIMOSA BY THE BOTTLE
Bottle of Wycliff Brut with a choice of orange, grapefruit, pineapple, cranberry, blood orange, or raspberry juice. Choice of Wycliff Brut or LaMarca Prosecco.
BREAKFAST
SPICY FRIED CHICKEN & WAFFLES
Marinated in jalapeno buttermilk batter, crispy-fried, with a Belgian waffle, maple pepper bacon, and maple syrup.
CINNAMON SUGAR DONUT HOLES
Deep fried and tossed in cinnamon sugar. Served with strawberry-orange glaze and Mexican chocolate dipping sauce.
AVOCADO TOAST*
Seeded whole wheat bread and avocado mash with Cotija cheese and red pepper flakes. +1 egg / +2 eggs
IRISH WHISKEY FRENCH TOAST
Dipped in cinnamon, whiskey, and Irish cream egg batter, coated with crunchy flakes and grilled with whipped cream and whiskey syrup. Maple Syrup available for those under 21.
SAVORY BREAKFAST TACOS
Chorizo & scrambled eggs, pepper jack cheese, poblano peppers, avocado, pico de gallo, cilantro sour cream and Cotija wrapped in white corn tortillas. Served with Santa Fe bacon black beans, chips and salsa roja.
SPINACH & FETA CHEESE OMELETTE
Fresh spinach, tomatoes, Swiss cheese and feta in a 3-egg omelet with hollandaise sauce and roasted breakfast potatoes.
EGGS BENEDICT
Grilled Challa bread, Canadian bacon, poached eggs, and lemon hollandaise with roasted breakfast potatoes.
ADOBO PORK BENEDICT
Jalapeno corn bread, red chili pork, guajillo sauce, poached eggs and chipotle hollandaise with roasted breakfast potatoes.
SOUTHERN FRIED CHICKEN BENEDICT*
Spicy fried chicken, Belgian waffle, poached eggs and Nashville hollandaise. Garnished with jalapeños and served with breakfast potatoes.
HUEVOS RANCHEROS*
Flour tortillas, red chili pork, Santa Fe bacon black beans, cheddar, jack and Cotija cheeses, fried eggs, Pico de Gallo, scallions, ranchero sauce and cilantro sour cream. Served with roasted breakfast potatoes.
SPANISH CHILAQUILES*
Crisp corn tortillas sautéed with roasted tomato salsa, guajillo sauce, fried eggs, chorizo, Santa Fe bacon black beans, cheddar, jack and Cotija cheese topped with avocado, cilantro sour cream, Pico de Gallo and jalapenos.
CLASSIC FRIED EGG & BACON SANDWICH*
Fried eggs, pepper bacon, sharp white and yellow cheddar, avocado and chipotle mayo on grilled bianco bread. Served with fresh hand-cut fries.
BREAKFAST BURRITO
Three eggs, chorizo, peppers, Santa Fe bacon black beans, onion, jalapenos, pasilla chilies, cheddar and pepper jack cheeses, ranchero sauce, chipotle aioli and cilantro rolled in a jumbo flour tortilla. Served with roasted breakfast potatoes.
CORNED BEEF HASH
Braised corn beef, caramelized onions, red peppers, Swiss cheese and poached eggs with roasted breakfast potatoes. Served with rustic bianco toast.
FARMHOUSE BREAKFAST*
Three eggs cooked to order, grilled spicy sausage or maple pepper bacon, roasted breakfast potatoes and rustic Bianco toast.
LIONS BREAKFAST BURGER*
Grilled 1/2lb burger, maple bacon, smoked ham, fried egg, cheddar cheese, arugula and tomato on ciabatta bread with chipotle aioli and French fries.
I.P.A. BEER BATTERED FISH & CHIPS
Lagunitas IPA battered, served with Napa slaw, lemon caper tartar sauce and fries.
LIMITED LUNCH
STARTERS
ARTICHOKE SPINACH DIP
Reggiano cream, chopped artichokes, jalapeños and roasted garlic with melted mozzarella and white corn tortilla chips.
BACON WRAPPED BBQ SHRIMP
Served with Black Butte BBQ sauce, Napa slaw and cilantro lime vinaigrette.
HAND-BREADED CHICKEN TENDERLOINS
Served with Sriracha and peppercorn ranch dipping sauces.
SPICY FRIED CHICKEN SLIDERS
Marinated with jalapeño & buttermilk, dusted in spicy flour, crispy-fried and topped with chipotle Napa slaw and dill pickles.
OVEN BAKED GIANT PRETZEL
Soft pretzel with scratch made beer cheese, jalapeño jam & sweet mustard sauce.
CREAMY QUESO DIP
Cheddar, jack and pepper jack cheese, simmered with roasted jalapeños, onion and tomatoes. Served with white corn tortilla chips.
BEER BATTERED CHEESE CURDS
Crispy fried cheese curds in tempura batter. Served with sweet jalapeño jam and Sriracha dipping sauce.
CHICKEN WINGS
Sauce Options: Old School Buffalo, Korean BBQ or Dry Spice Rub. Served with choice of Blue Cheese, Ranch or Sriracha sauce.
SALADS
SOUTHWEST SMOKED CHICKEN
Mesquite smoked chicken, roasted sweet corn, red peppers, avocado, marinated jicama, grape tomatoes, fresh greens and cabbage tossed with cilantro lime vinaigrette. Topped with Cotija cheese and crispy tortilla strips.
ROASTED CHICKEN COBB SALAD
Fresh greens, radicchio, arugula, roasted chicken, pepper bacon, avocado, Kalamata olives, Gorgonzola, grape tomatoes, egg, roasted corn and blue cheese vinaigrette.
AHI POKE BOWL*  **
Soy marinated Ahi tuna poke, sushi rice, Napa slaw, avocado, carrot, cucumber, pickled radish and jalapeños, fresh mango, onion, cilantro, daikon, nori, sesame seeds, ginger soy glaze and Thai peanut vinaigrette.
CLASSIC CAESAR*
Romaine, arugula, radicchio, grana parmesan, ciabatta croutons, parmesan crisp and Caesar dressing. + Grilled Chicken + Grilled Shrimp + Grilled Salmon + Grilled Steak*
SANDWICHES
SMOKED TURKEY CLUB
Peppered smoked turkey, maple bacon, pepper jack cheese, avocado, tomato, lettuce and chipotle aioli on grilled rustic bianco bread.
GREEN CHILI CHICKEN & AVOCADO
Roasted pasilla chilies, avocado, cilantro, jalapeños, pepper jack, cotija cheese, spicy Napa slaw and chipotle aioli on grilled rustic bianco bread.
SPICY FRIED CHICKEN*
Marinated with jalapeño and buttermilk, dusted in spicy flour, crispy fried and topped with chipotle Napa slaw and dill pickles on grilled ciabatta.
CLASSIC REUBEN
Braised corned beef brisket, peppered sauerkraut, Swiss cheese and 1000 island on grilled rustic rye.
FRENCH DIP
Slow roasted beef and melted provolone on parmesan crusted ciabatta with rosemary au jus and horseradish cream.
BURGERS
Gluten Free Bun Available Upon Request
CHEESEBURGER*
Choice of cheddar, Swiss or pepper jack cheese, with pickles and burger sauce served on a toasted brioche bun. Add Pepper Bacon
Jalapeño Pepper Jack Burger*
Melted pepper jack cheese, jalapeños, Tabasco onion strings, fresh guacamole and chipotle aioli served on a toasted brioche bun.
BBQ WHITE CHEDDAR BURGER*
Black Butte BBQ sauce, white cheddar cheese, crispy onion strings and garlic aioli served on a toasted brioche bun.
GASTROPUB BURGER*
Gorgonzola infused burger with grilled sweet onion, maple pepper bacon, white cheddar, arugula and horseradish cream served on a toasted brioche bun.
BEYOND BURGER™
Plant based protein burger grilled with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, dill pickles, 1000 Island and served on a toasted brioche bun.

STARTERS
ARTICHOKE SPINACH DIP
Reggiano cream, chopped artichokes, jalapeños and roasted garlic with melted mozzarella and fresh vegetables.
BACON WRAPPED SHRIMP
Wrapped in pepper bacon and served with Napa Slaw and cilantro lime vinaigrette, topped with green onion curls.
CREAMY QUESO DIP
Roasted jalapeños, onion, tomatoes, simmered with cheddar, jack and pepper jack. Served with fresh vegetables.
SAUTÉED BRUSSELS SPROUTS
Sautéed with pepper bacon, red onions, olive oil, seasonings and Reggiano.
SPICY TUNA ROLL*
Sriracha, green onion, cilantro, sticky rice, nori,  Sriracha aioli, pickled ginger and sesame.
SALADS
SEARED AHI SALAD*
Spice rubbed and seared rare on romaine, arugula and radicchio with red peppers, cucumbers, Napa cabbage, edamame, Mandarin oranges, mango, cilantro and wasabi ginger vinaigrette.
ROASTED CHICKEN COBB SALAD
House greens, radicchio, arugula, roasted chicken, pepper bacon, avocado, Kalamata olives, Gorgonzola, grape tomatoes, egg, roasted corn and blue cheese vinaigrette.
SOUTHWEST SMOKED CHICKEN
Mesquite smoked chicken, roasted sweet corn, red peppers, avocado, marinated jicama, grape tomatoes, fresh greens and cabbage tossed with cilantro lime vinaigrette. Topped with Cotija cheese.
BRUSSELS SPROUTS, QUINOA & ROASTED CHICKEN**
Roasted chicken, brussels sprouts, arugula, quinoa, cranberries, candied walnuts, currants, Asiago cheese and pomegranate vinaigrette.
GARDEN POWER BOWL
Arugula, shaved Brussel sprouts, quinoa, brown rice, edamame, garbanzo beans, avocado, cucumber, tomato, red pepper, radish and lemon basil vinaigrette. + Grilled Chicken + Grilled Shrimp + Grilled Salmon + Grilled Steak*
BURGERS & SANDWICHES
Served on a toasted gluten-free bun with lettuce, tomato, onion and your choice of Napa slaw or small house salad.
CHEESEBURGER*
Choice of cheddar, Swiss or pepper jack cheese, with pickles and burger sauce. Add Pepper Bacon
JALAPENO PEPPER JACK BURGER*
Melted pepper jack cheese, jalapenos, fresh guacamole and chipotle aioli.
BEYOND BURGER™
Plant based protein burger grilled with melted cheddar cheese, dill pickles and 1000 Island.
GREEN CHILI CHICKEN & AVOCADO SANDWICH
Roasted pasilla chilies, avocado, cilantro, jalapenos, pepper jack, Cotija cheese, spicy Napa slaw and chipotle aioli.
KITCHEN SPECIALTIES
BAJA STYLE TACOS
Three tacos with sautéed cod, shrimp or pork carnitas, chipotle aioli, cilantro lime slaw, pico de gallo, Cotija cheese and white corn tortillas. Served with Santa Fe bacon black beans.
GRILLED ATLANTIC SALMON*
Roasted garlic herb butter, fresh lemon and served with jasmine cilantro rice and seasonal vegetables.
GRILLED RIBEYE STEAK*
12oz. Center cut ribeye seasoned with our rub, garlic butter and served with seasonal vegetables and chef’s accompaniment. Add grilled shrimp

**Recipe contains nuts. For those who have food allergies, please inform your server. We will be happy to discuss any necessary changes.
LUNCH/DINNER
CHICKEN STRIPS
Chicken tenders breaded then deep fried to a golden brown and served with French fries and ranch dipping sauce.
FISH & CHIPS
Crispy cod served with tartar sauce and French fries.
SPICY CHICKEN SLIDERS
Tender chicken marinated in spicy buttermilk, dusted in seasoned flour, crispy fried, topped with chipotle aioli and dill pickles on a toasted brioche bun. Served with French fries.
BURGER SLIDERS
Two of our bite sized burgers, topped with cheddar cheese, burger sauce, and pickles. Served with French fries.
MAC & CHEESE
Creamy mac and cheese with three cheeses.
FOUR CHEESE FLATBREAD
Roma tomato sauce and our four cheese blend.
WEEKEND BRUNCH
KID'S BREAKFAST*
Two eggs any style with grilled bacon, roasted potatoes, and toast.
FRENCH TOAST
Coated with crunchy flakes and grilled. Topped with whipped cream and maple syrup.
BELGIAN WAFFLE
Served with butter, powdered sugar and maple syrup.
BEVERAGES
Apple or cranberry juice
Orange juice
Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Dr. Pepper, Lemonade or Milk
Roy Rogers, Shirley Temple, or strawberry lemonade

THE BAR MENU
CRAFT COCKTAILS, BEER & WINE
We dedicate ourselves to providing a breadth of wine varietals and vintners and high-quality beers on draft that are hand-selected for each region. Using only the freshest of produce, premium liquors, and hand-pressed juices and purees, we passionately create exceptional modern classics and signature cocktails.

Served with two cage free eggs any style, and your choice of bacon, sausage, turkey bacon, or chorizo.

Three ricotta pancakes layered with lemon curd, topped with house-made blueberry sauce, fresh blueberries, lemon zest, and signature whipped cream. Served with two cage free eggs any style, and your choice of bacon, sausage, turkey bacon, or chorizo.

Drink Menu
Coffee & Espresso Drinks
The JOJO Coffee blend is a signature coffee blend with chocolate and berry notes. It is a medium roast that is balanced. After several blind taste tests comparing local coffee brand favorites, the blend that was on the top of the lists was selected! It is truly the community favorite! Try one of our many craft coffee and espresso drinks in Old Town Scottsdale today.
Coffee Drinks
Served Iced 16 oz & Hot 12 oz

Served Iced 16 oz & Hot 12 oz

Cold brew steeped for 24 hours with our locally sourced signature coffee beans, flavored with salted caramel, oat milk, and drizzled with caramel sauce.
Pumpkin Spiced Latte (7) - Fall Menu
A warm and slightly spiced flavor from our pumpkin pie sauce is balanced by the bold notes of our signature espresso and creamy & slightly frothy notes of milk and whipped cream. Served Hot & Iced
Served Iced 16 oz or Hot 12 oz
S'mores Mocha (7) - fall Menu
A blend of espresso, chocolate, and toasted marshmallows brings your favorite campfire treat to a cup. Topped with whipped cream, chocolate drizzle, and graham cracker dust.
Served Hot & Iced
Toffee Nut Latte (7) - fall Menu
The Perfect balance of sweet toffee flavor, mellow nuttiness, and spices in an iced or hot latte.

Vanilla, honey drizzle, whole milk, topped with cinnamon.

Alcohol Menu
Signature Mimosas & handcrafted Cocktails
Enjoy your brunch with one of our JOJO Signature Mimosas, Mimosa Flights, or other craft cocktails
Mimosas (13)
Enjoy the full-size option of our mimosa flight signature flavors:
Traditional Orange
Cranberry-Lime
Peach Bellini
Apple-Cinnamon
Pineapple
JOJO Mimosa Flight (23)
Five 4 oz glasses of our signature, artisan mimosas: Traditional Orange, Cranberry-Lime, Peach Bellini, Pineapple,  and Apple-Cinnamon.
bloody mary cocktail (15)
Come in to JOJO  and try our housemade Bloody Mary, made and designed in house by our talented  team. This spicy and savory concoction has all the classic profiles you want, and a little more depth to lift it above the standard bloody mary.
apple cider sangria (13) - Fall Menu
A fruity, tangy, and crisp fall take on a classic red sangria garnished with chunks of apple and orange with a honey and cinnamon half rim.
Prickley pear margarita (14)
An electric purple cocktail made with the dessert flair of sweet and tangy prickly pear making for a perfect brunch margarita
Sunrise margarita (14)
JOJO's creative spin on a Margarita, introducing a tropical approach to the classic and refreshing southwestern cocktail. A great drink which pairs phenomenally with our "Breakfast Tacos"
Screwdriver cocktail (14)
Enjoy a refreshing Orange juice spiked screwdriver cocktail.  This daytime cocktail pairs well with a savory dish such as our traditional breakfast or breakfast burrito.

raw_text:
Menu | Duke's Sports Bar & Grill
Skip to content
Main Menu
MENU
Main Menu
MENU
Menu
STARTERS
Buffalo Cauliflower
Deep fried breaded Cauliflower bites topped with your choice of Buffalo sauce, hot, medium, mild or honey hot topped with blue cheese crumbles served with ranch or bleu cheese dressing 12.99
Poutine
Bowl full of crispy french fries topped with fresh cheese curds topped with a savory brown gravy. 11.99 | With Verde chicken, ground beef, or grilled chicken 15.99
WINGS, WINGS, WINGS
A full pound of fried bad boys: hot, medium, mild, teriyaki sauce, BBQ, or honey hot. 15.99 Half Order 10.99
Mozzarella Logs
Whole milk mozzarella, hand-breaded and deep fried to a golden deliciousness. Served with marinara sauce or ranch dressing. 13.99
Chicken Tenders, hand-breaded
Chicken breast fillets, beer battered and deep fried, served with a side of hand cut french fries with one dipping sauce. Buffalo Style Add .75 | 14.99
Chili Queso Dip
Duke’s prime chili combined with a Nacho Cheese sauce served with tortilla chips. 11.99
Foot-O-Rings
A foot of beer battered onion rings served with ranch dressing, chipotle ranch, and salsa ranch. 12.99
Supreme Nachos
Duke’s homemade tortilla chips covered with a Nacho Cheese sauce, black olives, tomatoes, and jalapenos, served with guacamole and salsa. 12.99
With Verde chicken, ground beef, or grilled chicken. 17.99
Chili Cheese Fries
A mound of french fries smothered with Duke’s famous chili, Nacho Cheese sauce, and topped with green onions. 12.99
Duke’s Skins3
Covered with melted cheeses, bacon, and chives served with a choice of sour cream or ranch. 10.99
Battered Zucchini
Slices of fresh zucchini dipped in a home-style batter then fried for crispiness with a side of ranch or blue cheese. 12.99
Irish Nachos
Crispy french fries covered with Nacho Cheese sauce, crispy bacon, and green onions. Served with choice of ranch dressing or sour cream. 12.99
Quesadilla
Giant Flour tortilla filled with mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, onions, and tomatoes.12.99
With Verde chicken, ground beef, or grilled chicken. 17.99
SIGNATURES
Fish and Chips
Homemade beer battered cod, fries and coleslaw served with tartar sauce. 15.99
Sliders
Delicious bite size steamed sliders with sauteed onions, pickle and your choice of cheese. 4 for 12.99
BURGERS
All Burgers are cooked medium to better.
Served with choice of fries, tater tots, coleslaw, loaded potato salad, small salad or a cup of soup.
Substitute Impossible Burger  2.99          Gluten free bun $2.00
The Super Burger
A half pound patty with lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, and mayo. 14.99
Egg McDuke Burger
Duke’s Super Burger with a fried egg and your choice of cheese with mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickle, and onion. 16.99
California Burger
Duke’s Super Burger topped with Swiss cheese, bacon, and guacamole with lettuce, tomato, pickle, and onion. 16.99
Turkey Burger
A lean turkey patty with choice of cheese, mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickle, and onion. 14.99
Southwest Burger
Green chilies and pepper jack cheese atop our Super Burger with chipotle mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickle and onion. 16.99
Western Burger
Duke’s Super Burger with choice of cheese, bacon, onion rings, BBQ sauce with mayo, lettuce, tomato, and pickle. 16.99
Wild One Chili Burger
Duke’s Super Burger open faced, loaded with our famous chili, onions, and melted grated cheeses. 16.99
Garden Veggie Burger
Meatless, low fat, no cholesterol and 100% natural with lettuce, tomato, pickle and onion. 14.99
SANDWICHES
Buffalo Chicken Sandwich
Grilled or homemade beer battered boneless chicken breast marinated in Duke’s wing sauce. 14.99
Cordon Bleu Sandwich
Ham and melted Swiss over a grilled or beer battered chicken breast with a honey horseradish sauce, lettuce, tomato, onion and pickle. 16.99
Breaded Pork Tenderloin Sandwich
Breaded pork tenderloin with mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickle and onion. 14.99
“The Dip”
Slices of Italian beef and caramelized onions on a French baguette with au jus on the side. 14.99
– Add cheese, mushrooms, or Italian peppers for .50 each
Grilled Cheese
On grilled sourdough, wheat or marble rye. 11.99
Club Special
Delicious layers of turkey, ham, and bacon with lettuce and tomato served on sourdough, wheat, or marble rye. 14.99
Duke’s BLT
Bacon, lettuce, tomato and don’t forget the mayo on toasted sourdough, wheat or marble rye. 14.99. Add Avocado .99
Turkey Guacamole
Bacon, tomatoes, Swiss cheese, and loads of turkey on grilled sourdough. 15.99
Patty Melt
Duke’s Super Burger served with grilled onions and melted swiss cheese on grilled marble rye. 14.99
Italian Beef Melt
Italian Beef on grilled sourdough served with pepper jack cheese, caramelized onions, and giardiniera mixed Italian peppers. 14.99
SALADS
Crispy Chicken Salad

BONFIRE CATERING EVENT GUIDELINES
Availability:
Bonfire offers catering 7 days a week, on-site and off-site
Event Spaces
•	Tempe: Large outdoor patio with seasonal comfort features (fans, misters, heaters, fire pits), large indoor dining room and an indoor event/game room. Any space will be ideal for private or semi-private events.
•	Surprise: Scenic outdoor patios with climate control features (fans, misters, heaters & firepits) and indoor space in the Main Dining Room, Bar or Bar Riser area. Any space will be ideal for private or semi-private events.
Booking & Fees
•	We do not charge room rental fees, but we may require food & beverage minimums and /or deposits.
•	Deposits are based on event size, date, and time.
•	Reservations may require a signed contract, deposit, and credit card on file
Policies
•	All event details (menu, headcount, timing, etc.) must be confirmed 7 days in advance.
•	Client is responsible for meeting minimums, attendance, and staying within time limits; additional charges apply if exceeded
•	Events can be canceled up to 48 hours in advance without penalty.
•	No-shows or low attendance may forfeit deposits on non-buffet events
Service Charges & Gratuity
•	On-site catering packages exclude tax and 20% gratuity (shared among staff).
•	A 20% auto gratuity may be added for parties of 6 or more (applies even with separate checks).
•	Credit card transactions may include a processing fee; cash discounts are available.
Contact
•	Chef Dave “Surprise” 480-369-1410•	Chef Kevin ” Tempe” 480-242-0157
Catering Takeout By the Tray Options
Our entrees and homemade sides are served in half deep or full medium pans. If multiple trays of the same item are ordered, we will combine them into full deep pans.
Each 1 pound of meat makes 3 sandwiches or 6 sliders
Half Tray feeds approx. 15 ppl
Full Tray feeds approx. 30 ppl
Rack of Ribs feeds (4) people (3 bones ea)

GOOD FOOD AND DRINKS
Menu
Wally’s offers a wide selection of freshly-made entrees for lunch and dinner.  We specialize in delicious American comfort food like homemade meatloaf piled high on buttery mashed potatoes, juicy choice beef burgers, zesty pastas, hot sandwiches and indulgent specialties like chicken marsala.  You’ll also find a range of libations from beer, wine, craft cocktails, and soft drinks, tea and coffee. Ready for the entire Wally’s dining experience? Make sure to start with one of our delectable choices of appetizers. Or better yet, life is short- start with dessert!
Looking for something on the leaner and greener side? We have a top selection of colorful, hearty and healthy salads.
For the pint-sized members of your squad, we have a kids menu that is sure to please even the pickiest eaters.
CURRENT MENU PRICING
NOTHING BRINGS PEOPLE TOGETHER LIKE GOOD FOOD

Main Menu

Store Locator

Kids Menu
Catering Menu
View Nutritional Info
Healthy Side Up
Wellness Wrap
Scrambled egg whites, sautéed spinach, red bell pepper and Feta cheese wrapped in a spinach tortilla. Served with fresh fruit. (670 cal)
vegetarian
Classic Avocado Toast
Thick sliced artisan grain bread lightly toasted and topped with fresh avocado, two poached eggs, and "everything but the bagel" seasoning. (500 cal)
vegetarian
Feta Avocado Toast
Thick sliced artisan grain bread lightly toasted and topped with fresh avocado, arugula, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and a balsamic drizzle. (660 cal)
With two poached eggs (+140 cal)
Smoked Salmon Avocado Toast
Artisan bread, smashed avocado, smoked salmon, pickled onions, capers, fresh dill, and lemon. (620 cal)
Spicy Vegan Bowl
Plant Based JUST Egg™ scrambled with spinach, mushroom, onion, green and red bell pepper over homefries and topped with plant based BEYOND SAUSAGE® hot Italian link, avocado and sriracha. (850 cal)
vegan
Steel Cut Oats
A steaming bowl of steel-cut oatmeal topped with strawberries, blueberries, sliced almonds, and organic agave syrup. (520 cal)
Acai Bowl
Acai berry sorbet topped with fresh strawberries, blueberries, bananas, granola, shredded coconut, and honey. (650 cal)
NEW! Make it Vegan:
Sub granola & honey for sliced almonds & organic agave. (700 cal)
vegan
Berry Yogurt Parfait
Low-fat vanilla yogurt layered with granola, fresh strawberries, and blueberries. (500 cal)
Breakfast Classics
Two Eggs...
The entrees below are served with a choice of: homefries (300 cal), hashbrowns (210 cal), fresh fruit (120 cal), Mexican rice (110 cal), refried beans (180 cal) or black beans (180 cal).
Then choose: fresh-baked biscuit (470 cal), blueberry muffin (480 cal), English muffin (102 cal), tortillas (280/380 cal) or toast (240-300 cal).
*Substitute egg whites (Subtract 110 cal).
Chicken Fried Steak & Eggs
Two eggs any style served with a 6 oz. breaded and fried ground beef patty smothered with our homemade country gravy. (720/740 cal)
New York Steak & Eggs
Two eggs any style served with an 8 oz. New York steak cooked to order. (570/600 cal)
American Breakfast
Two eggs any style with your choice of bacon, sausage or corned beef hash. (230-750 cal)
With Applewood-smoked bacon (230/260 cal)
With Canadian bacon or ground beef patty (250-590 cal)
Two Eggs Plus...
Two eggs any style (140/170 cal) plus your choice of side and bread from above.
Breakfast Craves
The entrees below are served with a choice of: homefries (300 cal), hashbrowns (210 cal), or fresh fruit. (120 cal)
Croissant Breakfast Sandwich
Applewood-smoked bacon, scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese and chipotle mayo on butter croissant. (1100 cal)
Monte Cristo
Grilled ham and Swiss cheese sandwiched between two extra-thick slices of French toast. Served with a side of raspberry sauce. (1440 cal)
Betty’s Southern Biscuit & Gravy
A homemade buttermilk biscuit smothered with country gravy and topped with bacon or sausage. (680-1080 cal)
Topped with two crispy fried chicken strips (780 cal)
Skillets
Hash Skillet
Home fried potatoes sauteéd with corned beef hash, onions and bell peppers. Topped with scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese, chopped bacon, and green onion. (810 cal)
Country Skillet
Home fried potatoes sauteéd with diced ham, bell peppers, and onions. Topped with cheddar cheese, sunny side up eggs and our homemade country gravy. (800 cal)
Ranchero Skillet
Home fried potatoes sauteéd with spicy chorizo, fresh chopped serrano peppers, and onions. Topped with Jack cheese, sunny side up eggs, avocado, red onion, cilantro, and ranchero sauce. (970 cal)
Meat Lovers Skillet
Homefries, diced ham, bacon, sausage, bell peppers, onions, scrambled eggs, Jack cheese, green onion. (1300 cal)
Omelets & Benedicts
Omelets
Omelets are served with a choice of: homefries (300 cal), hashbrowns (210 cal), fresh fruit (120 cal), Mexican rice (110 cal), refried beans (180 cal) or black beans (180 cal). Then choose: fresh-baked biscuit (470 cal), blueberry muffin (480 cal), English muffin (120cal), tortillas (280/380 cal) or toast (240-300 cal).
Sub egg whites on any omelet (subtracts 220 cal) +
Rancher
Bacon, homefries, green bell pepper, tomato, green onion. Topped with sour cream. (760 cal)
Greek
Egg white omelet filled with spinach, tomato, feta cheese, and kalamata olives. (300 cal)
vegetarian
No Name
Bacon, tomato, mushroom. Topped with avocado and sour cream. (770 cal)
Californian
Bacon, homefries, American cheese. Topped with avocado and sour cream. (1050 cal)
Mom
Spinach, mushroom, onion, red and green bell pepper. Topped with avocado, salsa fresca, and sour cream. (530 cal)
vegetarian
Mile High
Diced ham, green bell pepper, onion, American cheese. (720 cal)
El Fuego
Spicy chorizo, jalapeño, Jack cheese. Topped with salsa fresca and guacamole. (1110 cal)
Meat Lovers Omelet
Pepper Jack cheese, bacon, ham, sausage and green onion. (1420 cal)
Benedicts
The entrees below are served with a choice of: homefries (300 cal), hashbrowns (210 cal), fresh fruit (120 cal), Mexican rice (110 cal), refried beans (180 cal) or black beans (180 cal).
Choose Two...
Choose any two benedicts and get half of each one. Pick your favorites or try something new! (610-800 cal)
Classic Eggs Benedict
A toasted English muffin topped with Canadian bacon, poached eggs, and hollandaise sauce. (580 cal)
Caprese Benedict
A toasted English muffin topped with arugula, fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced tomato, poached eggs, hollandaise sauce, and a pesto basil drizzle. (720 cal)
vegetarian
Smoked Salmon Benedict
Smoked salmon, fresh dill, capers, arugula, poached eggs, and hollandaise on a toasted English muffin. (710 cal)
Golden State Benedict
A toasted English muffin topped with grilled tomato, avocado, applewood-smoked bacon, poached eggs, hollandaise sauce, and a sriracha drizzle. (700 cal)
Chicken & Waffle Benedict
Two Belgian waffle quarters topped with crispy chicken tenders, poached eggs, and hollandaise sauce. (640 cal)
Border Benedict
Poached eggs, seasoned carne asada, and sweet corn cakes topped with our homemade poblano sauce and fresh sliced jalapeño. (790 cal)
Sope Benedict
Fried sopes filled with shredded beef and topped with poached eggs, homemade ranchero sauce, sliced avocado, fresh salsa, cotija cheese and sour cream. (780 cal)
South of the Border
Machaca
Two eggs scrambled with onion, bell pepper, tomato, and shredded beef. Served with Mexican rice, refried beans and salsa fresca (750 cal). Choice of corn or flour tortillas. (adds 280/380 cal)
Huevos Rancheros
A grilled corn tortilla topped with two eggs over medium and our homemade ranchero sauce. Served with Mexican rice, refried beans and guacamole (650 cal). Choice of corn or flour tortillas. (adds 280/380 cal)
Huevos Con Chorizo
Two eggs scrambled with spicy chorizo. Served with Mexican rice, refried beans and salsa fresca (760 cal). Choice of corn or flour tortillas. (adds 280/380 cal)
Chilaquiles Bowl
Corn tortilla chips sauteéd with red or green sauce. Topped with Jack cheese, two eggs any style, red onion, cilantro, a drizzle of sour cream and a choice of shredded chicken or carne asada. (1740-1850 cal)
Cali Breakfast Burrito
Scrambled eggs, bacon, cheddar cheese, homefries, and avocado wrapped in flour, tortilla. Served with Mexican rice, refried beans, and salsa fresca. (1480 cal)
Fiesta Burrito
Scrambled eggs with onion, bell pepper, tomato, shredded beef, and cheddar cheese wrapped in a flour tortilla and smothered in our homemade salsa verde. Topped with avocado, salsa fresca, and sour cream. (1370 cal)
Baja Breakfast Tacos
Two corn tortillas filled with scrambled eggs and spicy chorizo. Topped with avocado, salsa fresca, and cotija cheese. Served with Mexican rice and black beans. (1060 cal)
Griddle Favs
Pancakes and Waffles...
Short Stack = 2 | Full Stack = 3
Belgian Waffle
Golden brown Belgian waffle sprinkled with powdered sugar and served with whipped butter. (390 cal)
With fresh bananas and whipped cream (480 cal)
With strawberry sauce and whipped cream (500 cal)
Waffle Sandwich
A Belgian waffle sandwich filled with scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese and applewood-smoked bacon (730 cal). Served with hashbrowns (210 cal) or fresh fruit (120 cal).
Chicken and Waffle
Crispy fried all-white meat chicken tenders served on a Belgian waffle with powdered sugar, syrup drizzle and whipped butter. (1110 cal)

Crunchy French Toast

Three thick slices of bread, griddled to a golden brown, sprinkled with powdered sugar and served with strawberry sauce. (960 cal)

Our fine dining menu is inspired by the classic American steakhouse, but we’re all about offering more than the status quo.
Dominick’s offers an upscale dining experience in the heart of Scottsdale.
Our skilled Master Butchers cut all our steaks in-house at our state-of-the-art, climate-controlled butcher shop for that perfect blend of quality and freshness. We
specialize
in the finest USDA Prime beef, both wet and dry-aged options, including top-grade Domestic, Australian Wagyu, and world-class shellfish.

Location & Hours
Download Menu
Group Dining
Catering Menu
Seasonal Menu
At True Food Kitchen, our menu is carefully crafted so that every bite and every refreshing sip serve up big flavor, an abundance of fresh ingredients and a taste of the unexpected. Our artisan chefs create crave-worthy classics alongside a steady rotation of seasonal offerings that take advantage of naturally ripe fruits and vegetables so their flavor is full and their nutrients, rich. Creative, hand-crafted beverages built around seasonality, quality ingredients and simple preparations complement every occasion from brunch, lunch, dinner and, of course, dessert. Always room for dessert.
Important Information About Our Menu
Menu pricing varies by location – to view location-specific menus, visit our
locations
page.
*These items may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Please be aware that our restaurants use gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, sesame, soy and wheat).
Our restaurants have shared cooking and preparation areas and the possibility exists for food items to come into contact with other food products. Due to these circumstances, we are unable to guarantee that any menu item can be completely free of allergens. In addition, while effort is made to keep our product information current and as complete as possible, it is possible that ingredient changes and substitutions may occur due to differences in regional suppliers, recipe revisions, preparation techniques, and/or the season of the year.
Before placing your order, please inform your server if someone in your party has a food allergy or a special dietary need and we will do our best to make accommodations.
View our nutritional guide
here
.

MCARTHUR'S RESTAURANT & BAR
A Century of Great Taste
Named in honor of Albert Chase McArthur; the Arizona Biltmore’s visionary architect, McArthur’s legacy is the storied past of the man that designed this uniquely fascinating and inspiring building to be a beautiful place where people feel equally beautiful. Today McArthur’s Restaurant & Bar walks in the footsteps of this century of good taste, providing our diners with a moment of escape from the everyday.
Open Daily for
Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch and Dinner
Family-Friendly   |
Full Bar
|
Outdoor Patio
|
Billiards, Shuffleboard, Foosball
The Heart of the Arizona Biltmore
Serving up a feast of New American Cuisine from morning coffee to late-night conversation, McArthur’s is the creative fusion of meticulously sourced ingredients in a menu of comforting delight. Like the Biltmore itself, this is a place of warm welcome sprinkled with iconic design for those who love to indulge in simple, uncommonly good food within elegant surroundings.
RESERVATIONS
Summer Specials
Enjoy our new menu items crafted for weeknights at McArthur’s.
Monday - Burgers & Beers
Tuesday - Tacos & Tequila
Wednesday - Little Italy
Late Night - Pizza & Salad
Explore the Menu
Sunday – Thursday 7 am – 9 pm
Friday & Saturday 7 am – 10 pm
Breakfast Menu
View Brunch Menu
View Lunch Menu
View Dinner Menu
View Dessert Menu
A Storied Past
In 1925, McArthur arrived in Phoenix and the future began. His brothers, Warren and Charles McArthur, had been pursuing the development of a major tourist hotel in Phoenix since the 1910s and, by 1928, the pieces were in place for what would become Albert Chase McArthur’s signature project and a Phoenix landmark; the Arizona Biltmore Hotel. Albert McArthur designed the Biltmore to be a beautiful building where people feel equally beautiful. The famous Biltmore blocks reflect Albert’s harmonies of light and color, the obsession first studied in his Harvard days.

(Simple but yet so complicated to explain the flavor). Fried corn tortillas chips sautéed with a fresh guajillo and pasilla roasted salsa. Topped with crema fresca, cotija cheese, sliced onions, and cilantro with two eggs cooked your way. (Don’t forget to Add protein )

Oven roasted potatoes with 4 scrambled eggs and 5 cheeses all folded on to a big flour tortilla, served with fire roasted salsa. (Don’t forget to Add protein )
FRENCH TOAST

3 half slices of thick Texas Brioche toast dipped into a rich creamy batter with hazelnut and vanilla flavor. Topped with berries and whip cream and caramel sauce. Served with a side of syrup. Don't forget to add your Bacon)

Open face omelette with lots of carnitas and mix cheese. Topped off with guacamole, crema fresca and cilantro. Served with roasted potatoes and 2 corn tortillas.

Princess Pita Mediterranean Restaurant
DINING MENU
Best Mediterranean Food in Mesa and phoenix metro area
Serving Mesa, Tempe, Scottsdale, Gilbert, chandler
Gyro Entree
Indulge in a delicious Mediterranean dish that is sure to satisfy your hunger and taste buds. Made with succulent slices of beef and lamb, fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a refreshing side of tzatziki sauce. The gyro entree is a classic favorite for many.
Order Now
Shawarma Combo
Enjoy a delicious and satisfying meal with our Shawarma Combo Entree. Sliced chicken breast and beef ribeye, marinated and grilled to perfection. The entree is served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Kabab Combo Entree
A tantalizing combo entree featuring a mouthwatering steak kabab skewer, a succulent skewer of chicken kabab, and a delectable kofta kabab. Served with rice, creamy hummus, crisp garden salad, and warm pita bread. Entree served with tahini sauce.
Order Now
Chicken Shawarma Entree
Indulge in the exotic flavors of the Chicken Shawarma Entree, a mouthwatering dish that transports you to the bustling streets of the Middle East. This delectable entree is made with tender and juicy marinated chicken breast, seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of garlic sauce.
Order Now
Beef Shawarma Entree
Indulge in a delicious and flavorful Beef Shawarma Entree that will transport your taste buds to the streets of the Middle East. This mouthwatering dish is made with tender, thinly sliced strips of marinated ribeye beef that are perfectly seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices and slowly cooked to perfection. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Chicken Kabab Entree
The Chicken Kabab Entree is a delicious and satisfying meal option that brings the flavors of the Mediterranean right to your plate. This entree features tender and juicy pieces of grilled chicken kabab along with a variety of flavorful seasonings and spices. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and homemade garlic sauce.
Order Now
Steak Kabab Entree
Experience a culinary journey like no other as you savor every bite of our Steak Kabab Entree. Our perfectly cooked tenderloin, marinated to perfection, is served with a fresh garden salad, a generous portion of fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce. Each bite is a symphony of flavors that will transport your taste buds to the sunny shores of the Mediterranean.
Order Now
Kofta Kabab Entree
Our expert chefs skillfully craft delicious Kofta Kabab, a flavorful blend of succulent minced meat mixed with onions and parsley, and aromatic spices, cooked on a fire grill. As a premier Mediterranean food destination, Princess Pita caters to all food enthusiasts who crave an authentic and satisfying culinary experience. Indulge in our Kofta Kabab Entree and savor the unique flavors of the Mediterranean. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Falafel Entree
The five perfectly fried, golden-brown falafel balls, are complemented by a variety of fresh ingredients and authentic spices. As one of the most popular Mediterranean dishes, our Falafel Entree is sure to satisfy your taste buds and leave you wanting more. Whether you're a vegetarian or simply looking to explore new flavors, our Falafel Entree is a must-try. Visit our restaurant today and indulge in the exquisite taste of our Falafel Entree. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Veggie Combo
A delightful and flavorful option that will satisfy your cravings. Made with fresh and nutritious Mediterranean ingredients, this dish is perfect for vegetarians and veggie-lovers alike. Enjoy a delectable medley of 3 pieces of dolmas (stuffed grape leaves), and 2 pieces of crispy falafel, served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, and warm pita bread. Don't forget the side of tahini sauce! Seasoned with aromatic herbs and spices, our Veggie Combo Entree is a crowd-pleaser that will leave you wanting more. Order now and experience the taste of Mediterranean goodness in every bite!
Order Now
Lamb Shank Entree
Try our mouth-watering Lamb Shank Entree! Made with tender, slow-cooked lamb shank and a medley of aromatic spices, this dish will transport your taste buds to the Mediterranean. Whether you're a lamb lover or simply looking for a delightful culinary experience, our Lamb Shank Entree is a must-try. With its rich flavors and hearty portions, it's perfect for any occasion. Join us today and savor the authentic taste of Mediterranean cuisine at its finest. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, and warm pita bread.
Order Now
Grilled Chicken Entree
Looking for a delicious and healthy Mediterranean meal? Look no further than our Grilled Chicken Entree! Made with tender, marinated chicken, and grilled to perfection, our dish is bursting with authentic Mediterranean flavors. Whether you're a fan of Greek cuisine or simply looking for a nutritious and flavorful option, our Grilled Chicken Entree is the perfect choice. Served with a side of fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and our homemade garlic sauce.
Order Now
Beef Trio
A trio of tender steak kabab, a flavorful skewer of kofta kabab, and mouthwatering beef shawarma all expertly seasoned and cooked to perfection. Served with fragrant rice, creamy hummus, fresh garden salad, and warm pita bread. Served with a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Chicken Duo
Tender chicken kabab and savory chicken shawarma. Served with hummus, rice, garden salad, and warm pita bread, plus a side of garlic sauce.
Order Now
Salmon Entree
Our Mediterranean-inspired dish is not only delicious but also highly nutritious. Our succulent piece of perfectly grilled Salmon is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, which are known to promote heart health and support brain function. Paired with fragrant rice, velvety hummus, a fresh salad, warm pita bread, and tahini sauce, our Salmon Entree provides a well-rounded meal that is both satisfying and nourishing.
Order Now
Princess Combo
The Princess Combo is a royal Middle Eastern feast that feeds 2-3 people. It has a skewer of Steak Kabab, a skewer of Chicken Kabab, and a skewer of Kofta Kabab, accompanied by Chicken and Beef Shawarma. This entree also includes fluffy rice, creamy hummus, fresh garden salad, and sides of Tahini and Garlic sauce. Served with two pieces of warm pita bread.
Order Now
Gyro Wrap
Tasty gyro meat accompanied by a harmonious blend of flavors which include fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, zesty pickles, and creamy tzatziki sauce wrapped in a fluffy Greek pita.
Order Now
Gyro Deluxe Wrap
A mouthwatering blend of tantalizing gyro, fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, pickles, creamy tzatziki sauce, feta cheese, and onions, all wrapped in a fluffy greek pita bread.
Order Now
Falafel Wrap
Flavorful crispy falafel, accompanied by fresh lettuce, pickles, our house-made Arabic salad, creamy hummus, and tahini sauce, all wrapped in a fluffy Greek pita.
Order Now
Chicken Shawarma Wrap
Tender marinated chicken shawarma accompanied by fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, pickles, tahini sauce, hummus, garlic sauce, and wrapped in warm and soft pita bread.
Order Now
Beef Shawarma Wrap
Savor the taste of marinated ribeye beef shawarma, paired with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, tangy pickles, onions, and enhanced with tahini sauce and creamy hummus. Wrapped in a warm and fluffy Greek pita bread.
Order Now
Chicken Kabab Wrap
Savory grilled chicken kabab nestled in a Greek pita wrap with fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, tangy pickles, and elevated with creamy tahini sauce and the zesty kick of garlic sauce.
Order Now
Steak Kabab Wrap
Succulent and tender steak kabob accompanied by fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, tangy pickles, onions, creamy tahini sauce and flavorful hummus. Wrapped in a warm and fluffy Greek pita.
Order Now
Kofta Kabab Wrap
Tender and flavorful kofta kabab accompanied by fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, pickles, onions, and topped with indulgent tahini sauce and creamy hummus. Wrapped in a fluffy and  warm Greek pita.
Order Now
Traditional Shawarma
Succulent chicken shawarma accompanied by zesty pickles and creamy garlic sauce, all nestled within a warm, thin pita. Bite-sized and shareable, accompanied by a side of creamy garlic sauce and crispy French frie.
Order Now
Hummus Appetizer
Packed full of flavor and perfectly balanced, our creamy hummus is fresh and served with 2 pieces of warm pita bread. Whether you're a vegan, vegetarian, or just looking for a healthy and tasty meal, our hummus is sure to hit the spot! With its high search volume, our hummus plate is a popular choice for those seeking a nutritious and fulfilling dish. Don't wait any longer, indulge in our irresistible hummus appetizer today and experience a burst of flavors that will leave you wanting more.
Order Now
Hummus Deluxe
Creamy hummus topped with your choice of protein, chicken shawarma, beef shawarma, or gyro, creating a harmonious combination of creamy dip and mouthwatering meat. Served with two pieces of fluffy pita bread.
Order Now
Falafel Appetizer
Enjoy six delectable, crispy falafel pieces made from freshly ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices! Our falafel is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Each bite is packed with flavor and satisfaction. Whether you're a vegetarian, vegan, or just looking for a delicious and healthy option, our falafel is perfect for you. Served with creamy tahini sauce.
Order Now
Dolma
Six delicately rolled grape leaves, stuffed with a flavorful blend of rice, herbs, and spices, offering a delightful bite-sized treat.
Order Now
Sambusa (VEGGIE)
Our Veggie Sambusa is a flavorful and savory pastry filled with a medley of fresh vegetables, perfectly seasoned and encased in a crispy, golden crust. Bursting with nutrients and packed with flavor, Served with refreshing tzatziki sauce.
Order Now
Greek Salad
Indulge in the bold flavors of our Greek Salad, a delicious medley of fresh vegetables, Kalamata olives, and creamy feta cheese, all tossed in our homemade Greek dressing. A Mediterranean favorite you'll adore.
Order Now
Lentil Soup
Warm up with our comforting Lentil Soup, a nourishing blend of tender lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices. This wholesome and satisfying dish is perfect for a cozy meal any time of the year.
Order Now
Arabic Salad
Delight in the simplicity of our Arabic Salad, a refreshing combination of ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, and fresh herbs, all dressed in a light and zesty lemon vinaigrette. The perfect accompaniment to any Mediterranean meal.
Order Now
Tabouleh
Savor the bright and zesty flavors of our Tabouleh Salad, a refreshing mix of finely chopped parsley, mint, tomatoes, and bulgur wheat, all tossed in a tangy lemon dressing. This healthy and delicious salad is a Mediterranean staple.
Order Now
Fattoush Salad
Enjoy the refreshing crunch of our Fattoush Salad, a vibrant mix of fresh vegetables, crispy pita chips, and tangy sumac dressing. This colorful and flavorful salad is a Mediterranean favorite you'll crave.
Order Now
Garden Salad
Enjoy the fresh and crisp flavors of our Garden Salad, a classic mix of lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers, all topped with your choice of dressing. A healthy and satisfying option for any meal.
Order Now
Baklava Cashew
Experience the delightful combination of flavors in our Baklava Cashew, featuring layers of delicate phyllo dough, crunchy cashews, and sweet syrup. This dessert is a delicious twist on the traditional baklava and a must-try for anyone seeking a unique and satisfying treat.
Order Now
Baklava Walnut
Enjoy the irresistible taste of our Walnut Baklava, a classic Mediterranean dessert made with layers of flaky phyllo pastry, spiced walnut filling, and sweet honey syrup. Perfect for sharing or indulging on your own, this dessert is sure to satisfy your cravings
Order Now
Baklava Cheesecake
Indulge in our luxurious Baklava Cheesecake, a delightful fusion of creamy cheesecake and rich, nutty baklava. With layers of flaky phyllo pastry, crushed nuts, and a luscious cream cheese filling, this dessert is a showstopper that will leave you craving more.
Order Now
Baklava Pistachio
Savor the sweet and nutty flavors of our Pistachio Baklava, a traditional Middle Eastern dessert made with layers of crispy phyllo dough, finely chopped pistachios, and delectable syrup. Perfect for indulging your sweet tooth and experiencing a taste of the Mediterranean
Order Now
Pistachio Cheesecake
Delight in our creamy Pistachio Cheesecake, featuring a pistachio graham crust and a smooth pistachio cheesecake filling, topped with a rich pistachio ganache. This dessert is a dream come true for pistachio lovers and a must-try for anyone seeking a unique and delicious treat.
Order Now
Chocolate baklava
Indulge in our delectable chocolate pistachio baklava, featuring two pieces of rich, flaky pastry layered with a delightful blend of chocolate and crunchy pistachios. Perfect for a sweet ending to your Mediterranean meal.
Order Now
20 Years serving the community in Phoenix Metro area
We are Proud of being a family business that treats all guests like part of the family.

About the Business
FLINT by Baltaire is a modern Phoenix restaurant serving wood-fired contemporary American cuisine with Mediterranean and Middle Eastern flavors. Enjoy dinner featuring grilled meats, fresh seafood, seasonal vegetables, and bold spices, all cooked over an open flame. Located in the heart of Phoenix, FLINT offers a vibrant dining experience with craft cocktails and curated wines.
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Do you have GF options safe for celiacs?
A:
Hello Cindy! We have gluten-friendly options; however, our equipment is shared with non-gluten-free items, and we do not have a dedicated space that is 100% gluten-free. We apologize for any inconvenience!
Amber J., Business Manager
See question details
Q:
Are there vegan options/vegan menu?
A:
Hi Ashley,

The kitchen would be able to accommodate vegan requests. We do not have a specific vegan menu.
Amber J., Business Manager

raw_text:

Princess Pita Mediterranean Restaurant
DINING MENU
Best Mediterranean Food in Mesa and phoenix metro area
Serving Mesa, Tempe, Scottsdale, Gilbert, chandler
Gyro Entree
Indulge in a delicious Mediterranean dish that is sure to satisfy your hunger and taste buds. Made with succulent slices of beef and lamb, fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a refreshing side of tzatziki sauce. The gyro entree is a classic favorite for many.
Order Now
Shawarma Combo
Enjoy a delicious and satisfying meal with our Shawarma Combo Entree. Sliced chicken breast and beef ribeye, marinated and grilled to perfection. The entree is served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Kabab Combo Entree
A tantalizing combo entree featuring a mouthwatering steak kabab skewer, a succulent skewer of chicken kabab, and a delectable kofta kabab. Served with rice, creamy hummus, crisp garden salad, and warm pita bread. Entree served with tahini sauce.
Order Now
Chicken Shawarma Entree
Indulge in the exotic flavors of the Chicken Shawarma Entree, a mouthwatering dish that transports you to the bustling streets of the Middle East. This delectable entree is made with tender and juicy marinated chicken breast, seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of garlic sauce.
Order Now
Beef Shawarma Entree
Indulge in a delicious and flavorful Beef Shawarma Entree that will transport your taste buds to the streets of the Middle East. This mouthwatering dish is made with tender, thinly sliced strips of marinated ribeye beef that are perfectly seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices and slowly cooked to perfection. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Chicken Kabab Entree
The Chicken Kabab Entree is a delicious and satisfying meal option that brings the flavors of the Mediterranean right to your plate. This entree features tender and juicy pieces of grilled chicken kabab along with a variety of flavorful seasonings and spices. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and homemade garlic sauce.
Order Now
Steak Kabab Entree
Experience a culinary journey like no other as you savor every bite of our Steak Kabab Entree. Our perfectly cooked tenderloin, marinated to perfection, is served with a fresh garden salad, a generous portion of fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce. Each bite is a symphony of flavors that will transport your taste buds to the sunny shores of the Mediterranean.
Order Now
Kofta Kabab Entree
Our expert chefs skillfully craft delicious Kofta Kabab, a flavorful blend of succulent minced meat mixed with onions and parsley, and aromatic spices, cooked on a fire grill. As a premier Mediterranean food destination, Princess Pita caters to all food enthusiasts who crave an authentic and satisfying culinary experience. Indulge in our Kofta Kabab Entree and savor the unique flavors of the Mediterranean. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Falafel Entree
The five perfectly fried, golden-brown falafel balls, are complemented by a variety of fresh ingredients and authentic spices. As one of the most popular Mediterranean dishes, our Falafel Entree is sure to satisfy your taste buds and leave you wanting more. Whether you're a vegetarian or simply looking to explore new flavors, our Falafel Entree is a must-try. Visit our restaurant today and indulge in the exquisite taste of our Falafel Entree. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Veggie Combo
A delightful and flavorful option that will satisfy your cravings. Made with fresh and nutritious Mediterranean ingredients, this dish is perfect for vegetarians and veggie-lovers alike. Enjoy a delectable medley of 3 pieces of dolmas (stuffed grape leaves), and 2 pieces of crispy falafel, served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, and warm pita bread. Don't forget the side of tahini sauce! Seasoned with aromatic herbs and spices, our Veggie Combo Entree is a crowd-pleaser that will leave you wanting more. Order now and experience the taste of Mediterranean goodness in every bite!
Order Now
Lamb Shank Entree
Try our mouth-watering Lamb Shank Entree! Made with tender, slow-cooked lamb shank and a medley of aromatic spices, this dish will transport your taste buds to the Mediterranean. Whether you're a lamb lover or simply looking for a delightful culinary experience, our Lamb Shank Entree is a must-try. With its rich flavors and hearty portions, it's perfect for any occasion. Join us today and savor the authentic taste of Mediterranean cuisine at its finest. Served with a fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, and warm pita bread.
Order Now
Grilled Chicken Entree
Looking for a delicious and healthy Mediterranean meal? Look no further than our Grilled Chicken Entree! Made with tender, marinated chicken, and grilled to perfection, our dish is bursting with authentic Mediterranean flavors. Whether you're a fan of Greek cuisine or simply looking for a nutritious and flavorful option, our Grilled Chicken Entree is the perfect choice. Served with a side of fresh salad, fragrant rice, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and our homemade garlic sauce.
Order Now
Beef Trio
A trio of tender steak kabab, a flavorful skewer of kofta kabab, and mouthwatering beef shawarma all expertly seasoned and cooked to perfection. Served with fragrant rice, creamy hummus, fresh garden salad, and warm pita bread. Served with a side of tahini sauce.
Order Now
Chicken Duo
Tender chicken kabab and savory chicken shawarma. Served with hummus, rice, garden salad, and warm pita bread, plus a side of garlic sauce.
Order Now
Salmon Entree
Our Mediterranean-inspired dish is not only delicious but also highly nutritious. Our succulent piece of perfectly grilled Salmon is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, which are known to promote heart health and support brain function. Paired with fragrant rice, velvety hummus, a fresh salad, warm pita bread, and tahini sauce, our Salmon Entree provides a well-rounded meal that is both satisfying and nourishing.
Order Now
Princess Combo
The Princess Combo is a royal Middle Eastern feast that feeds 2-3 people. It has a skewer of Steak Kabab, a skewer of Chicken Kabab, and a skewer of Kofta Kabab, accompanied by Chicken and Beef Shawarma. This entree also includes fluffy rice, creamy hummus, fresh garden salad, and sides of Tahini and Garlic sauce. Served with two pieces of warm pita bread.
Order Now
Gyro Wrap
Tasty gyro meat accompanied by a harmonious blend of flavors which include fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, zesty pickles, and creamy tzatziki sauce wrapped in a fluffy Greek pita.
Order Now
Gyro Deluxe Wrap
A mouthwatering blend of tantalizing gyro, fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, pickles, creamy tzatziki sauce, feta cheese, and onions, all wrapped in a fluffy greek pita bread.
Order Now
Falafel Wrap
Flavorful crispy falafel, accompanied by fresh lettuce, pickles, our house-made Arabic salad, creamy hummus, and tahini sauce, all wrapped in a fluffy Greek pita.
Order Now
Chicken Shawarma Wrap
Tender marinated chicken shawarma accompanied by fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, pickles, tahini sauce, hummus, garlic sauce, and wrapped in warm and soft pita bread.
Order Now
Beef Shawarma Wrap
Savor the taste of marinated ribeye beef shawarma, paired with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, tangy pickles, onions, and enhanced with tahini sauce and creamy hummus. Wrapped in a warm and fluffy Greek pita bread.
Order Now
Chicken Kabab Wrap
Savory grilled chicken kabab nestled in a Greek pita wrap with fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, tangy pickles, and elevated with creamy tahini sauce and the zesty kick of garlic sauce.
Order Now
Steak Kabab Wrap
Succulent and tender steak kabob accompanied by fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, tangy pickles, onions, creamy tahini sauce and flavorful hummus. Wrapped in a warm and fluffy Greek pita.
Order Now
Kofta Kabab Wrap
Tender and flavorful kofta kabab accompanied by fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, pickles, onions, and topped with indulgent tahini sauce and creamy hummus. Wrapped in a fluffy and  warm Greek pita.
Order Now
Traditional Shawarma
Succulent chicken shawarma accompanied by zesty pickles and creamy garlic sauce, all nestled within a warm, thin pita. Bite-sized and shareable, accompanied by a side of creamy garlic sauce and crispy French frie.
Order Now
Hummus Appetizer
Packed full of flavor and perfectly balanced, our creamy hummus is fresh and served with 2 pieces of warm pita bread. Whether you're a vegan, vegetarian, or just looking for a healthy and tasty meal, our hummus is sure to hit the spot! With its high search volume, our hummus plate is a popular choice for those seeking a nutritious and fulfilling dish. Don't wait any longer, indulge in our irresistible hummus appetizer today and experience a burst of flavors that will leave you wanting more.
Order Now
Hummus Deluxe
Creamy hummus topped with your choice of protein, chicken shawarma, beef shawarma, or gyro, creating a harmonious combination of creamy dip and mouthwatering meat. Served with two pieces of fluffy pita bread.
Order Now
Falafel Appetizer
Enjoy six delectable, crispy falafel pieces made from freshly ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices! Our falafel is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Each bite is packed with flavor and satisfaction. Whether you're a vegetarian, vegan, or just looking for a delicious and healthy option, our falafel is perfect for you. Served with creamy tahini sauce.
Order Now
Dolma
Six delicately rolled grape leaves, stuffed with a flavorful blend of rice, herbs, and spices, offering a delightful bite-sized treat.
Order Now
Sambusa (VEGGIE)
Our Veggie Sambusa is a flavorful and savory pastry filled with a medley of fresh vegetables, perfectly seasoned and encased in a crispy, golden crust. Bursting with nutrients and packed with flavor, Served with refreshing tzatziki sauce.
Order Now
Greek Salad
Indulge in the bold flavors of our Greek Salad, a delicious medley of fresh vegetables, Kalamata olives, and creamy feta cheese, all tossed in our homemade Greek dressing. A Mediterranean favorite you'll adore.
Order Now
Lentil Soup
Warm up with our comforting Lentil Soup, a nourishing blend of tender lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices. This wholesome and satisfying dish is perfect for a cozy meal any time of the year.
Order Now
Arabic Salad
Delight in the simplicity of our Arabic Salad, a refreshing combination of ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, and fresh herbs, all dressed in a light and zesty lemon vinaigrette. The perfect accompaniment to any Mediterranean meal.
Order Now
Tabouleh
Savor the bright and zesty flavors of our Tabouleh Salad, a refreshing mix of finely chopped parsley, mint, tomatoes, and bulgur wheat, all tossed in a tangy lemon dressing. This healthy and delicious salad is a Mediterranean staple.
Order Now
Fattoush Salad
Enjoy the refreshing crunch of our Fattoush Salad, a vibrant mix of fresh vegetables, crispy pita chips, and tangy sumac dressing. This colorful and flavorful salad is a Mediterranean favorite you'll crave.
Order Now
Garden Salad
Enjoy the fresh and crisp flavors of our Garden Salad, a classic mix of lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers, all topped with your choice of dressing. A healthy and satisfying option for any meal.
Order Now
Baklava Cashew
Experience the delightful combination of flavors in our Baklava Cashew, featuring layers of delicate phyllo dough, crunchy cashews, and sweet syrup. This dessert is a delicious twist on the traditional baklava and a must-try for anyone seeking a unique and satisfying treat.
Order Now
Baklava Walnut
Enjoy the irresistible taste of our Walnut Baklava, a classic Mediterranean dessert made with layers of flaky phyllo pastry, spiced walnut filling, and sweet honey syrup. Perfect for sharing or indulging on your own, this dessert is sure to satisfy your cravings
Order Now
Baklava Cheesecake
Indulge in our luxurious Baklava Cheesecake, a delightful fusion of creamy cheesecake and rich, nutty baklava. With layers of flaky phyllo pastry, crushed nuts, and a luscious cream cheese filling, this dessert is a showstopper that will leave you craving more.
Order Now
Baklava Pistachio
Savor the sweet and nutty flavors of our Pistachio Baklava, a traditional Middle Eastern dessert made with layers of crispy phyllo dough, finely chopped pistachios, and delectable syrup. Perfect for indulging your sweet tooth and experiencing a taste of the Mediterranean
Order Now
Pistachio Cheesecake
Delight in our creamy Pistachio Cheesecake, featuring a pistachio graham crust and a smooth pistachio cheesecake filling, topped with a rich pistachio ganache. This dessert is a dream come true for pistachio lovers and a must-try for anyone seeking a unique and delicious treat.
Order Now
Chocolate baklava
Indulge in our delectable chocolate pistachio baklava, featuring two pieces of rich, flaky pastry layered with a delightful blend of chocolate and crunchy pistachios. Perfect for a sweet ending to your Mediterranean meal.
Order Now
20 Years serving the community in Phoenix Metro area
We are Proud of being a family business that treats all guests like part of the family.
Email : info@princessmarket.com

For the last 20 years, there’s one thing we’ve never changed— every sauce is made in-house, our chicken is fresh-cut and marinated, every veggie is freshly cut and prepped daily. We’ve spent two decades sourcing breads and meats from top-quality producers, ensuring they’re crafted to our exact proprietary recipes. At Spitz, freshness and quality aren’t just priorities—they’re our main recipe, our secret recipe, the only recipe we’ll never change.

T. Cooks

Previous

Tasteful in every sense, T. Cook’s brings creative cuisine to an elegant desert setting. Experience a Mediterranean menu with rotating selections that reflect the season’s bounty for breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner in Phoenix. Enhancing the impeccable menu is the inviting ambiance of rich earthen tones, high-vaulted ceilings, and a patio with views of the Royal Palms’ lush landscape and Camelback Mountain.
T. Cook’s serves hand-selected ingredients prepared in simple, yet sumptuous, dishes. Selections feature bold Mediterranean flavors, with notes of regional influences from Northern Italy, Greece, and Spain. Enjoy the offerings on one of two outdoor patios boasting views of Camelback Mountain with cozy fireplaces and blooming bougainvillea. Treat your senses to an unforgettable dining adventure during your stay in Phoenix at the award-winning T. Cook’s.

For the last 20 years, there’s one thing we’ve never changed— every sauce is made in-house, our chicken is fresh-cut and marinated, every veggie is freshly cut and prepped daily. We’ve spent two decades sourcing breads and meats from top-quality producers, ensuring they’re crafted to our exact proprietary recipes. At Spitz, freshness and quality aren’t just priorities—they’re our main recipe, our secret recipe, the only recipe we’ll never change.

OUR SPARTAN MENU
APPETIZERS
FLAVORFUL MEDITERRANEAN STARTERS
DOLMAS (STUFFED GRAPE LEAVES)
5.99
Tender grape leaves stuffed with a mixture of seasoned rice, herbs, and spices. A Mediterranean classic that’s light and delicious
FALAFEL 4PC
5.99
Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside! These golden-brown chickpea fritters are seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices, served with tahini sauce.
HUMMUS
5.99
A creamy blend of chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and garlic, drizzled with olive oil and served with warm pita bread. Perfectly smooth and bursting with flavor.
BABA GHANOUSH
5.99
A smoky and velvety dip made with roasted eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, and a touch of garlic. Garnished with olive oil and parsley
COMBO APPETIZER
14.99
The ultimate sampler featuring falafel, dolmas, hummus, and baba ghanoush. Perfect for sharing and experiencing a variety of flavors.
TABOULEH
5.99
A fresh and vibrant salad of parsley, tomatoes, bulgur wheat, and mint, tossed in a light lemon and olive oil dressing. A refreshing taste of the Mediterranean.
LENTIL SOUP
9.99
A hearty and comforting soup made with lentils, fresh vegetables, and aromatic spices. A wholesome start to your meal.
SAMBOOSA 4PC
9.99
Deliciously flaky pastry stuffed with a savory filling of spiced beef or vegetables. Fried to perfection for the perfect crunch in every bite.
YELLOW RICE
3.99
Fluffy, fragrant yellow rice cooked with aromatic spices for a flavorful and satisfying side dish.
PERFECT PITAS
PERFECTLY CRAFTED MEDITERRANEAN PITAS
FALAFEL PITA
8.99
Crispy, golden falafel patties wrapped in a warm pita with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and drizzled with tahini sauce. A delicious vegetarian delight!
GYRO PITA
9.99
Tender slices of perfectly seasoned gyro meat, served in a warm pita with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and creamy tzatziki sauce. A Mediterranean favorite!
SPARTAN FIGHTER PITA
10.99
Kick it up a notch with our spicy gyro! Juicy gyro meat packed with bold spices, served in a soft pita with fresh veggies and a zesty spicy sauce for extra kick
STEAK SHAWARMA PITA
10.99
Succulent slices of marinated steak, grilled to perfection and wrapped in a fluffy pita with lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and a drizzle of creamy pink garlic sauce.
ANGUS BURGER
9.99
A hearty burger made with premium Angus beef, grilled to perfection and served in a pita with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and your choice of sauce. A unique twist on a classic favorite!
CHICKEN SHAWARMA PITA
9.99
Juicy, slow-roasted chicken seasoned with a blend of Mediterranean spices, served in a pita with fresh veggies, pickles, and topped with our signature pink garlic sauce.
PITA COMBOS
PERFECTLY CRAFTED PITA'S , PAIRED WITH FRIES AND A DRINK
FALAFEL PITA COMBO
16.99
Crispy, golden falafel patties wrapped in a warm pita with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and drizzled with tahini sauce. Served with fries and a drink to complete this vegetarian delight!
GYRO PITA COMBO
16.99
Tender slices of perfectly seasoned gyro meat, served in a warm pita with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and creamy tzatziki sauce. Comes with crispy fries and a refreshing drink for the ultimate meal.
SPARTAN FIGHTER COMBO
17.99
Kick it up a notch with our spicy gyro! Juicy gyro meat packed with bold spices, served in a soft pita with fresh veggies and a zesty spicy sauce for extra heat. Paired with golden fries and your choice of drink.
STEAK SHAWARMA COMBO
17.99
Succulent slices of marinated steak, grilled to perfection and wrapped in a fluffy pita with lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and a drizzle of creamy garlic sauce. Comes with a side of crispy fries and a drink for a satisfying meal.
ANGUS BURGER COMBO
16.99
A hearty burger made with premium Angus beef, grilled to perfection and served in a pita with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and your choice of sauce. Paired with crispy fries and a drink for the perfect combo.
CHICKEN SHAWARMA COMBO
17.99
Juicy, slow-roasted chicken seasoned with a blend of Mediterranean spices, served in a pita with fresh veggies, pickles, and topped with our signature garlic sauce. Complete with golden fries and a refreshing drink.
COMBINATION PLATES
Your choice of protein over yellow rice, served with salad, Hummus, Baba Ghanoush, Pita bread, and sauce.
FALAFEL PLATE
18.99
Crispy golden falafel patties placed atop a bed of yellow rice, paired with sides of hummus, baba ghanoush, fresh salad, and soft pita bread. Comes with a drizzle of pink garlic sauce for a vegetarian meal packed with flavor.
GYRO PLATE
19.99
Tender slices of perfectly seasoned gyro meat served over a bed of fluffy yellow rice. Comes with a creamy side of hummus, smoky baba ghanoush, fresh salad, and warm pita bread. Topped off with our signature tzatziki sauce for a complete and satisfying meal.
STEAK SHAWARMA PLATE
21.99
Succulent, marinated steak strips served over fluffy yellow rice. Accompanied by creamy hummus, smoky baba ghanoush, a fresh salad, warm pita bread, and our flavorful pink garlic sauce for dipping.
CHICKEN SHAWARMA PLATE
19.99
Juicy, slow-roasted chicken shawarma seasoned with aromatic spices, served atop yellow rice. Includes sides of hummus, baba ghanoush, crisp salad, and soft pita bread, complemented by our delicious pink garlic sauce.
PAPA'S COMBINATION PLATE
23.99
The best of both worlds! A flavorful mix of flame-grilled ribeye steak and chicken kabob cubes, served on a bed of yellow rice. Paired with sides of hummus, baba ghanoush, fresh salad, warm pita bread, and our signature pink garlic sauce for dipping.
CHICKEN KABOB PLATE
21.99
Perfectly flame-grilled cubes of marinated chicken served over yellow rice. Comes with creamy hummus, smoky baba ghanoush, a fresh salad, and warm pita bread, along with a side of pink garlic sauce for an irresistible meal.
STEAK KABOB PLATE
22.99
Flame-grilled, tender cubes of ribeye steak served on a bed of seasoned yellow rice. Accompanied by sides of creamy hummus, smoky baba ghanoush, crisp salad, and soft pita bread, with pink garlic sauce for dipping.
SIDES AND EXTRAS
SIDE OF PINK SAUCE
.75
A smooth, savory garlic sauce with a hint of sweetness and tang, making it the ideal accompaniment to any dish for extra flavor.
SIDE OF GYRO
5.99
Tender, juicy slices of seasoned gyro meat, served on its own for those craving a protein-packed, savory addition to any plate.
SIDE OF TZATZIKI
.75
A creamy, refreshing blend of Greek yogurt, cucumber, garlic, and herbs. Perfect for dipping or adding a cool touch to any meal.
SIDE OF CAJUN FRIES
3.49
Crispy, golden fries coated in a zesty Cajun seasoning, delivering the perfect balance of heat and flavor to accompany your meal.
SIDE OF YELLOW RICE
2.99
Freshly baked and golden brown, our muffins are soft, moist, and full of flavor. A perfect treat to satisfy your sweet cravin
SIDE OF FETA CHEESE
.99
Crumbled, tangy feta cheese that adds a burst of flavor to any dish, balancing richness with a salty, creamy finish.
SIDE OF PITA BREAD
1.99
Soft, warm, and freshly baked, this pillowy pita bread is the perfect vessel for scooping up dips or enjoying alongside your favorite dish.
SIDE OF PITA BREAD
4.99
A fresh, vibrant mix of crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, Kalamata olives, red onions, and a sprinkle of feta cheese, all tossed in a tangy Greek dressing for a light and refreshing side.
SIDE OF PITA BREAD
4.99
A hearty and comforting bowl of lentil soup, simmered with savory spices and vegetables, offering a warm, flavorful accompaniment to any meal.
DESSERT
RAINBOW MACARONS
4.99
A colorful assortment of delicate, melt-in-your-mouth French macarons filled with creamy buttercream. Each bite offers a sweet and slightly chewy experience, bursting with vibrant flavors.
BAKLAVA
5.99
A sweet, flaky pastry made with layers of filo dough, chopped nuts, and honey syrup. Each bite is a perfect balance of crunchy, rich, and sweet.
CHERRY FILLED DANISH
3.49
Flaky, buttery pastry filled with a generous helping of sweet cherry filling. Topped with a light glaze, it’s a delicious, fruity indulgence.
MINI LEMON BUNDT CAKE
3.49
A zesty, tangy lemon cake in a mini bundt shape. Light, moist, and bursting with fresh lemon flavor, topped with a sweet glaze.
MUFFIN
2.99
Freshly baked and golden brown, our muffins are soft, moist, and full of flavor. A perfect treat to satisfy your sweet cravin
MINI CHOCOLATE BUNDT CAKE
3.49
Rich, moist chocolate cake in a perfectly-sized mini bundt form. Each bite is filled with deep cocoa flavor and a smooth, indulgent texture

raw_text:
Pangaea Dinosaur Grill
happy halloween neighbors & visitors!!
(Hidden Gem at AZ Boardwalk)
Eat and drink with dinosaurs
Experience eating delicious food for the entire family with dinosaurs at
Pangaea Dinosaur Grill!
(Adult Beverages Too!)
See Our Menu
About the pangaea dinosaur grill
Our Story
At the Pangaea Dinosaur Grill, we are passionate about you having a great experience!  Our dinosaurs direct us to serve delicious, high-quality and healthy portioned meals using fresh ingredients sourced from local farmers.
We are a family owned, friend and family operated restaurant dedicated to providing you a fun Jurassic experience with amazing food and beverages!
Our Menu
We offer a wide variety of dishes to suit all tastes including vegetarian options along with a renowned kid's menu.  Our Greek, Italian, Mexican and American food is delicious with healthy portions and the dinosaurs never mistreat our guests!
Our pizza is award winning alongside our fantastic burgers, fries, salads, nachos, wraps, souvlaki (skewers), fish, desserts and more...plus adult beverages to keep everyone satisfied!
