Pangaea Dinosaur Grill - NEWS UPDATES
Appreciation
Pangaea Dinosaur Grill has been serving the community for over 7 years and have grown to become a destination serving visitors and our local community!  Our team is proud to serve customers with great food in a fun Jurassic environment!
Employee Accolades
At Pangaea Dinosaur Grill, our teams' commitment to providing exemplary service and great food is paramount!  Please help us recognize our Q2 2025 Employee of the Quarter, Xiomara Toral!!  Since joining our team as a Cook, Xiomara is an amazing team player who works diligently every day to ensure the highest level of quality and presentation is provided to our guests.  She consistently helps her teammates everyday!  Xiomara is always kind, helpful and we couldn't be more thankful she is a member of the family!  Thank you and congratulations Xiomara!!

top of page
HOME
MENU

STORY TIME
LOCATIONS

Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
Menu
Artisan & Masterfully Crafted
Basic B!tch
Naughty Signature Burger
Our signature "Basic B!tch" burger is handcrafted to perfection with its  juicy handcrafted patty, sautéed onions, our signature naughty sauce, sweet pickles, lettuce, and tomato.
Add cheese if you dare
.
Chill TF Out Burger
It's all about the crunch
Chill out with our handcrafted burger topped with cheddar cheese, in-house chili, cheese sauce, crispy corn chips, and Naughty sauce on a buttery sesame bun. A deliciously naughty burger experience!
Jezebel
Sassy BBQ Swag
The Jezebel" BBQ burger, is a tantalizing blend of southwest swag. Featuring our house patty, BBQ chips, fried onion strips, smoked Gouda, and naughty sauce unite for a smoky, sassy symphony of flavors that'll leave you craving more.
Big B!tch
Handcrafted to perfection
Experience a colossal delight with two juicy patties, sautéed onions, rich cheddar, sweet pickles, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and Naughty sauce on a sesame bun. A must-try for any burger lover!
Queen Jezebel
The Queen is here!
BBQ double patty burger with a tantalizing fusion of southwestern flair. With not one, but two of our signature house patties combined with BBQ chips, crispy fried onion strips, smoked Gouda, and our signature Naughty sauce. It’s a smoky, sassy symphony of flavors that's bound to have you craving for another bite.
Mokupuni Burger
Our naughty island burger
Embark on a flavor adventure with our plant-based Island Burger! Picture this: a tantalizing in-house patty, Katsu-mayo magic, smoked Gouda, Bacun Jam, fried onions strips and caramelized pineapple rings- all on a Pretzel bun. Taste the excitement!
Deep B!tch
One of Chef Paris favorite creation: a juicy plant-based patty layered with melty mozzarella, ranch made in-house, and our signature pizza sauce, all hugged by a garlic pretzel bun.
***Photo showcases the Queen Deep B!tch***
Lopsided 304
Surf that Turf
A seductive spin on surf & turf, presented on a buttery brioche bun with our in-house coleslaw, provolone cheese, vegan lobster bites, and our signature seasoned patty. This rendezvous of flavors is sure to ignite the cravings of even the most discerning burger aficionado.
Baskets
Handcrafted & plant-based
B!tch Broke My Vibs
Our Signature BBQ Basket
A fan favorite…It’s our BBQ Vib basket (Vegan Ribs), smothered in mesquite BBQ sauce, accompanied with a side of pork-less BBQ beans, crispy fried corn-on-the-cob paired with our signature honey-less aioli sauce and a sweet roll to complete this fest.
Crabby B!tch Basket
Crab-less crabby cakes
Two handcrafted Jackfruit crab-less cakes, deep fried until golden brown, served with seasoned fries, coleslaw, sweet roll and our delicious Remoloude dipping sauce.
Fishy Vish basket
Handcrafted to perfection
Crispy Golden fried (Banana Blossom) 2 pieces of Vish served with a side of our Naughty see-food-less boil. This flavorful boil contains crab-less meat, corn, potatoes, spicy sausage, and served with garlic Texas toast
Naugh-Ti-Tos
Crispy Corn Chips & Chili
Savor the flavor with our Naugh-Ti-Tos – a plant-based delight! Enjoy crispy corn chips loaded with our house chili, golden crunchy fried onion strips, creamy Avocado Crema, and a tantalizing smoky chipotle aioli drizzle. Topped with a crispy fried pepperoncini. It's a plant-based fiesta for your taste buds!
Naugh-Ti-304's
Crispy, Fried & Delicious
Golden fried jackfruit strips, atop seasoned naughty fries, melted cheese, your choice of sauce drizzled to perfection and garnished with scallions. Sauces: BBQ, Honey-less Buffalo or
Sweet N Spicy (Served with sweet potato fries).
Naugh-Ti-AF Fries
Naughty Monster Fries
The ultimate flavor explosion! Experience seasoned in-house patty, melted cheese, sautéed onions, and your choice of chipotle or naughty sauce, all topped with our signature naughty seasoning and chives.
Sliders & More
Handcrafted
Spicy A$$ Chick
Spicy, Sassy, Unapologetic
A mouthwatering trio of perfectly battered and fried to perfection jackfruit drenched in our honey-less buffalo sauce, creamy ranch sauce, and crowned with a sweet 'n spicy pickle all on a sweet roll. Taste the Naughty goodness!
Crabby B!tch
This B!tch is crabby!
Get ready to get Naughty with our Crab-Less Jackfruit Sliders –two crispy golden-fried jackfruit cakes, our signature coleslaw, all chillin' between a poppy and sesame seed bun. Level up your flavor game – these sliders are not just see-food; they're a whole Naughty experience!
Meet-Deez-Ball Sliders
Bold. Spicy. Legendary
Come slide on through for our famous Meet-Deez-Ball sliders- two handcrafted meet-balls, melted mozzarella, and our signature Arrabbiata house sauce, nestled between two soft sweet rolls and topped with parmesan cheese. This one is for the record books.
Shorty Broke My Vib Sliders
Our version of  traditional ribs
Get ready to vibe with our killer Vibs (vegan ribs)! Crafted from jackfruit and dripping in mesquite sauce, these bad boys are topped with our creamy in-house coleslaw and crowned with our signature spicy-sweet pickles. It's Naughty goodness that'll have you craving more.
Naugh-Ti-Fries
Smokey, Crispy & Irresistible
Elevate your fry game with our seasoned French Fries – a flavor-packed escapade! Each fry is coated in our exclusive in-house Naughty Seasoning, ensuring every bite is a party for your palate.
B!tch Got Corns
So good...Southern style fried corn
'B!tch Got Corns' – a trio of perfectly fried corn on the cob, oozing with flavor. Dive into the crunch, and elevate the experience with our honey-less dipping sauce. It's bold. It's flavorful. It's corn like never before. Get ready for a taste bud revolution!"
Naughty
Cheesecakes
Handcrafted & plant-based
Naughty  Cookie
Think cheesecake Smore
This Cheesecake boasts a delectable chocolate cookies crust, loads of chocolate sandwich cookie bites throughout, toasted marshmallows & cookies on top, and finished with a chocolate drizzle.
Naughty Turtle
Caramel Lovers Dream
The name says it all, if you love Turtle chocolate candy, then you’ll love our take on the delicious treat. Vegan caramel, walnuts and drizzled with dark chocolate
Naughty-Finger
Pure dessert joy
Immerse yourself in our Naughty Cheesecake—imagine Butterfinger vibes. Bursting with Peanut Butter Crush, chocolate swirls, and a decadent peanut drizzle. Seriously, it's unbelievably delicious!
Naughty Cupid
Perfect for the special person
This delightful cheesecake has a chocolate cookie crust; a light creamy filling, topped with a strawberry dipped in chocolate and drizzled with white and dark chocolate. This decadent cheesecake is perfect for your V-day sweetheart.
Naughty Buttercup
Buttercup Madness
Enjoy our irresistible Naughty Buttercup Cheesecake, adorned with buttercups and a tempting peanut drizzle, all atop a decadent chocolate cookie crust
Naughty Unicorn
Sweet Yummy & Mystical
This lusciously creamy cheesecake is brimming with irresistible Mmm moments and Naughty flavored Gems throughout, all crowned with a decadent chocolate drizzle and candy-coated Gems.
Naughty A$$ Trick
Rich, creamy & dreamy, did someone mention a NAT
Our pumpkin cheesecake will make you question your morals, with its velvety filling and chocolate cookie crust, reminiscent of sweet potato pie. Topped with in-house caramel and crushed pecans, it's an indulgence that's almost sinfully sweet
Naughty Nana
Banana Pudding & Cheesecake Lovers
Introducing our banana-infused cheesecake, nestled on a wafer cookie crust, adorned with banana slices, whipped cream, and toasted coconut flakes. This delightful creation is a wonderful fusion of flavors, reminiscent of classic banana pudding.
Naughty Bliss
Blueberry Lemon Fusion
Creamy blueberry lemon cheesecake infused with zesty lemon essence, perfectly balanced with bursts of sweet, juicy blueberries. It's a delightful harmony of tangy and sweet, sure to leave you craving for more.
Strawberry Stroll
Creamy Yummy Strawberry
Delight in the harmonious blend of creamy cheesecake fresh ripe strawberries, garnished with a cookie sandwich, cookie crush, and strawberry compote topping. With every decadent bite, this dessert whispers of pure indulgence, begging to be enjoyed to the fullest!
Georgia Peach Cobbler
Peach Cobbler Cheesecake
For those who adore the tradition of fresh peach cobbler and the creamy taste of cheesecake, here's a treat for you: Creamy cheesecake infused with classic peach cobbler flare, all crowned with a delightful crumbly crust. It's a heavenly twist on a timeless favorite that's sure to satisfy every craving.
Sweet B!tches
Precision-crafted, agave-sweetened lemonades redefine refreshment. Each sip is a flavorful masterpiece, expertly balanced for elevation.
Big D's Original
Elevate your taste buds with Big D's Original sweet lemonade: a tantalizing blend of sweet zesty lemons, premium blue agave, and vibrant fruit slices.
Strawberry
Experience the ultimate refreshment with our Fresh Strawberry Lemonade: tangy lemons, succulent strawberries, and a burst of fruity bliss.
Watermelon
​
Dive into pure refreshment with juicy watermelon, tangy lemon, and a hint of summer sweetness in every sip.
Peach
Savor the taste of summer with our Peach Lemonade, blending succulent peaches, zesty lemon, and pure sunshine in a glass.
Dragon fruit
Embark on a flavor adventure with dragon fruit Lemonade, where exotic dragon fruit meets tangy lemon for a vibrant burst of tropical delight.
Naughty Vegano
Experience a taste sensation with Naughty Vegano: Spanish lemonade, chamoy, spicy seasoning, fresh fruit, and a fun candy topping."
Lavender-Blue
Get ready for a taste sensation! Fresh lavender brings a delicate floral sweetness, partnering flawlessly with juicy blueberries and tangy fresh lemon juice, all sweetened to perfection with blue agave."

Catering Menu
Seasonal Menu
At True Food Kitchen, our menu is carefully crafted so that every bite and every refreshing sip serve up big flavor, an abundance of fresh ingredients and a taste of the unexpected. Our artisan chefs create crave-worthy classics alongside a steady rotation of seasonal offerings that take advantage of naturally ripe fruits and vegetables so their flavor is full and their nutrients, rich. Creative, hand-crafted beverages built around seasonality, quality ingredients and simple preparations complement every occasion from brunch, lunch, dinner and, of course, dessert. Always room for dessert.
Important Information About Our Menu
Menu pricing varies by location – to view location-specific menus, visit our
locations
page.
*These items may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Please be aware that our restaurants use gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, sesame, soy and wheat).
Our restaurants have shared cooking and preparation areas and the possibility exists for food items to come into contact with other food products. Due to these circumstances, we are unable to guarantee that any menu item can be completely free of allergens. In addition, while effort is made to keep our product information current and as complete as possible, it is possible that ingredient changes and substitutions may occur due to differences in regional suppliers, recipe revisions, preparation techniques, and/or the season of the year.
Before placing your order, please inform your server if someone in your party has a food allergy or a special dietary need and we will do our best to make accommodations.
View our nutritional guide
here
.

name: Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe

raw_text:
Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe: Authentic Ethiopian Cuisine in Phoenix
Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe
Home
Menu
Location
Reviews
About
Home
Menu
Location
Reviews
About
Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe
Welcome to Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe
Dive into the flavorful world of Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe, located in Phoenix, AZ. This Ethiopian gem offers a unique culinary experience with a wide range of vegan options and traditional dishes like Doro Wat and Tibs Furfur. The warm ambiance and attentive service make every visit memorable. Don't miss out on their signature roasted coffee beans and tej. Whether you're a vegetarian or a meat lover, Abyssinia has something for everyone to enjoy. So, gather your friends and family for a feast you won't forget at Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe.
LOCATIONS
842 E Indian School Rd Phoenix, AZ 85014
842 E Indian School Rd Phoenix, AZ 85014
Hotline: (602) 795-4113
Welcome to Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe - a hidden gem in Phoenix, AZ that serves up authentic Ethiopian cuisine with a twist of creativity and flair. As a food reviewer of Restaurant World, I had the pleasure of experiencing the diverse and flavorful dishes offered at Abyssinia.
From their breakfast options like Scrambled Egg with French Toast and Fuole to their Meat Platters like Azeb Guada and Doro Wat, Abyssinia caters to both meat lovers and vegans with their extensive menu. The appetizers like Sambussa and Green Lentils Soup are perfect starters to a satisfying meal.
Customer reviews rave about the exceptional service and welcoming ambiance that Abyssinia provides. The owner's personal touch, from serving a well-organized buffet to roasting coffee beans on the stovetop, adds a special touch to the dining experience.
Whether you're a vegetarian or a meat enthusiast, Abyssinia has something for everyone. The combination platters offer a variety of flavors to try at a fair price. Don't miss out on trying their tej, Ethiopian beer, and desserts for a truly authentic experience.
Overall, Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe stands out for its delicious food, friendly service, and cozy atmosphere. If you're in Phoenix, be sure to stop by and indulge in a culinary journey through Ethiopia at Abyssinia.
START YOUR REVIEW OF Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe
Your overall rating
Your name
Address
Your review
Send Review
Victor A.
Had a catered vegan meal yesterday, for 30 people or so, by them. I'm not vegetarian and neither is Abyssinia, but I was extremely satisfied with a delicious, wildly creative, diverse bounty. The owner served us a well-organized buffet, and then roasted coffee beans on the stovetop, and brewed for us the perfect little cups of richness to top it all off. Eat there. Period.
Bianca K.
Abyssinia is one of our favorite restaurants. The ambiance is very low key, and the food is amazing. I love their combination platters, especially the vegetarian combination -- these include so many different foods to try at a very fair price. The owner is so wonderful and provides exceptional service.
Nat M.
Nice little place to try. Good sampler for vegetarian and non-vegetarian alike. Really nice, friendly service. I look forward to returning to try the coffee , Ethiopian beer and some of their desserts
Ali B.
I definitely recommend either dining in or calling your order in because I've had online ordering issues twice. Last year I ordered online, I arrived and the door was locked with no one there during operating hours, no updates anywhere online, had to get a refund through whatever third party ordering system I used. Today I ordered through their actual website, my husband arrived and they said they never got it, despite me having a receipt and a screenshot from my bank account showing they took money out, they tried to get him to pay twice. They said to just cancel the order online but that wasn't an option. They claimed they won't get the money for it which is crazy because where is the money I paid going then?! And weird that I should have to pay twice because of an issue with their website, that's something they need to sort out on their end. Onto the food, it was amazing! And a massive portion for an affordable price. I got one sambussa and the veggie combo, which had some lentil and veggie dishes on injera. The sambussa was spicy, everything was super flavorful and perfectly spiced! Would be great to share or to have as two meals!
Jessica G.
So good and so lucky I found this place! Had a veggie platter and it was fantastic. Also had some tej at the hostess's recommendation, and that was phenomenal. If you haven't been here, and you are in Phoenix, make sure to stop by. You won't be disappointed!!!
Dannae R.
Very kind staff, always welcoming, and great food. There was a very strong incense that was scenting the place, but we didn't mind it.
Claudia L.
This place was great! It was very authentic, and yet they have many options that are not that spicy. Everything was delicious, fast, and the service was super friendly. Would recommend 100%!
Shannon M.
Was stunned at the food! 10/10 experience. Went late on a Saturday and service was great. Was cute for a date night, because the plates can be served family style or individual
Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe
Come experience the flavors of Ethiopia at Abyssinia Restaurant and Cafe in Phoenix, AZ. Offering a variety of vegan options, private dining, and outdoor seating. Enjoy traditional dishes like Doro Wat and Fuole in a cozy atmosphere. Don't miss out on their famous coffee and tej!
Address: 842 E Indian School Rd Phoenix, AZ 85014
Hotline: (602) 795-4113

About the Business
Tulum Modern Mexican in Glendale Arizona's Westgate Entertainment District brings the rustic and elegant vibe of Tulum Mexico to Arizona. We invite you to enjoy the bohemian atmosphere of one of the world's top tourist destinations. Tulum Modern Mexican combines exquisite dishes, signature cocktails, music and decor in an experience that transports you and your guest's to Tulum Mexico for a memorable dining experience.

About us
Los Olivos Mexican Patio, where gatherings of good friends and great food has been an Arizona tradition reaching back 70 years.  Where customers are still greeted by family, where the tortillas and salsas are still made by hand.  Taste the authentic flavors of real Sonoran cuisine, created with passion at Los Olivos Mexican Patio.
Contact us
7328 E 2nd St Scottsdale, AZ 85251
Sunday - Thursday 11 AM to 9 PM
Friday-Saturday 11 AM to 10 PM
Phone - 480-946-2256
Fax - 480-946-0291

HOW IT WORKS
OUR WEEKLY MENU
PLANS & PRICING
Select Page
Weekly Menu
Eat The Rainbow To Stay Healty
Monday’s Upcoming Delivery Menu
The Six Meals for Delivery for the Week of Monday, Monday, October 13th, 2025.
*macros can be viewed in each dish; please note that macros are approximations and may vary slightly by serving
Meal Choice
Click on the button to swap out meals. Swaps must be submitted by 10:00 p.m. Thursday.
Make Your Meal Choice
“The Vegan Taste makes my life so much better. I look forward to the meals every week & I enjoy all of them! I love the variety, the health & the flavors. The ease of having my lunch meals prepared for me as a single working mom, plus them being delicious, healthy, and vegan is a lifesaver!”
MELINDA CA. FROM SCOTTSDALE
SAVE 25%
Refer Your Friends and Family
Current customers who refer their friends and family will have 25% savings applied to their next subscription order.
For more information, email
orders@thevegantaste.com
Meatball Sub
Meatballs and veggies in a fire roasted tomato sauce with CT cheese and a kale salad. Served with Noble Bread ciabatta rolls.
read more
Paella
A Spanish veggie paella with roasted artichokes, green beans, peas, cauliflower, and broad beans.
read more
Big Beefy Cheesy Burrito
A  big burrito made with beefy soy curls, cilantro lime rice, black beans, squash, tomato, onions, poblano chiles, potatoes, and cheese sauce with a whole wheat tortilla.
read more
Orange Tofu
Seared tofu in orange ginger sauce with sesame broccoli over brown rice.
read more
Tom Kha Noods
Noodles in a tom kha coconut sauce with carrots, potatoes, and tofu.
read more
Butternut Squash Massaman Curry
A creamy Thai butternut squash curry with chickpeas, purple sweet potatoes, spinach, & basil
read more
Weekly menu
These completely plant-based meals are a balance of classic homemade American dishes and iconic international recipes.
Learn More
Plans & Pricing
We keep it simple for you. Sign up for either single or double servings of the meals to be delivered as a subscription or a one-time order.
Learn More
Previous Meals
Last week’s 6 meals.
What a VT Burger
A burger with mustard, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and onions, on a lightly toasted bun with a side of garlic potatoes.
read more
Butternut Squash & Spinach Lasagna
A creamy butternut squash lasagna with spinach, zucchini, and two types of Casa Terra cheese, garnished with sage and ancho bac’n.
read more
Country Fried Tofu with Mashed Potatoes & Gravy
Breaded tofu with garlicky mashed potatoes and gravy.
read more
Grilled Mojo Chick’n Fajitas
Grilled chick’n fajitas in garlic lime sauce with veggies, creamy salsa verde, and a traditional corn cake..
read more
Green Pasta Fagioli
Pasta fagioli in a creamy herbed sauce with lots of kale and lots of zucchini.
read more
Thai Red Curry
A Thai red curry loaded with tofu and veggies and served over quinoa.
read more
“Unbelievable food! The quality and taste were spectacular and the customer service was superb. I could not recommend this meal service enough. No one even remotely close competes with The Vegan Taste as a vegan meal delivery service.”
BRENDEN LE. FROM PHOENIX
ORDER WEEKLY OR SUBSCRIBE FOR AUTOMATIC DELIVERY.
BBQ Mango Burger
A smashburger with BBQ sauce, CT cheese, mango chutney, pickled onions, and aioli.
read more
Shepherd’s Pie
Carrots, potatoes, mushrooms, peas, onions, and lentils in a savory gravy, topped with hashbrowns.
read more
Potato and Cheese Enchiladas
Red enchiladas with CT cheese, roasted potatoes, and caramelized onions with a side of smoked paprika rice and refried beans.
read more
Tantanmen with Pan-fried Tofu
Japanese noodles in tahini broth with pan-fried tofu, corn, and shiitake mushrooms.
read more
Sushi Bowl
Forbidden and brown rice with edamame, roasted tofu and eggplant, carrot, cucumber, pickled daikon, pickled ginger, wasabi mayo, and nori.
read more
Sundried Tomato Pasta
Pasta Tossed with Sundried Tomato, Artichoke, Garbanzo Beans, Spinach Tossed in a Sundried Pomodoro Sauce.
read more
I am extremely impressed with my first week! From the sign-up process to delivery; everything has been super smooth and easy. I especially appreciate the text notifications on the day of delivery; I was able to meet the delivery driver for handoff and get my meals straight into the fridge. The food is amazing and I have loved every meal this week!
JANE WA. FROM CHANDLER
How It Works
We deliver a selection of 6 pre-made Vegan meals ready to reheat and eat. No more shopping, prepping, cooking and cleaning. Just eating a healthy variety of great meals!
Learn More
Plans and Pricing
We keep it simple for you. Sign up for either single or double servings of the meals to be delivered as a subscription or a one-time order.
Learn More
Coq au Vin
A French “beef” stew with carrots, mushrooms, blistered cauliflower, and soh curls in a dark gravy. Served with garlicky mashed potatoes.
read more
Cuban Burger
A burger topped with melted Swiss cheese, Cuban mustard, pickles, aioli, shredded mojo jackfruit, lettuce, and aioli. Served with a zucchini and potato salad side.
read more
Trini Doubles
A Trinidad-style chana masala on flatbread with mango chutney and cucumber chutney.
read more
Green Curry
A Thai green curry with housemade curry paste. Loaded with market veggies and tofu, and served over quinoa.
read more
Marry Me Tofu & Veggies
Roasted tofu and veggies in a creamy sundried tomato sauce. Served over brown rice.
read more
Pumpkin Chili
A pumpkin and poblano chili with black beans, squash, hominy, and crema.
read more
“This was such a lovely interactive meal, an invitation to participate in creating something delicious.”
REBECCA SP. FROM PHOENIX
(about our recent Thali)
“Best vegan burger I’ve ever eaten. If I didn’t know better I would not have known it was vegan.”
BARBARA MA. FROM GOODYEAR
(about our recent Mushroom Swiss Burger)

Make a Reservation
Steak 44 offers a modern fine-dining experience in the heart of Phoenix. Our chef-driven menu features hand-cut steaks, fresh seafood, shareable starters, and decadent house-made desserts.
Begin your evening with our Prime Steakhouse Meatballs or Crispy Shrimp, then enjoy entrées that highlight the very best in steak and seafood. End the night on a sweet note with on of our indulgent desserts, such as the Triple Chocolate Bomb.
Pair your meal with a handcrafted cocktail, a perfectly curated glass of wine, or a top-shelf spirit from our extensive collection.
Please let your server know about any food allergies or sensitivities. Our chefs are happy to accommodate special requests whenever possible.

About the Business
Our restaurant specializes in authentic home style cooking from El Salvador as well as a couple of other Central American countries. We pride ourselves in using only recipes passed down by our grandmother, who presently resides in El Salvador as well as incorporating some recipes from our staff. Our staff is primarily Salvadoran ladies, with just a few from other Central American countries. We pride ourselves in that because we feel it helps preserve the authenticity of this style of cooking. 
Our most popular dish are the "pupusas". These are hand-made corn tortillas filled inside with pork, cheese & beans. We have been recognized in Phoenix Magazine for our Ceviche as a Top 50 Dish in the Valley. Our sopas, soups, are a full meal on their own. Large bowls loaded with vegetables, beef or chicken & chipilin, a leafy green vegetable native to Central America. 
We hope to see you soon at any of our 5 locations!
…

-house — a satisfyin

getaway, for the l
o
ve of food,
s
erved all day.
Welcome to Ingo’s Tasty Food—where everything’s made from scratch, with care and a whole lot of love.
Whether you’re grabbing a morning coffee, catching up over lunch, or winding down with dinner on the patio, Ingo’s is made for the moments that matter.
With three Valley locations—Arcadia, Downtown Phoenix, and now North Scottsdale—you’re never far from a fresh-made meal. Swing by for breakfast and coffee, stop in for lunch, or treat yourself to the best burger in Phoenix and a frozen Greyhound for dinner.
Prefer to take it to-go? Order curbside, pickup, or delivery through
our app
—and now, earn points on every order with our new loyalty program. Redeem them on anything you’d like (and get 1000 points just for signing up).
Wherever and whenever you join us, we’ll be here to make your day a little tastier.
Locations
INGO’S TASTY FOOD CATERS IT ALL
At Ingo’s Tasty Food, we make catering easy and delicious, no matter the occasion. From office breakfasts and business lunches to birthday parties and casual get-togethers with your crew, we’re here to help with all-day catering options that fit your needs.
Choose from our catering menu featuring sandwiches, salads, breakfast items, sides, and more—or mix and match by ordering à la carte from our all-day menu. Or just let us know how many people you’re serving, and we can take care of the rest.
And don’t forget about our cocktails to go—they’re a crowd-pleaser and the perfect addition to any gathering.
Whatever the occasion, let us take care of the food so you can focus on enjoying the moment.

READ MORE
Reserve at TEXAZ Grill on Yelp
Authentic Steakhouse in Phoenix AZ
Since 1985, TEXAZ Grill has been serving bold flavors and Texas-sized portions, making it one of the top steak restaurants in Phoenix, Arizona. As a premier steakhouse, we’re known for unforgettable meals, friendly service, and a true Texas dining experience.
Over 2,000 Five Star Reviews!
Order TEXAZ Grill delivery:
Call to order ahead for TEXAZ Grill to go:
(602) 248-7827
Discover
Our Story
The TEXAZ Grill story begins in 1985, when founders Steve Freidkin and Jim Mitchell opened under the name “Lone Star Steaks” at 16th Street and Bethany Home Road. They conceived the restaurant as the Valley’s first proper Texas steakhouse, serving aged, choice beef hand-cut on premises by a real Texan (i.e. Steve, who was the culinary half of the partnership). It was an instant hit.
Read More

Take A Tour

INGO’S TASTY FOOD
NORTH SCOTTSDALE, AZ
7087 E Mayo Blvd
Phoenix, AZ 85054
480-863-8850
Sun – Thurs: 7am to 8:30 pm
Fri & Sat: 7am to 9 pm
Since April 2024.
Our newest Ingo’s Tasty Food location—right next to our sister restaurant,
Buck & Rider
—serves up so much more than just great food. It’s a place to kick back, relax, and enjoy the moment.
The building itself is a vibe, with its unique curved design and our signature clock sign that’s hard to miss. It’s all about combining playful, welcoming energy with incredible flavors for an experience that feels special every time you visit.
Our all-day menu includes breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee and cocktails available for dine-in,
curbside pickup
, or
delivery
. You can also check out our grab-and-go case filled with freshly made salads and other easy, delicious options.

Since 2021.
Located in the vibrant heart of downtown Phoenix, our Block 23 spot is your all-day go-to. Just minutes from the
Footprint Center
,
Arizona Diamondbacks Stadium
, and the
Phoenix Convention
Center
, we’re here to fuel your day starting with your morning brew.
Our all day menu include breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee and cocktails available for dine-in,
curbside pickup
, or
delivery
. And check out our grab-and-go case filled with freshly made salads, to go cocktails, and other easy, delicious options.

Catering Inquiries?
Email us!
INGO’S TASTY FOOD
ARCADIA, AZ
4502 N 40th St
Phoenix, AZ 85018
602-795-2884
Open Daily 11am to 9pm
Since 2013.
We built our first location in the heart of Arcadia, creating a warm, inviting oasis where high-quality, real ingredients meet the comfort of casual dining. A standout feature here is the wrap-around patio: a welcome space thoughtfully designed with heating and misting systems to keep you comfortable year-round. Here, we set the stage for a new kind of culinary community—one that feels approachable, authentic, and full of positive energy. And most importantly, Ingo’s Tasty Food Arcadia was the birthplace of our iconic greyhound cocktail!
Our lunch and dinner menu is available for dine-in,
curbside pickup
, or
delivery
.

About Us
For 16 years, Günther and Irene Krause owned and operated the original “Zur Kate” in Hamburg Germany. Günther was a “Metzgermeister” (Master Butcher) and Irene was tutored by the famous Herr Keimer to develop her culinary skills. In the fall of 1983, the Krauses re-located to Mesa (for it’s “wunderbar” weather) and opened “Zur Kate German Restaurant”.
Horst Schlembach was born in Großwenkheim (close to Bad Kissingen) in the Bavaria District of Germany. When he was 23, he used his last few “D-marks” (Deutsche marks) to relocate to Arizona (he wanted to be a cowboy). He joined the Krause’s at “Zur Kate” shortly after they opened. After 23 years of working with Günther & Irene, Horst became the new owners of “Zur Kate” (still in the same location).
Zur Kate translated means “to the old smokehouse” and to this day Zur Kate still attempts to recreate the “Gästehaus” atmosphere of “gemutlichkeit” (cordiality & friendliness). Here we treat everyone as a friend when they come through the door.

raw_text:

Our Story

Home
Menu
Order
Our Story
Contact
Careers
Blog
Home of the Fish Taco
Scroll
Menu
locally sourced and crafted with love
Step 1:
Choose Your Canvas
Tacos
All tacos are served on a warm tortilla (your choice of flour or corn) and topped with cabbage slaw, seasoned rice, homemade pinto beans, your choice of protein, shredded cheddar, and pico de gallo.
Burritos
All burritos are wrapped in a warm flour tortilla and packed with cabbage slaw, seasoned rice, homemade pinto beans, your choice of protein, shredded cheddar, and pico de gallo.
QUESADILLAS
All quesadillas are loaded with your personal choice of fixings and served with cabbage slaw, your choice of cheese, your choice of protein, homemade guacamole, sour cream,  and pico de gallo.
Loaded Nachos
Nacho mammas traditional nachos, these fresh homemade tortilla chips come loaded with cabbage slaw, your choice of protein, ooey gooey warm nacho cheese, homemade guacamole, sour cream, and pico de gallo.
add
seasoned
rice, homemade pinto or black beans
Rice Bowls
Your choice of fixings topped with cabbage slaw, seasoned rice, homemade pinto or black beans, your choice of protein, shredded cheddar, and pico de gallo drizzled with chipotle mayo.
Step 2:
Pick Your Protein
Baja
Our take on the classic surf taco featuring your choice of grilled or famously battered fried white fish or our spicy marinated shrimp. (These bad boys are our bestsellers.)
Shredded Beef
Our irresistible seasoned shredded beef tacos with your choice of red or green chili.
Carne Asada
Mouth watering marinated and grilled steak.
Chicken
Our diced chicken tacos are killer (trust us).
Pulled Pork
Braised and simmered pork shoulder, these bad ass tacos are tender and melt in your mouth.
Garden Variety
These hipster tacos are anything but ordinary made with grilled marinated prickly pear cactus strips and topped with cabbage slaw, seasoned rice, black beans, feta, and pico de gallo.
*
Can be made Vegan
Step 3:
cover with Sauce
It’s not complete unless it’s completely smothered in one of our “F”ing awesome sauces
Red Chili
Our red chili sauce dives in the deep smokey Chile Morita territory and packs a mean spicy punch.
Green chili
Anything but #basic our green chili sauce is simmered with fire-roasted poblano peppers and scrumptious garlic goodness.
Sweet Chili
Our sweet chili sauce has a flare of Asian twang spice proving that great food needs no boarders. Fusion is our passion so if you’re feeling wild give this sauce a shot!
Chipotle Sauce
Self explanatory, and jaw dropping deliciousness.
Spicy sauce
Our spicy sauce is the stuff your parents warned you about as a kid when they tucked you into bed at night, but if you’re not a pansy this blend of spices is sure to be a fiery treat.
Mango Habanero Sauce
We went to the Caribbean with this velvety sweet and spicy mango habanero recipe, and while not quite at burn-your-face-off level, these habanero peppers pack more heat than their milder jalapeño counter parts—so proceed with a little caution.
Spicy teriyaki sauce
This ain’t your teriyaki chicken sauce. It’s east meets grill in this blend of savory, sweet, spicy and tangy tropical Asian influence and it’s anything but ordinary.
Extras
Grilled Dogs
Our kick ass take on the classic hot dog is a crowd favorite. This can be served regular style or loaded. Loaded includes your choice of shredded cheddar or feta cheese, jalapeños, bacon, homemade pinto beans, guacamole, pico de gallo, and cabbage slaw.
Regular
Loaded
Chips & Salsa
Grab a bag of our fresh homemade tortilla chips and your choice of red, green, or our famously fire breathing volcano salsa.
Beverages
Famously Refreshing Lemonade Slushies
* Available in Cherry, Strawberry, Pomegranate, Guava, Blackberry, Kiwi, Cranberry, Blueberry, Blue Raspberry, Tangerine, Huckleberry, Lime, Mango, Watermelon, Raspberry, Peach, Mandarin Orange, Vanilla, Passion Fruit, Banana, Coconut, Pineapple, Cactus Pear, & Apple
Jarritos
Soda/agua

Dinner Menu
Culinary Philosophy
There’s an alchemy at play at Renata’s.  A delicate thread of joyful intrigue that we call ‘the essence of smoke’. And, like smoke, the allure is hard to define. Our advice is to just let it weave its magic around you, to seduce you with its unique dance – and simply savor every magnificent moment.
FROM THE MAVEN
El Matador
don julio reposado, unión uno mezcal, habanero, hibiscus,
pomegranate, lime, black lava salt
Paloma Purefection
blanco tequila, salted grapefruit, pamplemousse, lime
Elotero’s Pour
corn pop infused reposado, elote liquor,
pasilla chile, corn milk, lime
Margherita Margarita
burrata-washed blanco tequila,
tomato, basil, manzanilla sherry
Against the Grain
camazotz rum, milk liqueur, mango-coconut cordial,
toasted rice, miso honey
Pica Fresa
reposado tequila, Aperol, charred strawberry, spiced honey, lemon
Emerald Sour
mahón gin, pisco, midori, chareau aloe liqueur, yuzu,
pistachio orgeat, champagne air
Almost Famous
mezcal, Genepy, Aperol, yuzu, pineapple, clarified coconut milk
Margarita Clásica
blanco tequila, lime, orange liqueur, agave, salt air
Barrel-Aged Oaxacan Old Fashioned
don julio reposado tequila, unión uno mezcal,
agave, mole bitters
SMALL TRADITIONS
Guacamole
hass avocado, roma tomato, red onion, cilantro, jalapeño, cotija
Pao de Queijo
cheese bread, hatch chile gouda, queso chihuahua, seasonal spread
Renata's Caesar
baby romaine, charred poblano dressing, anchovy pangrattato, Parmigiano, sweety drops
Aji Amarillo Melon Salad
seasonal compressed melon, agave, chevre, pepita, micro greens
Radicchio Delicata Salad
castelfranco radicchio, roasted delicata, pear, pepita, pickled red onion, manchego, red-chili peanut vinaigrette
Tetela
corn masa pockets, carnitas, queso chihuahua, hoja santa leaf, salsa verde
Seabass & Blue Crab Ceviche*
Passionfruit leche de tigre, cucumbe, pineapple, red onion, pepita, pimenton oil
Coxinha
Brazilian croquette, smoked chicken, caramelized vegetables, Parmigiano, aged cheddar, papaya ketchup
Octopus a La Veracruzana
charred octopus, tomato, caperberry, sweet pepper, olive, marble potato
SHARED CELEBRATIONS
Served with warm tortillas and house salsas upon request
Lamb Barbacoa
smoked & braised lamb, tangerine, salsa macha,
pickled red onion, charred Mexican onions & chiles
Moqueca
Peruvian rice, scallops, seabass, cashew farofa, tomato-coconut broth, lime
Grilled Branzino
guajillo-tamarind paste, escabeche, lime
Smoked American Wagyu Brisket
10 hour pecan-mesquite smoked, 12oz Snake River Farms Gold
Dry-Aged Tomahawk
32 oz dry aged black angus, choice of chimichurri, tamarind-guajillo demi
PERSONAL LEGACIES
Heritage Prime New York Strip*
mixed mushrooms, guajillo-tamarind demi, yucca espuma
Scallop a La Chorillana*
pan seared scallops, chorillana sauce, roasted sweet potato, choclo, salsa criolla
Pollo Pibil
achiote-rubbed half chicken, 48-hour brine, guasacaca, pickled red onion, pepita
Roasted Chilean Seabass*
Peruvian rice, mole verde, pickled fresno chile
Flautas
potato, caramelized onion, roasted red pepper, queso Oaxaca, mole amarillo, guajillo marinated cabbage
ANCESTRAL GIFTS
Arroz Chaufa
jasmine rice, egg, aji amarillo, barrel-aged shoyu, sesame, peppers
Charro Beans
tepary beans, smoked brisket, tomato, jalapeno, escabeche, cotija, avocado
Segueza
mushrooms, tuxpeno corn, longanisa, mole verde
Crispy Polenta
manchego, chorizo, romesco
Asparagus la Plancha
mole verde, perfect poached egg, Manchego, salsa mocha
*Consuming raw or under cooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.

Dinner Menu
BYOB RESTAURANT
THANKSGIVING DAY DINNER MENU
RESERVE A TABLE
STARTERS
Sapiens Onion Soup
Quintessential French classic. A must try.
12.9
Bruschetta
Artisan Paleo toasts with market-fresh seasonal toppings
9.9
Escargot
Timeless French delicacy. Herbs and garlic bring out the best in these fleshy snails from the Burgundy region of France
16
Olives
“Nocellara del Belice” variety. A true aficionado’s olive.
6
Country Terrine
Superb, meaty starter made with natural pork and chicken livers served with Paleo toast, Dijon mustard and predestined cornichon pickle. Old French recipe dating back to Louis XIV
13.9
Farmer’s Flatbread
Herb-infused pork belly with smashed butternut squash, roasted cabbage and seasonal greens on a rustic Paleo crust
15
The Paleo Dip
Delicious, light spread made with seasonal veggies, seeds and herbs. All the phytonutrients your body needs today
11
Oysters Rockefeller
Puget Sound Oysters baked with spinach, herbs and garlic, finished with a perfect layer of Paleo crème gratinée
14.9
Paleo Bread Platter
Assorted freshly baked Paleo bread with Tomato Jam, and Artichoke Tapenade. Original, nutritious and amazingly tasty Grain-Free alternative to bread
13
Stuffed Mushrooms
Jumbo mushrooms stuffed with Oregon Dungeness Crab and baked with a touch of Bechamel. Caution! Highly addictive item
15
Bone Broth
4 oz of liquid treasure! This super concentrated, 36hr, grass-fed bone broth is brimming with Collagen and life-giving Glutathione
6
SALADS
Sapiens Salad
Chef Aurore’s original! Frisèe, arugula, smoked bacon, cranberries, pumpkin seeds and pecans with homemade Sherry vinaigrette.
14.9
Simple Greens
Organic mixed greens with baby kale, spinach, arugula, carrots, shaved fennel and tomatoes with Sapiens apple cider vinaigrette.
13
Beet Tartar
A colorful ensemble of beets, green peas and root vegetables with homemade sauerkraut, pickle and Dijon mustard vinaigrette.
13
Sapiens Kraut
Cavemen’s gift to humanity, this pure “lacto” sauerkraut, is the original superfood. Generously doused with EVO, it delivers 50 billion probiotics in every bite-guaranteed or money back!
12
Add-Ons to any salad
Poached Egg-
2
, Breast of Chicken-7, Seared Alaskan Salmon (4oz) –
7
BURGERS
Sapiens Burger
Our signature burger. Grass-fed beef topped with shallot chutney, organic arugula greens, nitrate-free applewood-smoked bacon and Sapiens Kitchen avocado oil mayo on a Paleo bun.
15
Keto Burger
Ketogenic Bomb. Bun-less, grass-fed beef topped with shallot chutney, organic arugula greens, nitrate-free applewood-smoked bacon and Sapiens Kitchen avocado oil mayo, MCT oil
15
ENTREES
KETO and AIP vegetables substitution available
Roasted Chicken
Pasture-raised, ” frenched” chicken breast with roasted potato, local seasonal vegetables and thyme-garlic jus. Delish!
28
Liver N’ Onions
Grass-fed calf liver delicately sauteed with Vidalia onions and Sherry. Served with roasted potato and local seasonal vegetables. The most nutrient-dense item on the menu. A must try!
31
Sapiens Duck
Leg of duck confit aged in herb-infused fat meets delicate duck breast. Served with roasted potato, local seasonal vegetables and orange reduction sauce. The devil is in the flavor.
32.9
Paleo Meatloaf
This unique meatloaf is made with veal and Kobe beef. Served with potato Au Gratin, local seasonal vegetables and Sherry wine sauce. What’s in your meatloaf?
28
Lamb Shank
All natural Colorado lamb shank braised in red wine with root vegetables. Tender and succulent with luxurious depth of flavor.
31
Alaskan Salmon
Wild-caught Alaskan Salmon gently seared to preserve its exquisite flavor, roasted potato, seasonal farm vegetables and Paleo crème sauce.
31
Filet Mignon
Tender, grass-fed filet beautifully paired with potatoes Au Gratin, local seasonal vegetables and Argentinian Malbec wine sauce.
35
Vegetable Napoleon
Vegan Heaven! Zucchini, yellow squash, potatoes, eggplants, tomatoes, peppers and Chef Aurore’s ever-so-timely Béchamel.
25
Rabbit
World famous French rabbit stew with potatoes, pearl onions and root vegetables in a rich Dijon mustard sauce. These naturally farmed rabbits from the Appalachians are quite possibly the best meat a human can eat. Game on!
32.9
Vegan Entree of the Day
Spectacular Vegan plate prepared from the fresh seasonal vegetables on hand expertly paired with a delicate sauce.
27
Chef Aurore’s Entree of the Day
Delight your senses with Chef’s Entrees of the Day skillfully prepared in the best traditions of French contemporary fine dining.
Market Price
SIDES
Sweet
Potatoes
Organic sweet yam with vanilla-maple glaze
6
Potato AuGratin (Non-Dairy)
Thin layers of Yukon potatoes patiently baked with Paleo crème
6
Roasted Plantains
Ripe plantains with Fresno pepper infused aioli sauce
6
Seasonal Veggies
Farm fresh vegetables from RhibaFarms, San Tan Valley, AZ
6
Balsamic-Braised Brussels
Sprouts
Amazingly delicious organic Brussels sprouts braised in aged balsamic
6
DESSERT
Sapiens Crème brûlée
French classic redefined. Pure chocolate indulgence. Non-Dairy.
11
Clafoutis
Another French classic made with almond flour and seasonal fruits, masterfully translated into a Paleo treat.
11
Apple Crumble
Heartwarming baked apples infused with Ceylon cinnamon and topped with homemade non-dairy ice cream.
11
Waffle Tartine
Original 10 spice-infused Paleo waffle with decadent, warm Peruvian chocolate dip. Yum!
12
Crème Caramel
Luscious caramel custard with a flake of Sel Gris salt.
11
Les Chocolats
A collection of fine chocolates freshly made at Sapiens Kitchen.
12
"LITTLE CAVEMEN" KIDS' MENU
Little Hunter
Paleo meatloaf with potatoes and veggies
15
Little Fisher
Wild-caught Alaskan salmon with potatoes and veggies
15
Little Bird Catcher
Free-range chicken breast with potatoes and veggies
15
Little Veggie Gatherer
Sautéed seasonal vegetables and potatoes
15
